Lino ndamwambilingeti ngomwelela kutina ni Lesa uyo ukute kushina buyumi bwa muntu, kayi ukute ngofu shakumuwalani mumulilo utapu, mumutinenga Lesa.”
Sena Tutite tusanu ntebakute kulishiwa ne tumali tung'ana twa mangwe? Lino kuliya nambi umo Lesa ngwakute kulubapo.
Nomba mishishi yenu ili mumutwi mwenu yonse waibelenga. Neco mutatinanga pakwinga amwe mwadula kupita baciba bangi.
“Ndamwambilinga cakubinga, muntu uliyense lansumininga pamenso abantu, nenjame nde Mwana Muntu ninkamusumine pamenso a bangelo ba Lesa.
Nsombi Muntu uliyense lankananga pamenso a bantu, nenjame nde Mwana Muntu ninkamukane pamenso a bangelo ba Lesa.”
“Muntu uliyense weshi kwamba maswi aipa pa Mwana Muntu inga ulekelelwa, nsombi muntu uliyense weshikusampula Mushimu Uswepa, nteshi akalekelelwepo.”
“Bakamwikata kwambeti bakamubeteke mung'anda yakupaililamo, kuli beshikwendelesha nambi kubaleli, mutakasukameti, nimukumbuleconi, nekukaba kuyeyeti nomba nituye twambe cani?
Pakwinga Mushimu Uswepa nakamwishibishe ncomwelela kwamba pacindico.”
Umbi muntu walikuba mulikoto walambila Yesu eti, “Beshikwiyisha, kamumwambila mukwetu ampeko buboni bwalashiya bata balobe.”
Nsombi Yesu wamukumbuleti, “Obe nomba niyani walampa incito yakumubeteka amwe nambi kuyabanya bintu byalamushila bameshenu balobe?”
Lino Yesu walapitilisha kubambila bantu, “Kamucenjelani kayi mutaba bantu basunishi buboni. Pakwinga buyumi bwa muntu nkabwela kupimwa ne buboni mbwakute.”
Kayi Yesu walabambila mukoshanyo eti, “Umbi muntu mubile walikukute libala umo mwalekata byakulya bingi.
Mpwalaboneco walatatika kuyeya mumoyo eti, ‘Ndiya butala bunene mwakubika byakulya byakame byonse ibi ninjinseconi’
Lino walambeti, ‘Nimwaye matala akame nekwibaka ambi anene kwambeti mbikemo byakulya ne buboni bwakame bumbi bonse.
Lino ninkambile moyo wakameti, ukute buboni bwingi bwakwana byaka bingi. Neco pumwina, kolya ne kunwa nekukondwa.’
Nsombi Lesa walamwambileti, ‘Omuluya! Lelo lyopele mashiku nufwe. Nomba bintu byonse ibi mbyowalabamba kushikila cino cindi nibibe byabani?”
Lino Yesu pakupwisha walambeti, “Encoti cikabe kuli abo beshikulibunjikila buboni, kakuli pamenso a Lesa baliyapo buboni.”
Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Pacebo ici ndamwambilingeti mutalisukama pa buyumi bwenu eti nitulye cani nambi nitufwale cani.
Pakwinga buyumi bwapita byakulya, ne mubili wapita byakufwala.
Kamubonani bikwangala, nkabishanga, nkabitebulu biliya ng'anda yakusungilamo bintu nambi manga. Nsombi Lesa ukute kubisanina. Sena nkamwinshi kwambeti Lesa umusuni kupita bikeni?
Niyani palyamwe welakunungilako busuba bumo kubuyumi bwakendi?
Nomba na nkamwela kucikonsha kwinsa kantu kang'ana eti ako, nipacebo cini mulasukamanga pa bintu bimbi ibyo?
Kamubonani maluba ncakute kukula. Nkakute kusebensa nambi kutunga byakufwala, nsombi ndamwambilingeti nambi Mwami Solomoni mububile bwakendi bonse, liya kubapo ne byakufwala byaina byalaboneka eti limo pa malubayo.
Lino na ni Lesa ukute kufwalika mwila uyo ukute kwinsa lelo mpouli, lilo bauwala pa mulilo, nomba amwe, nkela kumufwalika? Amwe bantu balushomo lung'ana!”
“Weco mutasukamanga nambi kuyeyeti nimulye cani nambi kunwa.
Ibi bintu, bantu bakunsa bakute kubiyandaula, nsombi Bameshenu bacinshi kwambeti byonse mubisuni.
Neco kamuyandaulani Bwami bwa Lesa, nakamupeni bintu byonse ibyo.”
“Amwe kalikoto kang'ana kambelele shakame, mutatina pakwinga Bameshenu balayanda kumupa Bwami.
Kamulishani buboni mbomukute, mali mupe bapenga. Kamulilangwela mpotomona shitabolo kayi mubike buboni bwenu kwilu nkweti bukabule kubola, pakwinga kuliya kabwalala wela kushikako, ne muswa nkawela kubononga.
Pakwinga myoyo yenu ikutekuba kuli bubile bwenu.”
“Kamubani balibambila cindi conse kayi malampi enu abenga abangila lyonse.
Kamubani eti basebenshi balapembelenga mwami wabo lafumunga kubwinga kwambeti mpoti ashikile ne kukonkosha, nabo bamucalwile bwangu.
Bakute colwe basebenshi beshi bakacanike kabalanga ne menso mwami wabo akabwela. Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti mwami wabo nakafwale byakufwala bya ncito nekubekalika nekubapa byakulya.
Bakute colwe basebenshi mwami mboti akacane balibambila, nambi akese pakati pamashiku nambi kumaca.
Nsombi kamwanukangeti, mwine ng'anda abangawenshiba cindi kabwalala ncalesanga, inga nkela kuleka kabwalala kwingila mung'anda yakendi.
Nenjamwe copeleco, kamubani mwalibambila kumutambula Mwana Muntu pakwinga lakesanga pacindi ncomwabula kwingashila.”
Neye Petulo walepusheti, “Mwami, sena mukoshanyo uyu mulambilinga afwe twenka nambi bantu bonse?”
Mwami Yesu walakumbuleti, nomba niyani musebenshi ukute lushomo kayi ne mano? Uyo mwami ngoshi akape incito yakulangilila bonse ba mu ng'anda yakendi nekupa banendi byakulya pacindi celela?
Nakatambule cilambo musebenshi uyo mwami wakendi pakubwelela ngweti akacane nkensa ico.
Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti mwami wakendi nakamupe incito yakubona bintu byonse mbyakute.
Lino na musebeshi uyo lamba mumoyo wakendi eti, mwami wakame lacelwa kwisa, lino utatika kuma basebenshi banendi batuloba ne batukashi kayi ne kutatika kulya, kunwa ne kukolwa.
Mwami wa musebeshi uyo lakesanga pabusuba mbwateshi kayi nepa cindi ncabula kwingashila. Nakamupe cisubulo ciyosha ne kumuwala uko nkoti kukabenga bantu babula lushomo.
Musebenshi uyo wishi mwami wakendi ncasuni, nomba liya kulibambila nambi kwinsa ncasuni mwami wakendi nakamukwipe cangofu.
Nomba musebenshi utacinshi ncasuni mwami wakendi, na lepishi mwakubula kwinshiba nakomwe pang'ana. Muntu uliyense walapewa bingi welela kubwesha bingi. Muntu walapewa bingi kwambeti asunge, nakambilwe kubwesha bingi pelu pa ibyo mbyalapewa.
“Ndalesa kuwala mulilo mucishi capanshi, nendakondwa kwambeti mulilo newabangila kendi!
Nomba ndelela kwingila mulubatisho lwamapensho anene, neco moyo wakame nkawekalikana kushikila mapensho ayo akenshike.
Sena mulayeyengeti ndalaleta lumuno mucishi ca panshi? Cakubinga ndiyawa, nsombi ndalaleta kupansana.
Kufuma lelo mumukowa umo nimukabe bantu basanu bapatana, batatu nibakapatane nebabili. Naboyo babili nibakabukilane ne batatu
Baishi nibakabukile mwana mutuloba, neye mwana mutuloba nakabukile baishi, banyina nibakabukile mwana mutukashi, neye mwana mutukashi nakabukile banyina. Kumakwendi batukashi nibakabukile mulekashi, neye mulekashi nakabukile kumakwendi batukashi.”
Yesu walambila bantu bonseti, “Na mulabono likumbi kalifumina kumboshi, mukute kwambeti, imfula niloke lelo, nicakubinga ikute kuloka.
Na impepo itatika kupupula kufumina kumusansa mukute kwambeti lelo nikupye cepa, kayi kukute kuba copeleco.
Amwe bantu batenshi mbyomulambanga, mukute kwinshiba kuboneka kwa cishi capanshi ne kwilu, nomba nicani nkamukute kwinshiba bupandulushi bwa bintu bilenshikinga masuba ano?”
“Nomba nipacebo cini nkamukute kwinsa byalulama mobene?
Na mulenga kunkuta ne munobe wa mulandu,wela kufwambana kunyumfwana nendi kamucili panshila, kwambeti katakutwala kuli weshi kubeteka. Pakwinga neye weshikubeteka inga ukutwala kumushilikali, neye mushilikali inga ukusunga mujele.
Ndakwambilinga cakubingeti nteshi ukafumemo kushikila ukalipile byonse bilayandikinga.”
Pacindico bantu bambi balikubapo balamwambila Yesu makani a bantu baku Galileya abo Pilato mbwalashina mung'anda ya Lesa nekusankanya milopa yabo pamilumbo njobalikubenga kuli Lesa.
Lino Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Sena mulayeyengeti abo ba Galileya balashininwa balikuba baipa kupita ba Galileya bambi bonse?
Sobwe! Lino ndamwambilingeti na mubule kusanduka kubwipishi bwenu nenjamwe nimukafweti basa.
Nomba abo bantu likumi nebasanu ne batatu lwalabawila lubumbu lutali lwa ku Siloamu, mulayeyengeti balikuba baipa kupita bantu bonse balikwikala mu Yelusalemu?
Sobwe! Nsombi namubule kusanduka kubwipishi bwenu nenjamwe nimukafwe eti basa.”
Kayi Yesu walabambila mukoshanyo uwu, “Kwalikuba muntu naumbi walikukute citondo ca mukuyu calikuba mulibala lya minyansa. Bumbi busuba walaya kucitondo kuya kubonako nkuyu, nsombi liya kushicanako.
Lino walambila musebenshi eti, ‘Bona nibyaka bitatu nkanjisa kuno kuyanda nkuyu kumukuyu uyu, nsombi nkankute kucanapo. Lino citeme cilonongelenga cani bulongo’
Nomba nendi walakumbuleti, ‘Mwami ulekeni kwacaka cino conka. Nindubambilile cena nekubika mboleshi.
Mpani nicikekate bisepo mwakali. Nsombi na cikabule kwikata mukaciteme.’”
Lino pabusuba bumbi bwa Sabata, Yesu walikwiyisha mung'anda yakupaililamo.
Mung'anda umo mwalikuba mutukashi walikuba ne mishimu yaipa walapenga kwa byaka likumi ne bisanu ne bitatu. Walikwenda kali wakotama, nkalikucikosha kololoka nambi pang'ana.
Lino Yesu mpwalabona mutukashi uyo walamwambileti, “Mutukashi, ulasungululwa kubulwashi bwakobe.”
Lino Yesu walabika makasa akendi pali endiye, popelapo walololoka nekutatika kulumbaisha Lesa.
Lino mukulene wa ng'anda ya kupaililamo walakalala cepa mpwalaboneti Yesu lashiliki muntu pa busuba bwa Sabata. Lino walambila bantu eti, “Kuli masuba asanu ne bumo ngotwelela kusebensa mbuli ncocalembwa mumilawo. Neco mwisenga kushilikwa mumasubayo, kufunyakowa pa busuba bwa Sabata Sobwe.”
Lino Mwami Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Amwe mobantu omukute kwamba mbyomutenshi, niyani mulikoto wela kubula kucalwila musune nambi mbongolo yakendi ne kuya kwinwisha menshi pa busuba bwa Sabata?
Nomba uyo mutukashi mwana wa mumukowa wa Abulahamu uyo Satana ngwalasunga kwa byaka likumi ne bisanu ne bitatu, sena nkelela kusungululwa pa busuba bwa Sabata?”
Yesu mpwalambeco balwani bakendi balanyumfwa nsoni, nsombi bantu bonse balasangalala pabintu byonse byaina bikankamanisha mbyalensa.
Yesu walepusheti, “Anu bwami bwa Lesa bulyeti cani? Nomba ngandibukoshanisha necani?
Bwakoshana ne luseke lwa mastadi ulo muntu ndwalabyala mulibala mwakendi. Mpolwalamena nekukula, calaba citondo cinene kayi ne bikeni byalabambilamo bisangala mumisampi yaco.”
Kayi Yesu walepusheti, “Anu Bwami bwa Lesa ngandibukoshanisha necani?
Bulyeti cikufufumusha shinkwa, ico mutukashi ncalasankanya ne bunga wakwana bikopo bitatu, kushikila byonse byalafutumuka.”
Yesu mpalikuba pabulwendo bwakuya ku Yelusalemu, walenda muminshi kaya kwiyisha.
Lino umbi muntu walepusha Yesu eti, “Mwami, sena ni bang'ana beti bakapuluke?” Yesu walakumbuleti,
“Kamweleshani cangofu kwingila pacishinga cing'ana pakwinga ndamwambilingeti bantu bangi nibakeleshe kwingila, nsombi nteshi bakacikoshe.
Lino mwine ng'anda nakanyamuke nekucala kucishinga. Lino amwe mwemana pansa nimukatatike kukonkosha ne kwambeti, ‘Kamutucalwilako.’ Nsombi nendi nakamukumbuleti, ‘Kandimwinshi nkomulafumini.’
Lino nimukatatike kwambeti, ‘Pasa twalikulya ne kunwa pamo nenjamwe kayi mwalikwiyisha muminshi yetu.’
Nsombi nakamwambileti kandimwinshi nkomulafumininga, fumani apa mwense babwipishi.
Lino nimukalile nekukokota meno, nimukabone Abulahamu ne Isaki ne Yakobo kayi ne bashinshimi bonse kabali mu Bwami bwa Lesa, nsombi amwe kamuli pansa.
Bantu nibakafume kucwe ne kumboshi ne kumusansa ne kunyika, kwisa kwikala nekulya mu Bwami bwa Lesa.
Lino abo balikunyuma nibakabe kuntangu naboyo balikuntangu nibakabe kunyuma.”
Pacindi ico Bafalisi bambi balesa kuli Yesu nekumwambileti, “Kamufumani kuno, mwenga kumusena umbi pakwinga Helode layandanga kumushina.”
Nsombi Yesu walakumbuleti, “Kamuyani mumwambile uyo mwaba eti, ‘Ndafunyunga mishimu yaipa ne kushilika bantu lelo ne lilo. Lino pabusuba bwa butatu ninkapwishe incito yakame.’
Necikabeco ndelela kuba pa bulwendo lelo, ne lilo kayi ne busuba bwakonkapo, pakwinga nkacainapo mushinshimi kushinwa kumbi, nsombi ku Yelusalemu.”
“Obe Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu, weshikushina bashinshimi nekupwaya mabwe bantu abo Lesa mbwalatuma kuli njobe. Lingi ndalikuyanda kubunganya bantu mbuli ncoikute kwinsa inkuku pakufukatila twana twayo mumapapamino, nsombi obe walakana.”
Neco ng'anda ya Lesa inene iyi nikabe matongo. Ndamwambilingeti nteshi mukambonepo kayi kushikila mukambeti, “Walelekwa uyo lesanga mulina lya Mwami Lesa.”
Nabumbi busuba bwa Sabata Yesu walakwiwa kuya kulya kung'anda ya mukulene wa Bafalisi. Popelapo Bafalisi bali kabamulangishisha.
Lino pantangu pakendi Yesu palikuba muntu walikuba washimba mubili.
Lino Yesu walepusha Bafalisi ne beshikwiyisha Milawo eti, “Sena Milawo ikute kusuminisha kushilika muntu pa busuba bwa Sabata nambi ne?”
Nsombi balo balamwenowa. Lino Yesu walamanta muntu uyo, wamushilika nekumwambileti koya.
Popelapo Yesu walabepusheti, “Nomba nibani pakati penu. Na ng'ombe iwila mumukalo pa busuba bwa Sabata, sena nkela kwisabula pa cindico?”
Lino balalilwa kumukumbula.
Yesu mpwalabona bantu balakwiwa kulya nendi balatatika kulisalila bipuna byabulemu, walabambila mukoshanisho eti,
“Na muntu umukuwa kubwinga, mutekalanga pacipuna ca bulemu, pakwinga uyo muntu lamukuwu inga kakute bambi bapita amwe ba bulemu.
Neco uyo walamukuwa mwense mobabili nakese akamwambileti, kamufumani apa, pani cipuna ici kumuntu uyu, Lino nimukanyumfwe insoni mwakanyamuka kuya kwikala pa cipuma cabula bulemu.
Nomba na bamukuwa, kamuyani mwikale pabusena bwabula kuba bwabulemu kwambeti uyo mwine lamukuwu akamwambileti, ‘Kamwisani mwikalile pano, pa cipuna ca bulemu.’ Ici nicikakupe bulemu pamenso abantu bonse mbowalakwiwa nabo.
Pakwinga muntu uliyense weshikulisumpula nakacepeshewe nsombi muntu weshikulicepesha nakasumpulwe.”
Lino Yesu walambila Mufalisi walabakuweti, “Na mulakuwu bantu kwisakulya nabo cakulya ca munshi nambi ca mansailo, mutakuwa banenu, bakamukowa, ne bamakwenu nambi banobe babile, pakwinga naboyo nga bamukuwani, neco ngamutambulila limo cipo cenu.
Nsombi na ulabamba byakulya byakusekelela, kuwa bakandu ne balema kayi ne bampofu.
Lino nukapewe colwe, pakwinga balo nkabela kucikonsha kumubweshela. Lesa nakamubweshele pabusuba ubo baswepa bakapunduka kubafu.”
Muntu umbi palyabo Yesu mbwalikulyanabo, mpwalanyumfwa makani aya, walambila Yesu eti, “Walelekwa uyo eti akalye nabo pakusekelela mu Bwami bwa Lesa.”
Nendi Yesu walakumbuleti, “Kwalikuba muntu umbi walabamba malyalya kwambeti basekelele, ne kukuwa bantu bangi.
Cindi camalyalya mpocalashika walatuma musebenshi wakendi kuya kubakuwa nekubambileti, kamwisani bintu byonse bilabambiwa.
Nsombi bonse balakwiwa balatalika kwamba bintu byalabatatisha. Mutanshi walambeti, ndaulu libala neco ndelela kuya kulibona. Bandekeleleko nteti njise.”
Umbi walambeti, Ndaulu ng'ombe shakwana bipani bisanu, ndenga akushelesha, mundekeleleko nteti njise.
Naumbi walambeti, Ame ndeba mutukashi lino lino neco nteshi njise.
“Lino musebenshi walabwelela ne kumwambila mwami wakendi byonse ibyo. Mwine ng'anda walakalala, lino walamwambila musebesheti, endesha, koya munshila shinene ne shing'ana sha mumushi ukuwe bakandu ne balema kayi ne bampofu wise nabo kuno.
Mpwalabwela musebenshi walambeti, mwami, ndenshi kwelena nencomulang'ambili, kayi busena mobucili.
Lino mwami wakendi walakumbuleti, koya munshila ne mumikondo ya muminshi ubambile bantu cangofu eti bese kwambeti ng'anda yakame isule.
Ndamwambilingeti paliya nambi umo palyabo mbondalakuwa weshi alyeko malyalya akusekelela kwakame!”
Likoto linene lya bantu lyalakonkela Yesu, lino walapindamuka ne kubambileti,
Muntu uliyense layandanga kuba weshikwiya wakame welela kusuna ame kupita baishi ne banyina, nambi bakashendi ne bana, banse batukashi ne batuloba, kupita buyumi bwakendi.
Muntu uliyense labulunga kulikana mwine ne kuba walimbambila kupenshewa, nkela kuba shikwiya wakame.
“Nomba niyani umo pali amwe ayandanga kwibaka ng'anda itali, sena nkakute kwikala panshi nekubona na ukute mali akwana bintu bikute kuyandika kwambeti apwishe ng'anda iyo?
Pakwinga nalabulu kwinseco, ngacikonshyowa kubamba panshi, nekwalilwa kupwisha. Nomba bantu beshikubona ibi inga bamuseka.
Nibakambeti, uyu muntu walatatika kwibaka ng'anda, nomba lalilwa kupwisha.”
“Nomba nimwami cini, wela pakuya kulwana ne mwami umbi, nkakute kwikala panshi nekuyeya cena? Ukute kuyeya kwambeti nibashilikali byulu makumi abili bela kulwana ne mwami usa umbi, uyo lesanga bela kucikonshya ni bashilikali byulu likumi limo.
Neco na labono kwambeti nkela kucikonshya, ukute kutuma beshikumwimanina kwambeti be ngabasenge lumuno, mwami usa kacili kutali.
“Weco muntu uliyense labulunga kushiya bintu byonse mbyakute, nkela kuba weshikwiya wakame.”
“Mucele waina nomba na ulasambuluku ngamwinseconi kwambeti ube cena kayi?
Uliyawa incito kubulongo nambi pa bufumba bwakubika mulibala bakute kutayowa. muntu ukute matwi anyumfwe!”
Lino beshikusonkesha musonko ne bantu nabambi balikubula kukonka Milawo, balesa kwambeti banyumfwe mulumbe wa Yesu.
Lino Bafalisi ne beshikwiyisha ba Milawo balatatika kudandaula ne kwambeti, “Uyu muntu latambulungeconi bantu babwipishi, nekulya nabo.”
Lino Yesu walabambila mukoshanyo eti,
“Na umbi pali amwe kakute mbelele shili mwanda, lino imo itaika sena nkela kushiya mbelele shili makumi asanu ne ana ne shisanu ne shina ne kuya kulangaula kushikila wicana?
Lino na layicana ukute kukondwa ne kwinyamuna pamafushi
nekwitwala kung'anda. Lino ukute kukuwa banendi ne beshikamukowa nekubambileti, katukondwani pamo pakwinga mbelele yakame yanga yataika ndaicana,
ndamwambilingeti, nakoyo kwilu nikukabe kukondwa pamuntu umo wabwipishi lasanduku kubwipishi, kupita bantu bali makumi asanu ne ana ne basanu ne bana balulama batasuni kusanduka.”
“Na mutukashi umbi nkakute mali amasilifa likumi, na imo itaika ngawinseconi? Sena nte ukute kumunika lampi nekupyanga mung'anda yakendi nekulangaula cena monse kushikila wicana?
Alicana ukute kukuwa banendi ne beshikamukowa nekubambileti, ‘Katukondwani pamo pakwinga lyali lyakame lyanga lyataika ndalicana.’”
Yesu walabambileti, “Ndamwambilinga ne kwilu encobakute kwinsa bangelo ba Lesa bakute kukondwa na muntu umo weshi kwinsa bwipishi lasanduku mubyaipa.”
Yesu kayi walabambileti, “Kwalikuba mutuloba naumbi walikukute bana batuloba babili.
Lino kanike bantu walabambila baisheti, ‘Ta, kamumpani buboni mbomwela kunjabilako ame mumpele limo.’ Nabo bameshabo balabayabanya buboni bwabo.
Kapatana papita masuba angi, kanike bantu uyo walolisha buboni bwakendi nekumanta mali kuya pabulwendo kucishi ca kutali uko nkwalaya akononga mali akendi onse mubwikalo bwaipa.
Mpwalapwisha mali akendi onse, mucishi umo mwalaba nsala inene, lino walatatika kupenga.
Lino walaya kumuntu naumbi wa mucishi umo. Lino muntu uyo walamupa incito yakwembela ne kusanina nkumba.
Mutuloba uyo walatatika kukumbwa bufufu bwamusekese mboshali kulya nkumba. Nomba kuliya nambi muntu umo walikumupa byakulya.”
“Lino mpwalekalikana mano mumoyo wakendi walambeti, basebenshi bonse ba bata bakute byakulya bingi balekutunga, lino ame kuno ndayandanga kufwa kunsala.
Ndanyamukunga njenga kuli bata njengambeti, Ta, ndalepisha kuli Lesa ne kuli njamwe.
Nkandelela kukwiweti mwanenu, nsombi munsuminishe nsanduke musebenshi wenu.”
Lino walanyamuka nekubwelela kuli baishi. “Nkacili patali baishi balamubona, lino bamunyumfwila inkumbo, ne kumukonka akumukumbata ne kumumyanguta mwakukondwa.
Mwana uyo walabambila baisheti, ta, ndalepisha kuli Lesa ne kuli amwe. Nkandelelela kukwiweti mwanenu.
Nomba baishi balambila basebenshi babo eti, ‘Kamufwambanani mulete byakufwala byaina afwale. Mumufwalike likosa kumunwe ne nkwabilo kumyendo.
Salaniponi ng'ombe yansuka inene mushine kwambeti tulye tukondwe.
Pakwinga uyu mwaname wanga wafwa, lino laba muyumi kayi wanga wataika lino lacaniki.’ Pacindici balatatika kusekelela.”
Pacindico mukulene bantu walikuba kulibala. Lino mpwalashika pepi ne ng'anda, walanyumfwa bantu bali kabembila ne kushana ne kulubisha.
Walakuwa musebenshi umo nekumwipusheti, “cilenshikinga kuno nicani?”
Musebenshi walakumbuleti, “Mukwenu lesa neco baiso bamushinini ng'ombe yansuka inene pakwinga lesa nkali muyumi.”
Mpwalanyumfweco popelapo walakalala kayi walakana nekwingila mung'anda. Nomba baishi balapula pansa kuya kumukombeleleti engile mung'anda.
Nendi walakumbula baishi eti, kamubonani! byaka kufula mbyondamusebensele eti ndemusha kayi ndiyawa kumwipishilapo nambi pang'ana nomba muliya kumpapo nambi kapongo konka kwambeti kondwepo nebaname.
Nsombi mwanenu uyu walononga buboni bwenu mubatukashi bapombo, mpwalesa kung'anda, mulamushinini ng'ombe yansuka!
Baishi balamwambileti, “Omwaname, obe uli nenjame cindi conse kayi bintu byonse mbyonkute nibyakobe.
Nsombi lino katukondwa nekusekelela pakwinga kanike wakobe walikuba wafwa, lino nimuyumi, walikuba wataika, lino lacaniki.”
Yesu walabambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, Kwalikuba muntu mubile walikukute kapitawo weshi kubona buboni. Bantu balamwamba muntu uyo eti lonongonga buboni bwa mwami wakendi.
Lino walakuwa kapitawo wabuboni nekumwipusheti, “Nomba nicani ncondanyufunga pali njobe? Mpandulwile sha bukapitawo bwakobe pakwinga nkowelela kuba kapitawo sobwe.”
Lino kapitawo walatatika kuyeya mumoyo mwakendi eti, “Ninjiseconi mwami wakame layandanga kumfunya incito? Ndiya ngofu shakulima kayi kusenga kukutekumpa insoni.
Lino nceti njinse nici, kwambeti bantu bakantambule mumandabo, ndakafuma incito.”
Lino walatika kukuwa bonse balikukute nkongole ku mwami wakendi umo ne umo nekwipusha mutanshi eti, “Walakweleta shingaye kumwami wakame?”
Neye walakumbuleti, “Ndalakweleta mingomo mwanda ya mafuta”. Neco kapitawo uyo walamwambileti, “Manta lipepa apo palembwa nkongole yakobe, ufwambane wikale panshi ulembepo eti, mingomo yakwana makumi asanu.”
Lino walepusha umbi eti, “Nomba obe walakweleta shingaye?” Walakumbuleti, “Ndalakweleta masaka ali mwanda a maila.” Lino neye walamwambileti, “Manta Lipepa palembwa nkongole yakobe, Ulembepo masaka makumi asanu ne atatu.”
Mwami wakendi uyo walalumbaisha kapitawo wa buboni wabula kushomeka pakucenjela kwakendi. Pakwinga bantu ba mucishi ca panshi pano nibasongo pa kubamba makani abo kupita bantu bali mu mumuni wa Lesa.
Yesu walapitilisha kubambileti, “Ndamwambilinga kamulicanina banenu babuboni bwa mucishi cino kwambeti, buboni bwakapwa nibakamutambule mumanda amuyayaya.
Muntu uliyense washomeka pabintu bing'ana, nakashomeke pa bintu bingi. Uyo wabula kushomeka pabintu bing'ana, nteshi akashomeke pabintu bingi.
Lino na nkamwashomeka pabuboni bwa pacishi cino, nomba niyani eti akamushome nekumupani buboni bwancincine?
Na kamulimwabula kushomeka pabuboni bwa bantu bambi, nomba niyani eti akamupeni buboni bwelela kuba bwenu?”
“Kuliya musebenshi wela kusebensela bami babili, pakwinga ukute kupatapo umbi nekusuna umbi, nambi kunyumfwila umbi nekusula umbi. Anu ekwambeti nkamwela kusebensela Lesa ne buboni.”
Bafalisi mpolabanyumfwa makani aya balatatika kushibuluka Yesu pakwinga balo balikusunisha mali.
Nsombi Yesu walabambileti, “Amwe mukute kulibonesha kubantu eti mwalulama, necikabeco Lesa winshi myoyo yenu. Pakwinga bintu byonse bantu mbyobakute kwambeti byaina, nsombi kuli Lesa kuliya mobibelele.”
Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose ne Maswi alalemba bashinshimi byali kusebensa cindi ca Yohane mubatishi. Kufuma pacindico Mulumbe Waina wa Bwami bwa Lesa ukute kukambaukwa, kayi ne bantu bangi baleleshenga ne ngofu kwambeti bengile mu Bwami ubu.
Nsombi capuba kwambeti kwilu necishi kupwa, kupita liswi limo lya Milawo kupwa ngofu.
“Muntu uliyense laleke mukashendi nekweba mukashi naumbi, lenshi bupombo. Neye uyo lebe mutukashi ngwalaleka munendi lenshinga bupombo”.
Kwalikuba muntu mubile walikufwala byadula uyo walikulya cena lyonse.
Lino kwalikuba muntu wapenga lina lyakendi walikuba Lazalo. Walikukute bilonda mubili wonse, walikusuna kona pa cishinga ca ng'anda ya muntu mubile uyo.
Lazalo walikaminina mate uto twakulya twalikulaka panshi pa tebulu ya muntu mubile uyo, naboyo bakabwa bali kabesa akumyanguta pabilonda byakendi.
Muntu wapenga uyo walafwa, bangelo balamutwala kwilu mumakasa a Abulahamu. Muntu mubile uyo neye walafwa nekumufukila mumanda.
Lino mubile uyo mpwalikupenga mumusena wa bafu, walalanga kwilu nekubona Lazalo kulubasu lwa Abulahamu nkali patali.
Lino walolobesha eti, “Ta Abulahamu kamunyumfwilako inkumbo. Kamutumani Lazalo kwambeti abike cikumo cakendi mumenshi kwambeti atontoshe lulemi lwakame pakwinga ndashupiki mumulilo muno.”
Lino Abulahamu walambeti, “Mwaname kwanuka mpowalikuba muyumi walatambula bintu byonse byaina, neye Lazalo walatambula bintu byeshikubaba. Lino neye kuno wakondwa, obe uli mumapensho anene.
Kayi pakati petu nenjobe pali cisengu, cakwambeti kuliya muntu ulikuno wela kucikonsha kusabuka kwisa uko, nambi uli uko kwisa kuno.”
Kufumapo mubile uyo walambeti, “Anu ndasengenga Ta, mutume Lazalo kung'anda ya bata.
Pakwinga nkute bakwetu basanu. Enga abacenjeshe kwambeti naboyo batakesa kumusena wa mapensho kuno.”
Nsombi Abulahamu walambeti, “abo bakute mabuku alalembwa ne Mose ne bashinshimi, kabanyumfwani byalembwamo.”
Nendi walakumbuleti, sobwe ta Abulahamu, na umbi ufuma kubafu nekuyako, mpobela kusanduka kubwipishi bwabo.
Abulahamu walamwambileti, “na nkabanyumfwilinga Mabala alalembwa ne Mose ne bashinshimi nteshi bakanyumfwepo nambi umbi akapunduke kubafu.”
Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Bintu bikute kulengesha muntu kwambeti aipishe nibikaboneke, nsombi mapensho nakabe pali bantu beshikubileta.
Nomba caina kwambeti muntu uyo asungwe ne libwe linene lya mwampelo munshingo ne kumuwala mu lwenje, kupita kulengesha umo wa bana bang'ana aba kwipisha.”
Neco kamucenjelani! Na mukwenu lakwipishili, umukalalile, na lasenge kulekelelwa umulekelele.
Na lakwipishili mankanda asanu ne abili pabusuba bumo, kayi mankanda onse ayo kesa kuli njobe nekwambeti, “Ndepishi,” Welela kumulekelela.
Lino batumwa balambila Mwami eti, “Kamukonempesha lushomo lwetu.”
Mwami Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nemwabanga ne lushomo lulyeti luseke lwa masitadi, ngamucikonsha kwambila citondo eti, ‘Shukuka apo ulishimpike mumulonga, nacoyo ngacimunyumfwila.’ ”
“Nomba naumbi pakati penu kakute musebenshi shikulima mulibala nambi kwembela mbelele. Nomba sena akomboka ngomwambila eti, ‘Fwambana kwesa ulye cakulya’
Sobwe nkela kwinseco! Nsombi ngomwambileti, ‘Kontelekela cakulya, na upwishe ufwale cena nekundetela byakulya, lino ndapwisha nenjobe mpoti ulye ne kunwa.’
Lino sena ngomulumba musebenshi pakwinga lenshi ncowamwambila?
Copeleco nenjamwe, na mulenshi ncomwalambilwa mwelela kwambeti, ‘To basebenshi babula kwelela kutambula kantu. Pakwinga tulenshi mulimo wetu!’ ”
Yesu mpwalikuya ku Yelusalemu, walapita panyinsa ya Samaliya ne Galileya.
Mpwalashika mumunshi naumbi, beshimankuntu bali likumi balamukumanya ne kwimana pataliko.
Lino balobelesheti, “Amwe Yesu, Nkambo kamutunyumfwilako nkumbo!”
Yesu mpwalababona walabambileti, “Kamuyani ku beshimilumbo baye bamuboneti mulaba cena.” Lino mpobalikuya kwenda munshila, balaba cena.
Lino umo pakati pabo mpwalaboneti laba cena, walabwelela kuli Yesu nkaya akulumbaisha Lesa ne liswi lyapelu.
Lino mpwalashika kuli Yesu walafukama kuntangu kwakendi ne kumulumba. Shimankuntu uyu walikuba mu Samaliya.
Lino Yesu walambeti, “Sena bashilikwa nkabanga likumi? Nomba bambi basanu ne bana balikupe?
Nomba nicani kulesowa muswamashi enka kwisa kulumbaisha Lesa?
Kufumapo, Yesu walambila shimankuntu uyo, pakwinga wanshoma nyamuka koya, Lushomo lwakobe lulakushiliki.”
Bafalisi bambi balepusha Yesu eti, “Bwami bwa Lesa nibukese lilyoni?” Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Bwami bwa Lesa, nteshi bukese mwakubonekela ne menso sobwe.
Kuliya weshi akambeti, ‘Nibuno bulikuno!’ Nambi eti, ‘Nibusa kusa!’ Pakwinga Bwami bwa Lesa buli pakati penu.”
Lino walakumbula beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Nicikashike cindi mpoti mukayande kubona Mwana Muntu mubusuba bumo, nomba nteshi mukabubonepo sobwe.
Nikukabe bantu beshi bakamwambileti, ‘Kamubona nte busa bulikusa, nambi eti, ubu bulipano, mutakayako nambi kubakonkela sobwe.’
Pakwinga mbuli kubyasha ncokukute kucilingana mwilu nekubonekela kumbasu shonse, enceti kukabe pabusuba bwakwisa Mwana Muntu.
Nsombi welela kutanguna kupenshewa, nekukanwa ne bantu ba cino cindi.
“Mbuli ncocalikuba mumasuba a Nowa encoti cikabe mumasuba a Mwana Muntu.
Mucindico bantu bali kabalya, ne kunwa, kweba kayi ne kwebwa kushikila busuba Nowa mbwalengila mubwato. Lino muyoba unene walesa nekubononga bonse.
Nicikabeti ncocalikuba mucindi ca Loti, bantu bali kabalya ne kunwa, kula ne kulisha, kubyala ne kwibaka manda.
Nsombi busuba Loti mpwalafuma mu Sodomu, Lesa walalasha mulilo wa salufa walalaka kwilu nekubononga bonse.
Nicikabe copeleco pabusuba Mwana Muntu mpoti akese.
“Busuba ubo, uyo eti akabenga paciluli ca ng'anda atakaseluketi amante bintu byakendi mung'anda, neye uyo eti akabenga mulibala atakabwelela kung'anda.
Kamwanukani muka Loti!
Uyo layandanga kupulusha buyumi bwakendi, nakabutaye. Nsombi uyo latayanga buyumi bwakendi pacebo cakame, nakabupulushe.
Ndamwambilinga pabusuba ubo mashiku, bantu babili nibakabenga bona pabulili bumo, umo nakamantwe, umbi nakashale.
Batukashi babili nibakapelenga pantu pamo umo nakamantwe, umbi nakashale.
Bantu babili nibakabenga mulibala, nsombi umo nakamantwe, umbi nakashale.”
Beshikwiya balamwipusheti, “Mwami, nikupeyo nkoti bikenshikile ibi?” Yesu walakumbuleti, “Uko kulafwili cintu nawoyo makubi akute kubungana kopeloko.”
Lino Yesu walabambila beshikwiya bakendi mukoshano, pakuyanda kubeyisha kwambeti bapailenga lyonse kwakubula kubwelela kunyuma.
Walambeti, “Kwalikuba mubeteshi mumunshi umbi walikubula kutina Lesa nambi kulemeka muntu.
Kwalikuba mukalubingi mutukashi mumunshi wopeloyo walikaya kuli shikubeteka ne kumusengeti, ‘Munyamfweko pa mulandu ngonkute ku mulwani wakame.’
Masuba alafula mubeteshi kakanowa, nsombi panyuma pakendi walayeya mwineti, necikaba kwambeti nkantini Lesa nambi kulemeka muntu,
pakwinga mukalubingi uyu landemeshe kunjobekela, nindimubetekele mulandu wakendi, kwambeti ngaundemesha kwisa kuno!”
Lino Mwami walambeti, “Nte mulanyumfu maswi amubeteshi wabula kululama usa.
Sena Lesa nteshi akabetekeshe mulandu wa balulama bakendi abo balamusengenga munshi ne mashiku? Sena nakalilwe kubanyamfwa?
Ndamwambilingeti nakafwambane kubabetekela mulandu wabo. Sena pakwisa Mwana Muntu nakacane bantu bakute lushomo panshi pano?”
Lino Yesu walamba mukoshano umbi kulyabo bali kabayeyeti balulama kupita bonse nekunyansha banabo.
Walambeti, “Kwalikuba bantu babili balaya akupaila ku Ng'anda ya Lesa. Umbi walikuba Mufalisi naumbi walikuba weshimisonko.
“Lino Mufalisi walanyamuka nekupaileti, ndamulumbunga obe Lesa, pakwinga ame nkandipo eti bantu nabambi bonse. Nabo nibantu babula kululama kayi ni bapombo. Kayi ndalumbu pakwinga kandipo eti uyu weshi kusonkesha musonko uyu.
Ndalikanishinga kulya mankanda abili munsondo, kayi nkute kubenga calikumi pabintu byonse mbyonkute kucana.
“Nsombi weshikusonkesha musonko usa walemana patali, liya kulangapo kwilu. Nsombi walikalyuma pantiti nekwambeti, Lesa, kamunyumfwilako inkumbo ame ndemwipishi.”
Yesu walabambileti, “Cancine ncine, weshimusonko walabwelela kucomwabo kali walulama pamenso a Lesa, mu Falisi neye liya. Pakwinga muntu uliyense weshi kulisumpula nakacepeshewe, nomba muntu weshi kulicepesha nakasumpulwe.”
Bantu nabambi balaleta bana bang'ana kuli Yesu kwambeti abike makasa akendi pabana nekubaleleka. Beshikwiya bakendi mpobalaboneco balabakalalila bantu abo balaleta bana.
Nsombi Yesu walakuwa bana nekwambeti. “Kamulekani bana bang'ana bese kuli njame, mutabakanishanga, pakwinga Bwami bwa Lesa ni bwa bantu balyeti bana aba.
Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti uyo labulunga kutambula Bwami Bwa Lesa eti mwana, cakubinga nteshi akengilemo.”
Mukulene wa Bayuda naumbi walepusha Yesu eti. “Bashikwiyisha baina, nomba ndelelela kwinseconi kwambeti nkatambule buyumi butapu?”
Yesu walepusheti, “Nomba nicani ncolambilico kwambeti ndaina? Kuliya muntu waina, nsombi Lesa enka.
Milawo uyinshi yeshi kwambeti, ‘Utensa bulale, utashina, kotaiba, utapa bukamboni bwabwepeshi, lemeka baiso ne banyoko.’”
Muntu uyo walakumbuleti, “Iyi Milawo yonse nkute kwikonka kufuma kubutwanike bwakame.”
Yesu mpwalanyumfweco, walamwambileti, “Kulashalowa cintu cimo ncowelela kwinsa. Koya ulishe byonse mbyokute, mali upe bapenga, lino nukabe nebuboni kwilu. Wenseco, wise unkonkele.”
Nsombi muntu usa mpwalanyumfweco, walongumana pakwinga walikuba ne mubile bwingi.
Yesu mpwalabona, kungumana kwa muntu usa walambeti, “Cayuma kwambeti bantu babile bakengile mu Bwami bwa Lesa.
Capuba kwambeti ngamila ingile mukamulyango ka nyeleti kupita muntu mubile kwingila mu Bwami bwa Lesa.”
Bantu balanyumfwa makani aya balepusheti, “Nomba niyani eti akapuluke?”
Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ibi bintu bitakonsheke nebantu, bikute kukonsheka ne Lesa.”
Lino Petulo walambeti, “Kamubona! Afwe twalashiya manda etu nekukonkela njamwe.”
Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga paliya muntu walashiya ng'anda, nambi mukashendi nambi bamakwabo nambi bashali bakendi nambi bana bakendi pacebo ca Bwami bwa Lesa,
eti akabule kutambula bintu bingi pacino cindi, kayi mucindi cilesanga nakatambule buyumi butapu.”
Yesu walamanta beshikwiya bakendi bali likumi ne babili kuya palubasu nekubambileti, “Tulenga ku Yelusalemu uko byonse byalalemba bashinshimi pa Mwana Muntu nkoti bikenshikile.
Pakwinga Mwana Muntu nakatwalwe mumakasa abantu bakunsa abo beshi bakamuwele, kumutukana, nekumusankila mata.
Nibakamukwipe nekumushina, nsombi pabusuba bwabutatu nakapundushiwe kubafu.”
Beshikwiya bakendi baliya kunyumfwishisha pamakani ayo. Maswi aya baliya kwanyumfwishisha pakwinga alikuba asolama kuli endibo, neco baliya kwinshiba ncali kwamba.
Yesu mpwalashika pepi ne Yeliko walacana mpofu kali wekala mumbali mwa nshila, kasengelela.
Lino mpofu uyo mpwalanyumfwa bantu bangi kabapita munshileyo, walepusheti, “Nicani cilenshikinga?”
Bantu balamwambileti, “Ni Yesu wa ku Nasaleti lapitinga.”
Lino walolobesheti, “Yesu mwana wa Dafeti konyumfwilako inkumbo!”
Lino bantu balikuba kutangu balamukalilila nekumwambileti mwena. Nsombi nendi walapitilisha kolobesheti, “Mwanendi Dafeti, konyumfwilako inkumbo!”
Neye Yesu walemana ne kwambila bantu eti bamulete kuli endiye. Mpwalashika pepi Yesu walamwipusheti,
nicani ncolandangeti nkwinshile? Neye walamukumbuleti, “Mwami, ndayandanga kwambeti ntatike kubona kayi.”
Lino Yesu walamwambileti, “Tatika kubona, pakwinga ulanshomo, lushomo lwakobe lulakushiliki.”
Pacindi copeleco walatatika kubona. Lino walakonkela Yesu nkaya kulumbaisha Lesa. Bantu bonse mpobalabona calenshika naboyo balalalumbaisha Lesa.
Yesu walengila mu Yeliko, nekupitilila.
Mu Yeliko mopelomo mwalikuba muntu wali kukwiweti Zakeyo. Walikuba shikusonkesha misonko mukulene, kayi walikuba mubile.
Walikuyandishisha kubona Yesu ncabele nomba walikuba mufupi, walalilwa kumubona pakwinga bantu balafulisha.
Neco walafwambila kuntangu ne kutanta mu citondo ca mukuyu kwambeti amubone, pakwinga Yesu empalikupitila popelapo.
Yesu mpwalashika pamusenapo walalanga kwilu nekumwambileti, “Zakeyo, fwambana seluka pakwinga ndelela kuya kwikala kung'anda yakobe lelo.”
Lino Zakeyo walaseluka cakufwambana nekutambula Yesu mwakukondwa.
Lino bantu bonse balabonako, balatatika kudandaula ne kwambeti, “Kamubonani muntu uyu lenga kwikala kung'anda ya muntu mwipishi.”
Nomba Zakeyo walanyamuka nekwambila Mwami eti, “Mwami,kamubonani, ninkape buboni bwakame kupa bapenshi. Na ndalamanta kantu kumuntu munshila yabula kwelela, ndimubweshele mankanda ana.”
Yesu walamwambileti, “Lelo kupuluka kulesa mung'anda ino, pakwinga muntu uyu neye nimwanendi Abulahamu.
Neco Mwana Muntu walesa kuyandaula nekupulusha bataika.”
Bantu kabacinyumfwa mbyalikwamba Yesu,walapitilisha kayi kubambila mukoshano pakwinga balashika pepi ku Yelusalemu. Nomba bantu bali kabayeyeti Bwami bwa Lesa buli pepi kwisa.
Lino walambeti, “Kwalikuba muntu, walikuba walemekwa uyo walaya kucishi ca kutali kuya kupewa bwami nekubwelela kayi.
Katanaya walakuwa basebenshi bakendi nekupa mali a golide likumi ku musebenshi umo ne umo” Nekubambileti, “kamwinsanga makwebo mpaka nkabwele.”
Lino bantu mbwalikwikala nabo mucishi umo nkabali kumuyanda, neco balatuma ntumwi kuya kucishico akwambeti, “Afwe nkatulayandanga muntu uyo kuba mwami wetu.”
“Necikabeco muntu uyo walaya kupewa bwami busa, lino mpwalabwela kwabo, walakuwa basebenshi bakendi abo mbwalapa mali kwambeti,bamwambile bwili mbwacanapo umo ne umo.”
Lino musebenshi mutanshi walesa walambeti, “Nkambo pamali ngomwalampa ndacaninipo bwili bwa mali ali likumi.”
Lino mwami wakendi walamwambileti, “Ulenshi cena, Omusebenshi waina! Pakwinga walashomeka mubintu bing'ana nube weshikwendelesha minshi ili likumi.”
Neye musebenshi wabubili walesa walambeti, “Mwami pamali asanu ngomwalampa ndacaninipo bwili bwa mali ali asanu.”
Mwami walamwambileti, “Obe nube weshikwendelesha minshi isanu.”
Lino musebenshi naumbi walesa walambeti, “Mwami, mali enu ndalasunga pakakwisa.
Ndalatina pakwinga mobakalu, mukute kutambula byabula byenu nekutebula mbyomwabula kubyala.”
Mwami wakendi walakumbuleti, “Obe musebenshi waipa! Lino ninkutoteke kwelana ne maswi ngolamba. Ucishi kwambeti ndemukalu, nkute kumanta byabula byakame nekutebula mpondabula kubyala.
Nomba uliya kubikila cani ku banki mali akame, kwambeti pakubwelela ncane bwili?”
“Lino walambila balikubapo eti, ‘Mulamuneni mali ayo mupe ukute mali likumi.’
Balo balambeti, ‘Mwami, uyo ukute kendi mali ali likumi.’
Nsombi mwami walakumbuleti, ndamwambilinga ukute kantu nakabikilwepo nabimbi, nsombi uyo ukute kang'ana nibakamunyongomone nako konse kankute.
Lino balwani bakame abo bali kuyandeti ame ntaba mwami wabo, kamubaleta kuno mubashine kambonako!”
Yesu mpwalapwisha kwambeco, walabatangunina kuya ku Yelusalemu.
Mpwalashika pepi ne minshi ya Betifagi ne Betaniya pepi ne mulundu wa maolifi walatuma beshikwiya bakendi babili,
Nekubambileti, “Kamuyani mumunshi usa ngomulabononga. Mwashika, nimucane mwana wambongolo kali wasungwa uyo utana utantwapo kendi ne bantu, muye mumusungulule, mumulete kuno.
Na umbi muntu amwipusheti, ‘Mulamusungulilinga cani’ Mumwambileti, ‘Mwami ukute nendi incito.’”
Nicakubinga beshikwiya babili basa balaya kucana mbuli ncalabamba Yesu.
Mpobali kusungulula mbongolo, bene balepusheti, “Nomba mulamusungulwilinga cani?”
Nabo balakumbuleti, “Mwami ukute nendi incito.”
Lino balatwala mbongolo kuli Yesu, nekutatika kuyansa byakufwala byabo pelu nekumutantikapo Yesu.
Lino Yesu mpwalikuya kali watanta mbongolo, bantu balayansa byakufwala byabo munshila kulesha bulemu kulyendiye.
Mpwalashika pepi neku Yelusalemu mwinshi mwa mulundu wa maolifi, likoto linene lya beshikwiya bali kabamukonkela balatatika kukondwa. Kayi balumbaisha Lesa ne maswi a pelu pacebo ca incito ya ngofu njobalabona.
Balambeti, “Walelekwa Mwami uyo lesanga mulina lya Lesa. Lumuno kwilu ne bulemu bube kuli Lesa.”
Lino Bafalisi nabambi balikuba mulikoto balambila Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, kamwambilani beshikwiya benu bamwene.”
Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ndamwambilinga na aba bamwene, mabwe nawo nawolobeshe.”
Lino Yesu mpwalashika pepi nekubona Yelusalemu, walalila.
Walambeti, “Na obe newalenshiba lelo, bintu byeshikuleta lumuno! Nsombi nkobishi pakwinga menso akobe nkela kubibona.
Necikabeco nicikashike cindi balwani bakobe mpoti bakakushinguluke nekukushinkila konse konse.
Nibakakumwayaule nekushina bantu bakobe bonse. Nteshi bakashiye libwe pelu palinendi, pakwinga uliyawa kwishiba cindi Lesa ncalesa akukupulusha.”
Yesu walengila mu Ng'anda ya Lesa nekutatika kutandanyamo abo bali kabolisha mukati mulubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa,
walabambileti, “Calembwa Mumabala a Lesa kwambeti, ‘Ng'anda yakame nikakwiweti Ng'anda yakupaililamo.’ Nsombi amwe mulaisandulu kuba ng'anda mwakuyubila bakapondo!”
Lino Yesu walikeyisha lyonse mu Ng'anda ya Lesa. Nomba bamakulene beshimilumbo, beshikwiyisha Milawo ne batangunishi ba Bayuda balikuyanda kumushina,
Lino balabula cakwinsa pakwinga bantu bonse balikuba nendi cindi conse kwambeti banyumfwe maswi akendi.
Nabumbi busuba Yesu mpwalikwiyisha nekukambauka Mulumbe Waina mu Ng'anda ya Lesa, bamakulene beshimilumbo, beshikwiyisha Milawo kayi ne bamakulene ba Bayuda balesa.
Balepusheti, “Kotwambila, nomba ningofucini nshokute pakwinsa bintu ibi? Wakupa ngofu shakwinsa ibi bintu niyani?”
Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nenjame ndamwipushunga mwipusho umo. Kamungambilani,
Nomba niyani walapa Yohane ngofu shakubatisha? Sena ni Lesa nambi nibantu?”
Nabo balatatika kwipushana bonka eti, “Na twambeti, ni Lesa, nendi natwipusheti, ‘Nomba nicani muliya kumushoma?
Lino na twambeti, nibantu, bantu bonse nibatuwale mabwe pakwinga bacinsheti Yohane walikuba mushinshimi.”
Neco balakumbuleti, “Nkatucinshi na walashifunya kupeyo.”
Lino Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nenjame anu nteshi ndimwambile uyo walampa ngofu shakwinsa bintu ibi.”
Lino Yesu walapitilisha kubambila bantu mukoshanyo eti, Kwalikuba muntu walalima libala lyaminyansa ne kulibwelekesha balimi, lino walaya pabulwendo bwa kucishi nacimbi, uko nkwalekala cindi citali.
Mpocalashika cindi cakutebula bisepo, muntu uyo, walatuma musebenshi wakendi kubalimi abo kwambeti bamupeko bisepo byamulibala lyakendi. Nsombi balimi abo balekata musebenshi uyo nekumuma nekumutandanya kwabula kumupapo kantu.
Mwine libala walatumako naumbi musebenshi. Neye balamuma, ne kumusebanya, kayi nekumutandanya kwakubula kantu mumakasa.
Lino walatumako naumbi wabutatu, nsombi neye balamupwayaula nekumutaila kunsa.
Lino mwine libala uyo walambeti, “Ninjiseconi lino? Anu nintumeko mwaname ngonsunishi mpani nendi nibenga bamupe bulemu.”
Nsombi balimi abo mpobalamubona, balatatika kwambilaneti, “Uyu endiye weshi akapyane buboni bonse, katumushina kwambeti buboni bonse bukabe bwetu.”
Neco balamukwelela pansa pa libala nekumushina. Lino Yesu walabepusheti, “Nomba nicani nceshi akense mwine libala kubalimi abo?
Nakese akubashina balimi abo nekupa bambi libala ilyo.” Bantu basa mpobalanyumfweco balambeti, “Citakenshika.”
Yesu walabalangishisha nekubepusheti, lino malembo ayo akute kwamba cani? “Libwe ilyo ndyobalakana beshikwibaka, lyalaba elibwe lya pakona pa ng'anda lyayandika.
Muntu uliyense weshi akawile pa libwe ili nakatyokauke. Nsombi uyo weshi likamulakile, nakasansauke.”
Beshikwiyisha Milawo ne bamakulene beshimilumbo bali kuyanda kwikata Yesu pacindi copeleco pakwinga balenshibeti Yesu walikwamba endibo mumukoshanyo uyo. Nsombi balatina bantu balikubapo.
Neco nabo balikabalangaula cindi caina, balatuma bantu kwambeti bamweleshe, palikulibonesheti balulama mung'ambilo yabo kwambeti bamuteye kose mukwamba, kwambeti benga bamubepeshele kuli bendeleshi, pakwinga neye walikukute ngofu ne bwendeleshi bonse.
Bantu abo balepusha Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, tucinshi kwambeti mukute kwamba ne kwiyisha byalulama. Nkamukute kulanga eti uyu niyani. Nsombi mukute kwiyisha Milawo ya Lesa cancine ncine.
Kamutwambila, sena Milawo ya Lesa yasuminisha kubenga musonko ku mwami waku Loma, nambi nkayasuminisha?”
Nomba Yesu walenshiba miyeyo yabo yaipa walabambileti,
“Kamundesha mali, nomba cinso ne lina lilipo nilyabani?” Balakumbuleti, “Byonse nibya mwami waku Loma.”
Lino neye walakumbuleti, “Kamubengani ku mwami waku Loma bintu byakendi, Neco neye Lesa mupeni bintu byakendi.”
Neco balalilwa kucana mulandu mulibyo mbyalamba pamenso abantu. Lino balapwilwa mano pakukumbula kwa Yesu, balamwenowa tonto.
Basaduki nabambi balesa kuli Yesu. Bantu aba bali kwambeti bantu bafwa nteshi bakapundukepo. Balamwipusha Yesu eti,
“Bashikwiyisha, Mose watulembela Milawo yakwambeti, Na muntu lafu, nekushiya mukashendi, kwakubula mwana, mukwabo welela kumweba mukalubingi kwambeti asemenemo bana bamukwabo uyo walafwa.”
Lino kwalikuba batuloba basanu ne babili pamukowa, mukulene bantu waleba mukashi, nsombi walafwa katana asemenamo mwana.
Neye wabubili walamupyana mukashi nomba neye walafwa katana asemenamo mwana,
Wabutatu walamupyana neye walafwa katana asemenamo mwana. Lino bonse basa basanu ne babili balapwa kufwa kwakubula kusemenamo bana mumutukashi uyo.
Kumapwilisho, mukashi uyo walafwa neye.
“Lino pabusuba bwakupunduka kubafu, mukashi uyo nakabe muka bani? Pakwinga bonse bamukowa basanu ne babili balikuba balamwebepo.”
Yesu walakumbuleti, “Bantu bacino cindi bakute kweba nekwebwa.
Nsombi abo beti bakapundushiwe kubafu nekwikala mubuyumi bulesanga, nteshi bakebanenga.
Nabo nibakekalengeti bangelo, kayi nteshi bakafwepo. Balo nibakabe bana ba Lesa pakwinga balapunduku kubafu.
Nomba pamakani akupunduka kubafu, neye Mose walambapo, pamakani a cifukusa cisa calikubangila mulilo, pakwinga Mwami walambeti, ‘Ni Lesa wa Abulahamu ni Lesa wa Isaki kayi ni Lesa wa Yakobo.’
Anu ekwambeti nte Lesa wa bantu bafwa, nsombi Lesa ni Lesa wabantu bayumi, pakwinga pamenso akendi bantu bonse nibayumi.”
Beshikwiyisha Milawo nabambi balakumbuleti, “Bashikwiyisha mulamba cena”
Neco baliya kuyanda kumwipushapo Yesu mipusho naimbi.
Yesu walabepusheti, “nipacebo cini bantu bakute kwambeti Mupulushi Walaiwa nimwanendi Dafeti?”
Pakwinga Dafeti mwine mulibuku lya kutembaula walambeti, “Mwami walambila Mwami wakame eti, Ikala kulikasa lyakame lyakululyo
kushikila nkasandule balwani bakobe, bakabe pakulyata myendo yakobe.”
“Na Dafeti mwine walamukuweti, Mwami, nomba ngobeconi mwanendi?”
Bantu bonse mpobalikunyumfwa mbyalikwamba Yesu, nendi walabambila beshikwiya bakendi eti,
“Kamucenjelani ne beshikwiyisha Milawo. Nabo basuni kwendana kabalibafwala minganjo itali, kwambeti bantu babapenga mitende yabulemu mumisena yamakwebo. Basuni kwikala pabipuna byabulemu mung'anda yakupaililamo ne mumisena yamalyalya.
Nomba ebakute kulamuna manda bamukalubingi, ne kupaila mipailo itali itali kwambeti bantu bababone. Cakubinga Lesa nakabape mulandu kupita bantu nabambi balabulunga kwinseco.”
Yesu walalangishisha, walabona bantu babile kababika bipo byabo mucakubikamo bipo byamali mu Ng'anda ya Lesa.
Walabona mutukashi mukalubingi kabikamo tumali tubili.
Lino Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga uyu mukalubingi wapenga labikimo bupe bwapitapo bambi bonse.
Pakwinga bonse aba, balafunyu pa mali angi ngobakute, nsombi neye mubupenshi bwakendi labikimo mali onse ngakutenga mung'anda yakendi.”
Beshikwiya nabambi bali kabamba pamakani a Ng'anda ya Lesa eti balaibaka ne mabwe eshikuboneka cena, kayi nebipo byakutwala kuli Lesa. Lino Yesu walambeti,
“Ibi byonse mbyomulabononga, nicikashike cindi mpoti kukabule libwe nambi limo lyeti likashale palibwe linendi, mabwe onse nakamwayaulwe.”
Lino beshikwiya balepusha Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, nomba ibi nibikenshike lilyoni? Kayi nitukenshibile kucani eti bintu byonse ibi bili pepi kwinshika?”
Yesu walambeti, “Kamucenjelani kwambeti kutakaba muntu naba umo eti akamubepe. Pakwinga bantu bangi balakesanga mulina lyakame kabambeti, ‘Njame Mupulushi usa Walaiwa.’ Kayi eti, ‘cindi cilashiki.’ Mutakabakonkela.
Mwakanyumfwa makani a nkondo kayi nebimfulunganya mubishi, mutakatina. Ibi bintu byelela kutanguna kwinshika, nomba nteko kwambeti mapwililisho a cishi alashiki.”
Lino Yesu walapitilisha kubambileti, “Bishi nibikalwane ne bishi nabimbi, nayoyo mishobo nikabukilane ne mishobo inabo.
Nikukabe mikukumo iyosha. Nikukabe nsala, malwashi ne lulanga mumisena yapusana pusana. Nikukenshike bintu byeshikuyosha nebingashilo byeshikukankamanisha kwilu.
“Nsombi byonse ibi kabitana binshika, nimukasungwe nekupenshewa. Nimukatwalwe mumanda akupaililamo, nimukabetekwe nekubikwa mujele. Nimukatwalwe ku bami ne baleli pacebo ca njame.
Ici nicikabe cindi caina ca kukambauka Mulumbe Waina.
Lino mutakasukama mumyoyo kuyeyeti nitwambe cani pamulanduyu.
Pakwinga ninkamupe maswi a mano cakwambeti kuliya mulwani wenu eti akacikonshe kukana nambi kutoteka.
Ne bamashali benu bonse, bamakwenu, beshikamukowa, nebanenu, nibakamutwale kubalwani benu, bambi pakati penu nibakamushine.
Bantu bonse nibakamupate pacebo ca njame.
Necikabeco kuliya mushishi nambi umo wenu weshi ukataike.
Mukalimbikile cakubula kubwelela munyuma nimukatambule buyumi bwenu.”
Mwakaboneti munshi wa Yelusalemu ulashingulukwa ne beshi nkondo, mukenshibeti konongeka kwawo kulashiki.
Lino abo bali mu Yudeya bakafwambile kumilundu, abo beshi bakabenga mukati mu Yelusalemu bakapulemo, balikumabala kabatakengila mu Yelusalemu.
Pakwinga ici nicikabe cindi cacisubulo, kwambeti byonse bisa byalalembwa mumabala bikenshike.
Batukashi beti bakabenga ne mabunda nibakabe mumapensho, nabo beshi bakabenga ne bana balayamwanga mumasubayo. Pakwinga nikukabe mapensho anene mucishici, kayi ne bukalu bwa Lesa nibukabe pabantu bamu Isilaeli.
Nabambi nibakayaswe bibeshi kayi nibakamantwe busha kubantu bamishobo imbi. Lino Yelusalemu nikalyataulwe ne baswamashi kushikila cindi cabo cikapwe.
“Kulakabanga bingashilo kulisuba ne kumwenshi ne kunyenyenshi. Pacishi pano, bantu nibakalisukame nekutina pakunyumfwa kuwota kwa lwenje ne mankape.
Bantu nibakawisuke ne buyowa pakulangilila bilandanga kwinshika mucishi ca panshi conse, pakwinga ngofu sha kwilu nishikatenkanishiwe.
Lino nibakabone ame nde Mwana Muntu kanjisa mumakumbi nengofu kayi nebulemu bunene.
Lino bintu ibi byakatatika kwinshika, mukanyamuke nekwinuna mitwi yenu, pakwinga kulubulwa kwenu kulasenene pepi.”
Lino Yesu walabambila mukoshano eti, “Kamulangani mukuyu nebitondo bimbi byonse.
Na mulabono matewu atatiki kusonsa mukute kwishibeti cilimo cili pepi.
Copeleco nenjamwe mwakabona bintu ibi kabinshika mukenshibe kwambeti Bwami bwa Lesa buli pepi.
“Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti musemano uwu nteti ukapwe kufwa bintu ibi kabitana binshika.
Kwilu ne cishi ca panshi nibikapite, nsombi maswi akame nteshi akapwepo ngofu sobwe.”
“Kamucenjelani kwambeti mutaba bantu basuni kulya ne kusekelela malyalya, nekukolwa kayi nekusukama pa bintu bya buyumi buno, pakwinga busuba ubo ngabwisa mwakutenshiba eti kose.
Nibukese bushikubo pabantu bonse bekala pa cishi capanshi
Ikalani mwalibambila lyonse, nekupaila cindi conse, kwambeti mube nengofu shakupuluka kubintu ibi byeshibikeshike, kwambeti mukemane pamenso pa Mwana Muntu.”
Masuba ayo, Yesu walikeyisha mu Ng'anda ya Lesa, nsombi mashiku lyonse walikuya ku mulundu wa maolifi akwikala.
Lino mumenemene bantu bangi bali kabaya ku Ng'anda ya Lesa kuya kukutika kwiyisha kwakendi.
Bushiku bwakukondwa bwa kulya shinkwa wabula cishikufufumusha, ubo bwalikukwiweti Pasika mpobwalashika pepi.
Bamakulene beshimilumbo, ne beshikwiyisha Milawo balikabayandaula nshila yakushininamo Yesu. Nomba bali kutina bantu.
Lino Satana walengila muli Yudasi, walikukwiweti Isikalyoti, uyo walikuba umo wa beshikwiya bali likumi ne babili ba Yesu.
Neco Yudasi walaya kupangana ne bamakulene beshimilumbo ne beshikwendelesha Ng'anda ya Lesa ncobela kwinsa kwambeti amuyabe Yesu kulyendibo.
Lino balakondwa, kayi balasuminishana kumulipila mali.
Yudasi walasumina ne kutatika kuyandaula cindi caina cakumuyabilapo, bantu bonse kabatacinshi.
Bwalashika busuba bwakukondwa bwakulya shinkwa wakutafufumusha, busuba bwakushina twana twambelele twakulya pabusuba bwa Pasika.
Lino Yesu walatuma Petulo ne Yohane ne kubambileti, “Kamuyani mutubambile byakulya bya pabusuba bwa Pasika kwambeti tulye.”
Balo balamwipusheti, “Nikupeyo nkomulayandanga kwambeti twenga tubambile?”
Yesu walabambileti, “Kamunyumfwani! mwengila mu Yelusalemu nimucane mutuloba wanyamuna nongo ya menshi, mu mukonkele mpaka mung'anda moshi engile.
Lino mu mwambile mwine ng'andeti, Bashikwiyisha balepushungeti, ‘Nomba cili kupeyo cipinda moshi balyele byakulya bya Pasika ne beshikwiya babo’
Lino na amuboneshe cipinda cinene ca pelu cabambiwa cena, mopelomo emoti mutubambile byakulya.”
Lino balaya kucana bintu byonse mbuli mwalabambilila Yesu. Lino balatatika kubamba byakulya bya Pasika.
Lino mpocalashika cindi cakulya Yesu walekala pa tebulu pamo ne batumwa bakendi kwambeti balye.
Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Ndayandishishanga kulya Pasika pamo nenjamwe nkantana kutatika kupenshewa.
Ndamwambilinga cakubinga nteshi nkalyepo Pasika, kushikila cikakwanilishiwe mu Bwami bwa Lesa.”
Lino Yesu mpwalamanta nkomeshi nekulumba Lesa, walabambileti, “Kamutambulani munwe mwense.
Lino ndamwambilinga kufuma lelo nteshi nkanwepo waini, kushikila Bwami bwa Lesa bukese.”
Kufumapo Yesu walamanta shinkwa, walalumba Lesa, nekukomona nekupa beshikwiya bakendi nekwambeti, “Uyu emubili wakame ulayabwa cebo canjamwe. Kamwinsanga ici lyonse pakunganukila.”
Copeleco mpobalapwisha kulya mulalilo, Yesu walapa beshikwiya bakendi nkomeshi nekubambileti, “Nkomeshi iyi nicipangano calino lino ca Lesa, nemilopa yakame yeshi iketike pacebo cenu.
“Nsombi kamubona! Uyo lanjabanga kubalwani lalinga pamo nenjame patebulu pano.
Pakwinga Mwana Muntu nakafwe kwelana ne kuyanda kwa Lesa. Nsombi muntu lamuyabanga Mwana Muntu nakapenge. Caina muntuyo nalabula kusemwa.”
Lino beshikwiya balatatika kulipusheti, nomba welakwinseco niyani pakati petu.
Lino beshikwiya balatatika kupikishaneti, “Inga niyani mukulene pakati petu?”
Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Bami ba bantu bakunsa bakute ngofu pabantu babo kayi bakute kulyela masuku pamutwi bantu, bakute kukwiweti, ‘Beshikwinsa byaina kubantu.’
Nsombi pakati penu citabanga mushoboyu. Cakubinga mukulene pali amwe abe weshikulicepesha kupita bonse, neye weshi kwendelesha abe musha wenu.
Nomba mukulene niyani? Sena ni usa lalinga pa tebulu na ni musha? Sena nte usa lalyelenga pa tebulu? Nomba ame ndilyeti musha pakati penu.
“Amwe mulekala nenjame mumasunko akame onse.
Lino copeleco, mbuli ba Ta ncobalampa ngofu shakwendelesha, nenjame nindimupeni ngofu.
Nimukalye ne kunwa pamo nenjame, kayi nimukekale pabipuna bya Bwami ne kubeteka mishobo likumi ne ibili ya ba Isilaeli.”
“Shimoni, Shimoni, nyumfwa! Satana layandanga kumupupulusha mumasunko mbuli mulimi ncakute kupupulusha maila.
Nsombi ndakupailili kwambeti lushomo lwakobe lutapwa. Lino obe wakatembenuka mumuyo ukayuminishe banobe.”
Nsombi Petulo walakumbuleti, “Mwami, ame ndalibambila kuya nenjamwe mujele nambi kufwa.”
Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ndakwambilinga Petulo, lelo kombwe nkatana alila, nunkane mankanda atatu eti nkonjinshipo.”
Yesu walepusha beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Pasa mpondalamutuma nkamubulile mpotomona, cola nambi nkwabilo nomba nicani ncomwapengapo?” Balo balakumbuleti, “Kuliyawa.”
Lino walabambileti, “Muntu uliyense ukute mpotomona nambi cola, anyamune. Neye uyo wabula mupeni, aulishe byakufwala byakendi kwambeti aule mupeni.
Cakubinga celela kwinshika calalembwa Mumabala eti, ‘Neye balamubelengela pamo ne babwipishi.’ Ndamwambilingeti Mabala aya alenshikinga cancinencine.”
Beshikwiya balambeti, “Kamubona Mwami tukute bibeshi bibili,” Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Ni ningi byopelebyo.”
Yesu walafumamo mu Yelusalemu nekuya ku mulundu wa maolifi mbuli ncalikwinsa lyonse. Naboyo beshikwiya bakendi balamukonkela.
Mpwalashika pamusena uyo Yesu walabambileti, “Kamupailani kwambeti mutengila mumasunko.”
Lino Yesu walabashiya, walendako pang'ana walafukama nekupaila.
Walambeti, “Bata, na musuni kamufunyani nkomeshi ya mapensho iyi. Necikabeco mutensa kuyanda kwakame, nsombi mwinse kuyanda kwenu.”
Lino mungelo wakwilu walesa kumuyuminisha.
Pacebo cakupenshewa mumoyo, walapaila cangofu kupita pakutanguna. Lino inkasalo yakendi yalikubeti mandondo a milopa alakanga panshi.
Mpwalafuma akupaila walabwelela kuli beshikwiya bakendi. Walacana nkabalibona pacebo ca miyeyo,
Yesu walabepusheti, “Nipacebo cini mona tulo? Kamupundukani mupaile kwambeti mutengila mumasunko.”
Yesu nkacamba, likoto lya bantu, lyalesa kalili lyatanguninwa ne Yudasi, umo wabeshikwiya likumi nebabili. Walesa pepi walamupa mutende ne kumushonshota.
Nsombi Yesu walamwambileti, “Yudasi, sena ulayabanga Mwana Muntu kupitila mukumushonshota?”
Lino beshikwiya balikuba ne Yesu mpobalabona calikwinshika balepusha Yesu eti, “Mwami, Se tubayase ne bibeshi?”
Lino umo wa beshikwiya walatimbula litwi lya kululyo lya musebenshi wa mukulene wa beshimilumbo bonse.
Nsombi Yesu walambeti, “Cilekeni kwinseco.” Popelapo Yesu walekata litwi lya muntu uyo nekumushilika.
Yesu walambila bonse abo balesa kumwikata, bamakulene ba beshimilumbo nebamukulene baba kamulonda ba Ng'anda ya Lesa, kayi nebamakulene ba Bayuda. Walabepusheti, “Sena mulenshi kwisa ne mipeni nemingwala eti nde kapondo?
Ndalikuba nenjamwe mu Ng'anda ya Lesa lyonse, nomba muliya kunjikatapo. Lino cino cindi nicenu ca ngofu sha mwami wa mushinshe.”
Lino balekata Yesu nekumutwala kung'anda ya mukulene wa beshimilumbo bonse. Neye Petulo walikakonkela Yesu capatali.
Lino balakunka mulilo pakati palubansa lwang'anda, bonse balekala panshi pamo. Neye Petulo walekala pakati pabo.
Lino mutukashi umo wa basebenshi mpwalabona Petulo kayota mulilo wamulangishisha, ne kwambeti, “Uyu neye walikuba ne Yesu.”
Nsombi Petulo nendi walakana nekwambeti, “Sobwe obe mutukashi nkandimwinshipo uyu ame.”
Mpopalapita kacindi kang'ana mutuloba naumbi neye walamubona Petulo nekumwambileti, “Obe njobe umo wabasa.” Nomba Petulo walakumbuleti, “Ntamepo sobwe.”
Mpopalapita kacindi kanda kukwana ola umo naumbi muntu walamba cangofu eti, “Nicakubinga muntu uyu walikuba ne Yesu pakwinga nimwine Galileya.”
Petulo walakumbuleti, “Ayo makani ngolambanga nkandainshi ame nambi pang'ana.” Lino petulo kacamba, kombwe walalila.
Mwami Yesu walafutatuka nekulangilisha Petulo. Lino nendi Petulo walanuka maswi a Mwami Yesu ngalamwambileti, “Kombwe nkatana alila lelo, obe Petulo nunkane mankanda atatu.”
Lino Petulo walafuma pansa, walalila cebo ca cikonko ncali kukute mumoyo.
Lino bantu balikulonda Yesu, balatatika kumuseka nekumuma.
Balamufweka pamenso, balamuma nekumwipusheti, “Lotela, nomba niyani lakumu?”
Kayi balamba maswi angi akumucobola.
Mpobwalaca bamakulene ba Bayuda, ne beshimilumbo, kayi ne beshikwiyisha Milawo balabungana. Balamumanta Yesu nekuya nendi kunkuta yabo.
Balamwipusheti, “Twambile na njobe Mupulushi Walaiwa usa.” Nsombi nendi walabakumbuleti, “Nambi ndimwambile, nteshi mushome sobwe,
na ndimwipushe mwipusho, nteshi munkumbulepo.
Kufuma lelo ame nde Mwana Muntu nimbenga ndekala kulikasa lyakululyo kwa Lesa wangofu shonse.”
Lino bonse balepusheti, “Sena ulambangeti njobe Mwanendi Lesa?” Neye walakumbuleti, “Ee njame mbuli ncomulamba mobene.”
Balo balambeti, “Sena lino inga katuciyandola nabambi bakamboni? Tulalinyufwili kendi ncalamba mwine.”
Bantu bangi balanyamuka, nekutwala Yesu kuli Pilato.
Lino balatatika kumubepeshela Yesu eti, “Twalamucana muntu uyu kayungaula bantu ba mushobo wetu. Walikwambila bantu eti tucileke kusonka musonko kuli mwami wa ku Loma. Kayi ukute kwambeti ni Mupulushi Walaiwa kayi eti emwami.”
Lino Pilato walamwipusha Yesu eti, “Sena njobe, Mwami wa ba Yuda?” Yesu walakumbuleti, “Mulamba mobene.”
Pilato walambila bamakulene beshimilumbo nebantu bonse basa eti, “Ame kuliya mulandu ngondacana pa muntu uyu.”
Nsombi balo balayuminina kumubepeshela kabambeti, “Layungaulunga ne kufulunganya bantu pakwiyisha kwakendi mucishi conse ca Yudeya. Walatatikila ku Galileya lino mpaka lashiki ne kuno.”
Pilato mpwalanyumfweco walepusheti, “Sena uyu muntu nimwine Galileya?”
Lino mpwalanyumfwa kwambeti Yesu ukute kufuma mucishi ncalikwendelesha Helode, walamutuma kuli Helode uyo walikuba mu Yelesalemu pa cindico.
Helode mpwalabona Yesu walakondwa, pakwinga lyonse walikunyumfwa mbili yakendi. Neco walikuyanda kumubona. Walikuyandishisha kwambeti akamubonepo kensa cikankamanisho.
Neco Helode walamwipusha mipusho ingi, nsombi Yesu nendi liya kumukumbulapo ciliconse.
Bamakulene beshimilumbo ne beshikwiyisha ba Milawo balesa pepi nekutatika kumubepesha cangofu.
Helode nebashilikali bakendi balamuseka Yesu ne kumunyansha. Lino balamufwalika cakufwala cabwami, nekumubwesha kuli Pilato.
Kufuma busuba ubo Helode ne Pilato balatatika kunyumfwana pakwinga balikuba bapatana.
Lino Pilato walabunganya bamakulene beshimilumbo ne beshikwendelesha kayi ne bantu bonse.
Lino walabambileti, “Uyu muntu mulamulete kuli njameti nkayungaula bantu, lino ame ndamwipushu mwense kamulipo, ndacana kwambeti liya mulandu pamakani onse ngomwa mwambanga.
Helode neye liya kucanapo mulandu pali uyu muntu, weco neye lamubweshe kuli afwe. Kamubona uyu muntu liya kwinsapo mulandu wakufwilapo.
Neco ndimukwipowa ne kumusungulula.”
Nomba Pilato lyonse walikubasungululila kayili umo pabusuba bwa Pasika.
Nsombi bonse bantu balolobesha pamo eti, “Ashinwe muntu uyu, mutusungwilile Balabasi.”
Balabasi uyu walasungwa pakwinga walapanga cimfulunganya mucishi ne kushina bantu.
Nsombi Pilato walikuyanda kumusungulula Yesu, neco walamba nabo bantu basa kayi.
Nomba nabo balolobesheti, “Mupopeni palusanda! Mupopeni!”
Pilato walabambila bantu kabutatu eti, nomba lenshi cani caipa uyu? Ame ndacana kwambeti liya mulandu ngwelakufwilapo. Neco ndimukwipowa nekumusungulula.
Nsombi bonse bayuminina kolobesheti, “Welela kupopwa palusanda.” Lino Pilato walakomwa kumaswi ayo.
Neco Pilato walapingula kwelana ne ncobalikusenga bantu baseti cinshike.
Pilato walasungulula Balabasi uyo walaleta cimfulunganya nekushina bantu ngobalasenga. Yesu bamwinse kwelana mbuli kuyanda kwabo.
Bashilikali balamumanta Yesu kwambeti benga bamupope. Balakumana ne Shimoni waku Kulene, nkafuma muminshi. Balamwikata nekumunyamwisha lusanda kwambeti akonkenga panyuma pa Yesu.
Bantu bangi balikumukonkela. Pakati pabo palikuba batukashi bali kabalila nekunyumfwa kwipilwa pacebo ca Yesu.
Lino Yesu walapilibuka ne kubambileti, “Amwe mobatukashi ba ku Yelusalemu mutalilila ame sobwe, nsombi mulilile mobene kayi ne bana benu.
Pakwinga masuba nakashike bantu mpoti bakambengeti, ‘Bakute colwe batukashi balabula kusemapo nekuyamwishapo!’
Pacindico nibakasenge malundu eti, ‘Kamutuwila’ Kayi netucina eti, ‘Tufwekeleleni.’
Nomba lino na kulico kulinjame ndecitondo catontola, nomba nikukabeconi kuli njamwe mobitondo byayuma?”
Balamanta ba kapondo babili kwambeti benga bapopwe pamo ne Yesu.
Mpobalashika kumusena walikukwiweti cifupa ca mutwi, balapopa Yesu palusanda. Kopeloko balapopako bakapondo basa palusanda, umbi kululyo naumbi kucipiko.
Yesu walambeti, “Ta, kamubalekelela pakwinga nkabacinshi ncobalenshinga.” Lino balensa nsolo nekuyabana byakufwala byakendi.
Bantu balikuba bemana popelapo kabebela. Nomba bamakulene ba Bayuda abo kabaweluluka Yesu nekwambeti, “Walapulusha bambi, lino neye alipulushe mwine, na ni Mupulushi uyo Walaiwa ne Lesa.”
Bashilikali naboyo balamuseka, balesa pepi nekumupa waini wasasa eti anwe.
Nekumwambileti, “Na njobe Mwami wa Bayuda, lipulushe omwine.”
Pelu palusanda palikuba palembweti, “Uyu emwami wa ba Yuda.”
Kapondo umo walikuba wapopwa pamo ne Yesu, walamucobola Yesu eti, “Sena ntobe mupulushi washomeshewa? Lipulushe nenjafwe utupulushe.”
Nsombi umbi walakalilila munendi nekumwambileti, “Sena obe nkotini Lesa? Tulapopwa pamo twense mu mapensho.
Nsombi afwe tobabili twelela kupopwa pakwinga tulatambulunga cilambo celela pa bintu mbyotwalikwinsa. Lino uyu neye kuliya caipa ncalensapo.”
Lino walambila Yesu eti “Mukanganuke mwakesa mu Bwami bwenu.”
Lino Yesu walamwambileti, “Cakubinga ndakwambilinga lelo, nukekale nenjame mu Paladaiso.”
Lino cindi mpocalashika pa 12 koloko, kwalaba mushinshe pacishi conse kushikila 3 koloko,
lino cikwisa calikucala mu Ng'anda ya Lesa calatwamuka pakati.
Lino Yesu walolobesha ne liswi lya pelu eti, “Ta mushimu wakame ndaubiki mumakasa enu.” Mpwalapwisha kwambeco, walafwa.
Mukulene wa bashilikali mpwalaboneco, walalumbaisha Lesa, ne kwambeti, “Nicakubinga uyu muntu walikuba walulama.”
Naboyo bantu bangi balikuba babungana kabebela, mpobalabona calenshika balabwelela kumanda kwabo nkabayakulyuma pantiti ne kungumana.
Bantu bonse balikumwinshiba Yesu, ne batukashi basa balamukonkela baku Galileya, balemana patali kababona byonse byalenshika.
Kwalikuba muntu walikukwiweti Yosefe walikwikala mumushi wa Alimateya mucishi ca Yudeya. Walikuba umo wamulibunga lya Nkuta inene ya Bayuda, walikuba muntu uli cena walemekwa
nendi wali kupembelela kwisa kwa Bwami bwa Lesa.
Uyu muntu walaya ku musenga Pilato citumbi ca Yesu.
Lino walaselusha citumbi palusanda ne kupombela mucikwisa caina, walamubika mu cumbwe ca mulibwe umo mwalikuba mutana mubikwapo muntu uliyense.
Bwalikuba busuba bwakulibambila pakwinga busuba bwa Sabata bwalikuba pepi kutatika.
Batukashi baku Galileya basa balikukonkela Yesu balaya ne Yosefe akubona cumbwe mwalabika citumbi ca Yesu.
Balabwelela ku ng'anda a kubamba mafuta anunkila cena. Lino pabusuba bwa Sabata, balapumwina kwelana ne Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose.
Lino mumenemene pa busuba bwa pa Sondo, batukashi abo balanyamuna mafuta ne byanunkila mbyobalabamba kuya kucumbwe.
Balacana libwe lyakunkulushiwapo pacishinga ca cumbwe.
Nomba mpobalengila mucumbwe baliya kucanamo citumbi ca Mwami Yesu.
Kabacikankamana, balabonowa bantu babili balikuba bafwala byakufwala byabekema kabali bemana pepi nabo.
Batukashi abo balatina nekukotama panshi. Lino bantu abo balabepusheti, “Mulamulangwelinga cani muntu muyumi pakati pa bafu?
Nkalimo muno, lapunduku. Kamwanuka maswi ngalamwambila mpwalikuba ku Galileya.
Eti Mwana Muntu welela kuyabwa mumakasa a bantu baipa, nekupopwa palusanda, nekupunduka kubafu pakapita masuba atatu.”
Popelapo batukashi basa balanuka maswi aya.
Mpobalafuma kucumbwe kusa, balambila beshikwiya likumi ne umo kayi ne bantu bambi bonse.
Abo batukashi balikuba Maliya wa ku Magadala, ne Yohana ne Maliya banyina Jemusi. Balo ne batukashi bambi balikubapo balambila batumwa makani aya.
Nsombi maswi ayo kubeshikwiya alaboneka eti nikutamokowa, neco baliya kubashoma batukashi abo.
Nsombi nendi Petulo walanyamuka nekufwambilako kucumbwe. Mpwalashika walabonowa muli bikwisa byonka, walabwelela kung'anda kali wakankamana pabintu byalenshika.
Pabusuba ubo beshikwiya babili balikuya kumunshi walikukwiweti Emausi. Mushinso wa kufuma ku Emausi kushika ku Yelusalemu walikuba wa makilomita akwana likumi ne limo.
Mpobalikuya munshila bali kababandika pa bintu ibyo byonse byalenshika.
Kabacibandika nekwipushanya, Yesu mwine walesa pepi ne kwendela pamo nabo.
Balamubona nomba baliya kumwinshiba.
Yesu walabepusheti, “Nimakani cini ngomulenga nkamubandikilana?” Lino nabo balemana kayi cinso cabo nkacili calaka nemapensho,
lino umbi walikukwiweti kileopasi walamwipusheti, “Sena njobe mwensu wenka mu Yelusalemu utenshi byalenshika masuba apita kunyuma?”
Yesu walepusheti, “Byamushobocini?” Lino balakumbuleti. Sha Yesu wa ku Nasaleti. Uyo muntu walikuba munshinshimi wali kwinsa bintu byangofu pamenso a Lesa ne bantu bonse.
Nsombi bamakulene beshimilumbo ne bakulene betu bambi balamutwala kwambeti apewe mulandu wakushinwa, kufumapo balamupopa palusanda.
Nsombi afwe twalikuba twengashila kwambeti nakalubule ba Isilaeli. Lino palapiti masuba atatu kufuma mpobyenshika byonse ibi.
Lino kayi batukashi nabambi pakati petu balatukankamanisha. Nabo balaya kucumbwe mumene mene,
lino mubili wakendi baliya kucanamo. Mpobalabwela balambeti balabono bangelo abo balabambileti Yesu nimuyumi.
Bambi mulikoto lyetu balaya kucumbwe ne kucana mbuli ncobalamba batukashi basa, nabo baliya kumubona Yesu.
Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Amwe mobantu baluya, bakute kubula kuyanda kushoma bwangu bintu byonse byalamba bashinshimi.
Sena nkamucinshi kwambeti mupulushi walaiwa usa walikwelela kunyumfwa byeshikubaba byonse ibi kwambeti engile mubulemu bwakendi?”
Lino walabasansulwila byonse byalembwa mumalembo onse, kutatikila mumabuku a Mose mpaka ku bashinshimi bonse bilambanga palyendiye.
Mpobalashika pepi ne Yelusalemu, Yesu walenseti lapitililinga.
Nsombi beshikwiya abo balamukakatisha ne kwambeti, “Kamwikalani nenjafwe pakwinga kulashipi, bonani lisuba lilenga akwibila.” Neco walengila mung'anda ne kwikala nabo.
Mpwalekala nabo pakulyela, Yesu walamanta shinkwa, walalumba Lesa, Kayi walakomona nekubayabila.
Popelapo menso abo alacaluka. Lino balamwinshiba popelapo walashimanganowa.
Lino balatatika kwambilaneti, “Cancine ncine maswi akendi ayasanga mumoyo mpwatwambilanga munshila pasa, nekupandulula mabala.”
Kufumapo balanyamuka nekubwelela ku Yelusalemu, uko nkobalacana beshikwiya likumi ne umo kabali babungana pamo nebanabo,
kabambeti, “Nicakubinga Mwami lapunduku kubafu, labonekele kuli Shimoni.”
Lino naboyo babili basa, balasansulula calenshika munshila mpobalamwinshiba Mwami mpwalabakomwena shinkwa.
Kabacamba babili abo, Yesu mwine walashika nekwimana pakati pabo bonse ne kwambeti, “lumuno lube nenjamwe.”
Balo balatilimuka nekutina pakwinga balayeyeti balabononga cipuku.
Nendi walabambileti, “Nomba mulapengelenga cani ne kutoshana mumyoyo mwenu?
Kamubona makasa nebimpanta byakame, kwambeti njame. Kamunjikata munyumfwe pakwinga cipuku ciliya musuni nebifupa mbuli mbyomulabonongeti ndibikute ame.”
Lino mpwalambeco walababonesha makasa nebimpanta byakendi.
Nabo baliya kushoma pakwinga balikuba bakondwa, kayi ne kukankamana. Lino walabepusheti, “Sena mukutepo byakulya pano?”
Balamupa cipansha ca nswi yakuyoka.
Walacitambula ne kulya bonse nkababonako.
Lino walabambileti, “Ibi ebintu byondamwambila mpondalikuba nenjamwe. Pasa ndalikwambeti byonse byalembwa pali njame mu Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose, ne mumabuku abashinshimi, ne mulibuku lya kutembaula.”
Lino walabanyafwa kwambeti banyufwishishe Mabala.
Walabambileti, “Byalalembwa nibi; Mupulushi welela kupenshewa ne kupunduka kubafu pabusuba bwabutatu.
Kwambeti mulina lyakendi Mulumbe Waina ukakambaukwe kubantu ba mishobo yonse, kutatikila ku Yelusalemu. Kwambeti basanduke mumoyo benseco neye Lesa empwela kubalekelela bwipishi bwabo.
Amwe mobakamboni pabintu ibi.
Ninkamutumine cipo ico Bata ncobalashomesha, nsombi mwelela kwikala mumunshi muno kushikila mukatambule ngofu sheti shikafume kwilu.”
Lino Yesu walabatangunina kufuma mumunshi umo kuya kushika ku Betaniya. Kopeloko walatambika makasa akendi nekubaleleka.
Lino kacibaleleka walapansana nabo, nekumantwa kuya kwilu.
Lino balamukambilila, panyuma pakendi balabwelela ku Yelusalemu kabali bakondwa maningi.
Cindi conse balikucanika mu Ng'anda ya Lesa kabalumbaisha Lesa.
Pakutatika, kakuli kwabula bintu byonse kwalikuba Liswi, Liswi ili lyalikuba kuli Lesa. Kayi Liswi ili lyalikuba Lesa.
Liswi ili lyalikuba ne Lesa cindi conse.
Byonse byalabako kupitila mulyendiye, kayi kuliyawa cintu calabako kwabula endiye.
Mulyendiye mwalikuba buyumi, kayi buyumi ubo ebwalikuba cinyina ca mumuni kubantu.
Mumuni uwu ulamunikinga mumushinshe, kayi mushinshe nkawalacikonsha kushima mumuni.
Neco Lesa walatuma muntu naumbi, lina lyakendi walikuba Yohane.
Nendi uyu walesa kwinshila bukamboni, nekwambila bantu sha mumuni usa, kwambeti bantu bonse banyumfwe nekushoma.
Nteko kwambeti nendi walikuba mumuni, nsombi walesa kuba kamboni wa mumuni.
Mumuni wancine ncine, weshi kumunikila bantu bonse, walesa pacishi capanshi.
Yesu walikuba pacishi capanshi, nomba bantu bapacishi capanshi baliya kumwinshiba, nambi Lesa walalenga bintu byonse kupitila mulyendiye.
Walesa kubantu bamushobo wakendi, nomba bantu bakendi baliya kumutambula.
Necikabeco nabambi balamutambula nekushoma lina lyakendi, kayi bopelaba walabapa ngofu shakuba bana ba Lesa
Neco Kuba bana ba Lesa kuliya kufuma mukusemwa kwabo, nambi mu kuyanda kwa mubili, nambi kwanda kwa muntu sobwe, sombi kwalafuma kuli Lesa.
Lino Liswi lyalasanduka muntu, nekwisa kwikala pamo nenjafwe. Walikuba ne nkumbo kayi ne cancine ncine. Kayi twalabona bulemu bwakendi, bulemu mbwalatambula kuBaishi.
Yohane walamubela bukamboni. Walikwambila bantu mwangofu kwambeti, “Uyu engondalikwambeti, kuli lesanga panyuma pakame wampita, pakwinga nkantana nsemwa, nendi walikubapo.”
Weco kupitila munkumbo shakendi shesula twense twalalelekwa mwakupwililila, kulelekwa kwakonkana konkana.
Lesa walatupa Milawo kupitila muli Mose, nomba inkumbo nekushomeka kwalesa kupitila muli Yesu.
kuliya muntu walamubonapo Lesa. Nsombi umo enka Lesa usa, wekala pamo neBaishi, ewalamuyubulula.
Lino ubu ebukamboni mbwalapa Yohane kubamakulene baBayuda baku Yelusalemu balatuma beshimilumbo neba Levi nabambi kuyakwipusha Yohane, balamwipusheti “Njobe bani?”
Nendi walasumina cancine ncine nekubakumbula mwakubula kusoleka, “Ame ntame Mupulushi Walaiwa usa sobwe.”
Balamwipusha kayi, “Nomba njobe Eliya?” Neye walambeti, “Sobwe, ntame Eliya.” Nabo balambeti, “Njobe Mushinshimi ngotulapembelelenga usa?” Neye Yohane walakumbuleti, “Sobwe ntame.”
Lino twambile cancine ncine, kwambeti twenga tubapandulwile cena balatutumu. Omwine ukute kwambeti njobe bani?
Yohane walabakumbuleti, mbuli mwalambila mushinshimi Yesaya, “Ame njame liswi lya muntu lolobeshenga mucinyika; Lambangeti, lulamikani nshila mwakupita Mwami.”
Lino basa bantu balatumwa ne Bafalisi,
balamwipusha Yohane, “Na ntobe Mupulushi Walaiwa usa, nambi Eliya, nambi Mushinshimi ngotulapembelelenga usa, nomba nicani ulabatishinga bantu?”
Yohane walabakumbuleti, “Ame ndababatishinga ne menshi nsombi pakati penu apa pali umbi ngomutenshi.
Nendi uyu lesanga panyuma pakame, nkandelela nekuba musha wakendi wela kusungulula ntambo sha nkwabilo shakendi.”
Bintu ibi byalenshikila ku Betaniya, kutala lwa kucwe kwa mulonga waYolodani, uko Yohane nkwali kubatisha.
Mumene mene Yohane walabona Yesu kesa kulyendiye, lino walambeti, “Kamubonani Mwana Mbelele wa Lesa, weshikufunya bwipishi bwapacishi capanshi!
Uyu endiye usa ngondalikwambeti, ‘Panyuma pakame palesanga muntu wampita, pakwinga ame nkantanansemwa nendi walikubako.’
Nenjame nkandimwinshi, nomba ndalesa akubatisha ne menshi kwambeti Baislaeli bamwishibe.”
Kayi Yohane walamwinshila bukamboni, pakwambeti, “Ndalabona Mushimu Uswepa kauseluka kwilu walikuboneketi nkulimba, walesa kwikala pali endiye.
Ame nkandali kumwinshiba, nsombi Lesa walantuma kwisa akubatisha ne menshi ewanjishibisha kwambeti, ‘Nubone Mushimu Uswepa wesanga kwikala palyendiye, epeloyo eshi kubatisha ne Mushimu Uswepa.’ ”
Ame ndalabibona, kayi ndamwambilingeti, “Epele uyu Emwana waLesa.”
Mumene mene busuba bwalakonkapo Yohane walikuba pamusena popelapo pamo ne beshikwiya bambi babili.
Mpwalabona Yesu kapita, walambeti, “Kamubonani Mwana mbelele wa Lesa!”
Beshikwiya babili basa mpobalanyumfwa maswi alico, balamukonka Yesu.
Yesu mpwalacebuka ne kuboneti balamukonkelenga, walabepusheti, “Nomba mulayandanga cani?” Nabo balambeti, “Tulayandanga kwinshiba mukute kwikala kupeyo, Labi? Bupandulushi bwa Labi nikwambeti, shikwiyisha.”
Yesu walakumbuleti “Tiyeni mwenga mukubone.” Nabo balaya nendi. Nomba cindi calikuba mu ma 4 koloko mansailo mpobalayakubona nkwalikwikala, balekala kopeloko ubo busuba.
Umo pali basa babili walanyumfwa maswi a Yohane ne kumukonka Yesu, walikuba Ndileya mukwabo Shimoni Petulo.
Mpwalamucana shimoni mukwabo, walamwambileti, “Tulamucana Klistu, Mupulushi Walaiwa.”
Neco walamumanta ne kuya nendi kuli Yesu. Yesu mpwalamulangishisha walambeti, “Njobe Shimoni, mwanendi Yohane, nomba lino Lina lyakobe nube Kefa.” Bupandulushi bwa maina Kefa ne Petulo, alambangeti libwe.
Mpobwalaca Yesu walayeya shakuya ku Galileya. Walacana Filipo, ne kumwambileti, “Unkonke.”
Filipo walikuba waku munshi wa Betsaida, kucomwabo Ndileya ne Petulo.
Filipo walacana Nataniyele ne kumwambileti, “Tulamucana usa Mose ngwalalemba sha endiye mulibuku lya Milawo, usa bashinshimi ngobalalemba sha endiye. Yesu Mwana waYosefe, waku Nasaleti.”
Nomba Nataniyele walamwipusheti, “Sena kuNasaleti ngakufuma kantu kayina?” Filipo walakumbuleti, “Tiye ulibonene wenka.”
Yesu mpwalamubona Nataniyele nkesa, walambeti, “Cakubinga uyu emwana mwine mwine waku Islayele wabula bundengamano.”
Nataniyele walamwipusheti, “Mulanjishibi aconi?” Yesu walakumbuleti, “Pasa mpowanga wekala mwinshi mwacitondo camukuyu, Filipo katana akukuwa, ame ndalakubona.”
Nataniyele walambeti, “Bashikwiyisha, cakubinga njamwe Mwana Lesa, njamwe Mwami wa Islayele.”
Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Sena ulashomo pakwinga ndakwambilyeti ndalakubona mwinshi mwa citondo camukuyu. Nomba nubone byapita apa.”
Kayi walambeti, “Lino cancine ncine ndakwambilingeti nukabone kwilu kwacaluka, nukabone bangelo ba Lesa nkabatanta kayi kabaseluka kwisa kuli Mwana Muntu.”
Mpopalapita masuba abili, kwalaba bwinga ku Kana munshi walikuba mucimpansha ca Galileya. Nabo banyina Yesu balayako.
Yesu neye pamo ne beshikwiya bakendi balakwiwako kubwinga ubu.
Mpowalapwa waini ngobalikunwa bantu, banyina Yesu balamwambileti, “Ulabapwili waini.”
Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ma kamutang'ambila ncendela kwinsa, Cindi cakame nkacitana cishika.”
Necikabeco banyina balambila basebenshi bapabwingeti, “Mwinse ciliconse nceti amwambile.”
Lino popelapo palikuba nongo sha mabwe shisanu ne imo, balashibikapo pacebo ca mwambo wa Bayuda wakuliswepesha. Munongo iliyonse mwalikwingila menshi akwana mingomo isanu nambi kupitililapo.
Lino Yesu walambila basa basebenshi, “Kamushani menshi munongo shonse shisule.” Naboyo balesusha mpaka pamilomo.
Panyuma pakendi walabambileti, “Lino tekulani, mutwalile mukulene lendeleshenga bwinga.” Naboyo balamutwalila.
Mukulene wa bwinga mpwalatelela menshi asa Yesu ngalasandula kuba waini, liya kwinshiba kwalafuma waini uyo. Nomba basebenshi basa balateka menshi balikwinshiba. Lino mukulene walikwendelesha bwinga walakuwa shibwinga,
ne kumwambileti, “Bantu bakute kutanguna kuyaba waini waina, nomba bantu bekuta, ukute kubapa waini waina pang'ana. Nomba amwe mwanga mwabika waina kushika cino cindi!”
Ici calikuba cishikunkamanisha cakutanguna Yesu ncalensa mumunshi wa Kana mucimpansha ca Galileya nkwalalesha bulemu bwakendi, neco beshikwiya bakendi balamushoma.
Panyuma pakendi Yesu walaya ku Kapenao, pamo ne banyina ne bakwabo ne beshikwiya bakendi, nkobalakekala kwamasuba ang'ana.
Cindi ca kusekelela Pasika wa Bayuda calaba pepi, Yesu walanyamuka kuya kuYelusalemu.
Kopeloko walengila mulubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa walakacana bantu balolishinga ng'ombe, mbelele ne nkulimba. Kayi nabambi kabali bekala pa bipuna kabashintana mali.
Popelapo walapanga ciswepu ca loshi ne kutatika kubatandanyina pansa bonse, pamo ne ngombe, ne mbelele shabo shonse. walawisha matebulu a bantu balikushintana mali ne mali alamwaikila panshi mbwee.
Kayi walambila balikulisha nkulimba eti, “Bipulisheni pansa, mutaisandula Ng'anda ya Bata kuba ya kwinshilamo makwebo.”
Beshikwiya balanuka Mabala alambangeti, “Kulibenga kwakame mung'anda yenu kulyeti mulilo ulabangilinga mukati mwakame.”
Popelapo bamakulene ba Bayuda balamwipusheti, “Nicikankamiko cini ncoshi winse kwambeti utuleshe naukute ngofu shakwinsa bintu ibi?”
Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Na mwipwaye Nga'nda ya Lesa ino, nenjame nindiyibake mumasuba atatu.”
Lino nabo balambeti, “Nga'nda ya Lesa iyi yalamanta byaka makumi ana ne byaka bisanu ne cimo pakuibaka, lino amwe ngamuibaka mumasubowa atatu?”
Nomba Ng'anda ya Lesa njalikwamba Yesu walikuba mubili wakendi.
Mpwalapunduka kubafu, beshikwiya bakendi balanuka kwambeti walabambilapo makani awa, neco balashoma Mabala ne maswi ngalamba.
Yesu mpwalikuba mu Yelusalemu pakusekelela kwa Pasika, bantu bangi balamushoma pakubona bikankamisho mbyalensa.
Nomba Yesu liya kubashoma, pakwinga walikubenshiba ncebabele bonse.
Nkalapembela kwambeti muntu umbi amwambile ncebabele bantu, pakwinga mwine walikwinshiba bili mumyoyo ya bantu.
Muntu wamulikoto lya Bafalisi, lina lyakendi Nikodemo, mutangunishi wa Bayuda,
walesa kuli Yesu mashiku ne kwambeti, “Bashikwiyisha, tucinsheti njamwe shikwiyisha ngwalatutumina Lesa, pakwinga kuliya muntu wela kwinsa bingashilo byeshikukankamanisha mbyomulenshinga, na Lesa nkalipo nendi.”
Yesu walambeti, “Cancine ndakwambilinga kuliya muntu wela kwingila mubwami bwa Lesa na liya kusemwa cipya.”
Nikodemo walepusheti, “Sena muntu ngosemwa kayi cipya lakulu kendi? Sena ngawingila mulibunda mubanyina ne kusemwa cipya?”
Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Ndakwambilinga cancine ncine kwambeti kotana wingila mu Bwami bwa Lesa citanshi kusemwa ne menshi ne Mushimu Uswepa.
Muntu ukute kusemwa kumubili, nsombi kumushimu ukute kusemwa ne Mushimu Uswepa.
Kotakankamana pakwinga ndakwambilyeti wela kusemwa katubili.
Lukupwe lukute kupupula kulubasu kulikonse, kayi mukute kunyumfweti lulapupulunga, nsombi nkokute kwinshiba nkolulafumunga nambi nkolulenga. Nicimo cimo ne muntu uliyense lasemwa ne Mushimu Uswepa.”
Nikodemo walepusheti, “Ibi ngabinshika aconi?”
Yesu walambeti, “Sena obe ntobe shikwiyisha wenshibikwa mu islayeli, nomba nkobinshi aconi bintu ibi?”
Ndakwambilinga cancine ncine tukute kwamba mbyotwinshi, kayi tukute kupa bukamboni mbyotwalabona, nomba amwe nkamulashomonga maswi etu.
Na nkamulashomonga mpondamwambilinga byapanshi pano, nomba ngamushoma aconi ndamwambila bintu byakwilu?
“Kuliya muntu walayako kwilu, nsombi Mwana Muntu ewalesa kufuma kwilu.
Nomba kayi mbuli Mose mucinyika musa walapacika njoka ya mukuba pelu pacitondo, copeleco neye Mwana Muntu nakanyamunwe pelu mushobomo.
Kwambeti uliyense wamushoma akabe ne buyumi butapu.
Kayi Lesa walabasunisha bantu pacishi capanshi, ecebo cakendi walayaba Mwanendi umo enka, kwambeti uliyense eti akamushome akacane buyumi butapu.
Lesa nkalatuma Mwanendi panshi pano, kwambeti omboloshe milandu ya bantu, nsombi kwambeti abapulushe.
