Tulamusengenga kayi mobanse kwambeti mubacenjeshe batolo. Bayuminisheni bayowa ne balefuka kayi ne bantu bonse mwakwikalika moyo.
Kamutasumisha muntu kubweshela caipa pa caipa, nsombi cindi conse bayandishishenga kwinshilana bintu byaina palwenu kayi neku bantu bonse.
Kondwani masuba onse,
kamupailani kuli Lesa cindi conse,
Cindi conse kamulumbanga Lesa, pakwinga encakute kuyanda kwambeti mwinse cebo cakwambeti mwekatana ne Yesu Klistu.
Kamutaukanishanga Mushimu uswepa,
kamutesebanya mulimo wa bushi shinshimi.
Lino byelekesheni bintu byonse, kwambeti mubishibe na nibyancinencine. Amwe mumantepo byaina,
nekukana bwipishi buli bonse.
Lino Lesa uyo latwikalikinga mulumuno, amuswepeshe munshila iliyonse. Amubambe cena mu mano asulila, mumoyo ne mumubili, kwambeti mukacanike babula bulema akesanga Mwami wetu Yesu Klistu.
Uyo walamukuwa washomeka, kayi nakamwinshile bintu ibi.
Mobanse kamutupaililangonga.
Mubape mitende banse bonse.
Lino ndamwabilinga kupitila mungofu sha Mwami kwambeti mubelenge kalata iyi kuli banenu bonse bashoma.
Luse lwa Mwami Yesu Klistu lube nenjamwe.
Njame Paulo pamo ne Sailasi kayi ne Timoti. Tulalembelenga mubungano waku Tesalonika wa Lesa Bata ne Mwami Yesu Klistu.
Tulasengenga kuli Lesa Bata kwambeti amupe luse ne lumuno.
Twelela kulumbaisha Lesa cindi conse pacebo canjamwe mobanse. Pakwinga celela kwambeti afwe twinseco, cebo cakwambeti lushomo lwenu lulakulunga kayi ne lusuno ndomukute pakati penu lulakonempenga.
Eceb cakendi afwe tulatwanganga mumibungano yonse ya Lesa. Tulatwanganga cebo cakulimbikila kwenu mulushomo kulapeshengeti mulapite mumapensho nemakatasho ngomulacananga.
Byonse ibi bilaleshenga kwambeti Lesa ukute kubeteka mwabululami. Pacebo ici mulabanga belela kwingila mubwami bwa Lesa ubo mbumulapengelenga pacindi cino.
Lino pakwinga Lesa niwabululami nakabape cisubulo bantu abo balamupenshenga.
Neco amwe omulapengenga pacindi cino, nakamupe cindi cakupumwina pamo nenjafwe. Nakenseco pacindi Mwami Yesu akesanga mwilu pamo ne bangelo bakendi bangofu,
nakese ne mulilo ulabangilinga, kwisa kupa cisubulo batamwinshi Lesa kayi ne batanyumfu Mulumbe Waina wa Mwami wetu Yesu Klistu.
Nibakatambule cisubulo kayi nibakapenge kwa muyayaya. Nteti bakabone cinso ca Mwami Yesu Klistu nambi bulemu bwa ngofu shakendi.
Pabusuba mposhi akese kwambeti alumbaishiwe pakati pa baswepa kayi nekwambeti atambule bulemu kufuma kuli abo bashoma, nenjamwe nimukabe nabo pakwinga mwalashoma bukamboni bwetu.
Weco ncotukute kumupailila masuba onse, kwambeti mube belela kutambula buyumi mbwalamukwila. Neco ndasengenga Mwami kwambeti amupe bintu byaina byonse myoyo yenu nceilayandanga kwambeti musebense mulimo ulashininkishinga lushomo lwenu.
Neco lina lya Mwami wetu Yesu Klistu nilikalumbaishiwe pakati penu kayi nenjamwe nimukalumbaishiwe mulyendiye. Lino byonse ibi nibikenshike cebo ca luse lwa Lesa wetu kayi neku Mwami wetu Yesu Klistu.
Lino mobase pamakani akwisa kwa Mwami Yseu neshakubunganishiwa kwambeti tumutambule, ndamusengengeti
miyeyo yenu kaitanyongana bwangu,kayi mutapenga mumyoyo yenu pamakani akwambeti, “Bushiku bwa Mwami bulashiki.” Nambi maswi awa alafumu ku Mushimu Uswepa, nambi kulinjafwe nambi kuli mushinshimi nambi twalensa kwalemba munkalata.
Kamutasuminisha muntu uliyense kwambeti amubepe munshila iliyonse sobwe. Pakwinga busuba ubo kabutanabushika, nikukatatike nanshi kuba bantu bangi beshikupandukila Lesa. Kayi nanshi akaboneke Muntu Waipa,Ngweshakashine Lesa.
Emulwani shikulisumpula pelu pacintu ciliconse ncebakute kwamba bantu eti Lesa, nambi ciliconse ncebakute kukambilila, kayi nakengile mu Ng'anda ya Lesa nekulyamba mwine eti ni Lesa.
Sena nkamwanuka kwambeti ndalamwambila bintu ibi mpondalikuba kwenu?
Pakwinga cebo ncalabulilinga kubonekela lino mucinshi, nsombi nakenshibike pacindi celela.
Nambi pacino cindi bwipishi bwa mushobo uyu bulatatiki kendi kwinshika mwakusolama. Nsombi byonse nibikabonekele patuba uyo lakanishinga bwipishi bakamufunyapo nanshi.
Lino usa Muntu Waipa emposhakabonekele, nomba Mwami Yesu nakashine ne muya ngoshakamuyoyele, bulemu buyosha bwa kwisa kwakendi nibukamushine kwakupwililila.
Muntu Waipa uyu nakese mungofu sha Satana. Nakense byangofu byapusana pusana ne bingashilo byeshikukankamanisha byabundengamano.
Neco munshila iliyonse nakabepe bantu abo beshibakonongeke pamo nendiye pacebo cakwambeti balakana kuyanda cancine ncine cela kubapulusha.
Neco Lesa nakatume ngofu sheti shikabapwishe mano kwambeti bakashome bundengamano.
Lino ceshi cikapulepo nicakwambeti bonse balakana kushoma cancinencine, nsombi balasamwa mubwipishi, neco nibakapewe cisubulo.
Weco afwe twelela kumulumbaisha Lesa cindi conse cebo canjamwe mobanse omwasunika kuli Mwami. Pakwinga Lesa walamusala kwambeti mukapuluke. Lino mwalapuluka pakwinga Mushimu Uswepa walamusandula kuba bantu ba Lesa kayi mwalashoma cancine ncine.
Lesa walamukuwa kupitila mu Mulumbe Waina uyo ngotwalamukambaukila. Walamukuwa kwambeti mukamantemo lubasu mu bulemelelo bwa Mwami wetu Yesu Klistu.
Neco mobanse kamuyumani kayi mwikatishishe bintu ibyo mbyotwalamwiyisha kupitila mukukambauka ne makalata.
Lino Lesa Bata ne Yesu Klistu ebalatuyanda kayi nekutupa ngofu kayi ne kupembelela kwayuma kupitila mu Luse lwakendi.
Bamuyuminishe nekumupa ngofu cindi conse shakwinsa ne kwamba byaina.
Cakupwililisha mobanse kamutupailinga kwambeti maswi a Mwami amwaikile bwangu, kayi ne kwambeti bantu batambule mwa bulemu mbuli ncomwalatambula.
Kayi ne kwambeti Lesa atupulushe kubantu baipa ne babula kululama. Pakwinga nte bonse bakute lushomo.
Neco Mwami walulama, namuyuminishe ne kumukwabilila ku Muntu Waipa usa.
Neco twashoma kwambeti Mwami lamupanga lushomo kwambeti mucikonshe kwinsa bintu ibyo mbyotulamwambilinga.
Neco Lesa abike miyeyo yaina mumyoyo yenu kwambeti mucikonshe kusuna Lesa nekukonka mpapa sha Yesu.
Lino tulamulaililinga mobanse, mulina lya Mwami Yesu Kilstu kwambeti mubaleyenga bantu batolo abo batasuni kwinsa bintu mbyotwalabalailila.
Nomba mobene mucinshi mbuli ncomwela kwinsa kwambeti mubeti njafwe. Pakwinga nkatwabanga batolo pakati penu.
Kayi nkatwalalya shinkwa wamuntu kwakubula kulipila, nsombi twalapulilapo nkasalo kayi twalasebensa munshi ne mashiku kwambeti tutamushupa.
Nteko kwambeti nkacelela kwambeti amwe mutupe, nsombi twalayandeti tube citondesho ncomwela kukonkela.
Pakwinga mpotwalikuba pamo twalamwambileti muntu utasuni kusebensa atalya.
Pakwinga twalanyumfweti bambi pakati penu nibatolo, batasuni kusebensa, nsombi basuni kulyowa byabanabo.
Mulina lya Yesu, tulabambilinga nekubacenjesheti, basebense nekulya byakulya byakulisebensela.
Nomba amwe mobansebame, kamutalema kwinsa bintu byaina.
Na muntu naumbi akane kwinsa bintu ibi mbyotulamwambili munkalata njotulatumu, mumulabilile ne kumusonoka kwambeti akanyumfwe insoni.
Necikabeco kamutamuboneti mulwani wenu, nsombi mumucenjeshe mbuli mwanse.
Lino Mwami amupe lumuno cindi conse munshila iliyonse. Mwami abe nenjamwe mwense.
Ame njame paulo ndalembe nkalata iyi ne makasa akame. Ici nicishibisho ncondabikinga mumankalata akame onse. Enconkute kulemba mushobo uyu.
Luse lwa Mwami Yesu Klistu lube nenjamwe mwense.
Njame, Paulo walakwiwa kuba mutumwa wa Klistu Yesu mukupewa mulawo ne Lesa Mupulushi wetu, ne Klistu Yesu uyo ngotwacinkamo manungo,
ndalembelenga obe Timoti mwaname mwine mwine mulushomo. Ndambangeti kwina moyo inkumbo ne lumuno lwa Lesa ne Klistu Yesu Mwami wetu bibe nenjobe.
Mpondalikuya ku Makedoniya, ndalakupa malailile akwambeti wikale ku Efenso kwambeti ukanishenga bantu nabambi baleyishinga ciyisho cabwepeshi.
Kayi ubambileti kabatatayanga cindi cabo ku tulabi twabakulukulu tulambanga sha masemano. Ibi biliya ncito bikute kuletowa kutotekeshana, nkabikute kwiyishapo sobwe, bilayandanga Lesa bikute kwishibikwa mulushomo.
Ncondakupelenga malailile awa ni kwambeti ubayishe lusuno lwa ncinencine lulafumunga mu moyo waswepa, kayi kuba ne muntu wamukati waina ne lushomo lwa ncinencine.
Bantu nabambi balashiyi mukondo, balataiki ne kuya kuliwala mu makani abula ncito.
Balayandishishinga kuba beshikwiyisha bantu Milawo ya Lesa njalapa Mose, nomba nkabacishi ncobalambanga ne kushininkisha ico ncobaleyishinga.
Afwe twashoma kwambeti Milawo yaina na muntu kaisebensesha munshila yalumbuluka.
Tucishi kwambeti milawo iliya kubelako cebo ca muntu walulama, nsombi yalabelako kululamika beshi kupwaya milawo, batasuni kululamikwa, kayi batatini Lesa. Ba micito yaipa, baipa myoyo kayi batapaili, beshikushina bashali babo, bakapondo,
bapombo, batuloba beshikona ne batuloba banabo, beshikula ne kulisha bantu, bandemishibili, beshikulumbila cabwepeshi munkuta, kayi beshi kwinsa ciliconse capusana ne ciyisho calumbuluka.
Ici ciyisho cikute kucanika mu Mulumbe Waina Lesa Walemekwa welela kulumbaishiwa, uwo ngwalabika mumakasa akame.
Ndalumbunga Klistu Yesu Mwami wetu walampa ngofu ne kunsala kwambeti ndimusebensele, cebo ca kuba washomekwa.
Nikukabeti ndalikusampula Lesa nekupensha bantu ba Lesa, nsombi Lesa walanyumfwila nkumbo pakwinga paliya ncendalikwishiba nkandalikukute lushomo sobwe.
Nomba Mwami wetu walanyumfwila nkumbo shinene, ndalatambula lushomo ne lusuno kupitila mukwikatana ne Klistu Yesu.
Maswi akwambeti Klistu Yesu walesa pa cishi capanshi kwisa kupulusha bantu babwipishi nakubinga kayi elela kutambulwa ca makasa abili, pa bantu bonse baipa ame ndaipa kupita bonse.
Nikukabeco Lesa walanyumfwila nkumbo kwambeti kupitila muli njame ondaipa kupita bonse, Klistu Yesu aleshe kwikalika nkombe kwakendi, kwambeti mbe citondesho kulyabo beti bakamushome kwambeti bakatambule buyumi butapu.
Lino ku Mwami wa cindi conse, utafu kayi utaboneke Lesa enka, kube bulemu ne kulumbaishiwa kucindi ca cindi. Ameni.
Timoti mwaname, ndakupa malailile awa kwelana ne maswi abashinshimi alambwa pali njobe, wasebensesheti byensho, kwambeti ukacikonshe kulwana nkondo yaina.
Kayi pitilisha kuba ne lushomo kayi miyeyo yalulama. iyo nabambi njobalanyakili pambali ibyo bilapasulu lushomo lwabo.
Pakati pa bantu balico pali Humenayo ne Alekisandulo, bantu aba ndabapa cisubulo ne kubanyakila mu bwendeleshi bwa Satana, kwambeti bakaleke kusampula Lesa.
Lino cakutanguna ndasengengeti mupaililengonga bantu bonse. Kupaila kwenu kube kwa kusenga, mipailo yakukombelela nabambi, kayi ne yakulumba Lesa.
Mupaililengonga bami, ne bonse bali mubwendeleshi bwacishi kwambeti twikale mulumuno ne buyumi bwaina palumbanga Lesa.
Ici caina kayi cikute kukondwelesha Lesa Mupulushi wetu.
Nendi layandangeti bantu bonse bakeshiba cancine ncine bakapulushiwe.
Cancine ncine nicakwambeti, kuli Lesa umowa, kayi kuli muntu umowa wemanina bantu kuli Lesa, uyu ni Klistu Yesu.
Uyo walalibenga kula nekulubula bantu bonse. Ico calaba citondesho ca pacindi celela, kulesheti Lesa usuni kupulusha bantu bonse.
Ici ecebo ncalansalila Lesa kwambeti mbe mutumwa shikukambauka Mulumbe Waina kubantu batamwishi Lesa, nkandabepenga sobwe ndambanga cancine ncine. Ndalasalwa kwambeti njiyishe bantu makani a lushomo ne cancine ncine.
Neco, ndayandangeti mpomwabungana, batuloba bapitilishe kupaila kabali bemanika makasa abo kwilu kumupa bulemu Lesa, kwakubula kukalalishanya nambi kupikishana.
Kayi ndayandangeti batukashi balyapishenga ne byakufwala byelela pakufwala mwabulemu kayi mwa mano, kakutaba kulyapisha kwa kuposa mishishi munshila yanyanyisha, kufwala byabeka beka bya golide, kulikobaika malungu munshingo, nambi byakufwala bya mulo wadula.
Nomba kwapa kwabo kube kwa micito yabo yaina kubantu, yelela batukashi balakambilinga Lesa.
Pacindi ncobaleyinga, batukashi babenga bamwena mwakulicepesha.
Batukashi nkabasuminishiwa kusongomana kwiyisha batuloba nambi kubambila ncobela kwinsa sobwe, nsombi bayiyenga mubumweneneshi.
Pakwinga Lesa walayambilila kubumba Adamu, katanabumba Eva,
kayi Adamu nteyo walabepwa nsombi Eva ewalabepwa ne kutaluka Mulawo wa Lesa.
Nomba batukashi nibakapulushiwe cebo ca kusema bana, na bapitilisha kuba ne lushomo nelusuno ne kuba baswepa myoyo, kayi balicepesha.
Makani awa na cancine ncine, akwambeti na muntu layandishishinga ncito yakutangunina mubungano layandanga ncito yaina.
Mutangunishi wamubungano abe muntu wabula kampenda, weba mukashi umowa, weshikulitibuka, weshikuyeya cena, weshikutambula bensu, kayi ucishi kwiyisha.
Kataba cakolwa, nambi mukalu, nsombi abe weshi kwinshila bantu byaina, usuni lumuno, kayi wabula nsala ya mali.
Abe wela kwendelesha cena ba mung'anda yakendi kwambeti banabendi bamunyumfwilenga ne kumulemeka.
Na kalilwa kwendelesha cena bali mung'anda yakendi, nomba inga ucikonshaconi kulela mubungano wa Lesa?
Kataba muntu wengila calino lino mu mubungano, pakwinga ngaulitukumuna ne kuwila mu bwipishi mbuli calensa Satana.
Abe muntu wa cendo caina ngobalalemekenga bantu bakunsa, wela kubula kwikatwa mu kose ka Satana ne kunyumfwa nsoni.
Nabo beshi kunyamfwilisha mubungano babe bacendo caina babula ndemi shibili, kabataba bacakolwa nambi bakute nsala ya mali.
Bekatisha cangofu miyeyo yancine ncine yalushomo lwalayubuyululwa ne Lesa.
Kayi bapewe nanshi ncito ya kubabonenapo, na babula kwalilwa basebense ncito ya kunyamfwilisha.
Bamakashabo babe balilemeka, babula bufuyishi, batalisumpulu, bashomeka mubintu byonse.
Shikunyamfwilisha mumubungano abe muntu ukute mukashi umo'wa, lendeleshenga cena ba mung'anda yakendi.
Pakwinga beshi kunyamfwilisha mubungano balasebensenga cena bakute kuba ne mpuwo yaina, kayi bakute kukonsha kwamba makani a lushomo lwabo muli Klistu Yesu cakubula buyowa.
Ndakulembelenga makani awa nambi ndayandanga kwisa uko calinolino.
Nomba na nkacelwe kwisa, ndalembe kalata iyi kwambeti wishibe ncewela kwinsa mung'anda ya Lesa, uku ekwambeti mubungano wa Lesa muyumi. Mubungano elulindi kayi elupanda lwatabilisha cancine ncine.
“Paliya muntu naba umo wela kukaneti kupaila kwetu kwasolekwa nikunene kwa kwambeti, Nendi walaba muntu Mushimu Uswepa walamwinshila bumboni Kwambeti walulama Walabonwa ne bangelo Walakambaukwa ku mishobo yonse Bantu pa cishi capanshi balamushoma Kayi walatambulwa mwabulemu Kwilu.”
Mushimu Uswepa ulambilishingeti bantu nibakataye lushomo mu masuba akupwililisha, nekutatika kunyumfwila mishimu yabwepeshi nekukonkela biyisho bya mishimu yaipa.
Biyisho bilico, bantu bandemishibili ebakute miyeyo yafwa, yatentwa ne nshimbi yalungula.
Aba bantu endibo beshikukanisha kweba ne kulya byakula, kakuli Lesa walalenga byakulya kwambeti bashoma kayi bacinshi cancinencine babilye mwakulumba Lesa.
Ciliconse ncalalenga Lesa caina nkacela kusesemya bantu, na mucikutambula mwakulumba,
pakwinga cikute kuswepeshewa ne maswi a Lesa ne mipailo.
Na ubeyishenga bintu ibi bantu nabambi, nukabe musebenshi waina wa Klistu Yesu, walalesha kukula mushimba mu biyisho bya lushomo lwetu ne lunyumfwila ndokute kubiyisho bya ca ncinencine mbyolakonkelenga.
Nikukabeco kotantamuka ku makani a tulabi twabuluya, mbuli tulabi ntobasuna kwamba batukashi bamacembele. Obe pitilisha kusha mano ku buyumi bwaina bwa kupaila Lesa.
Ee kwishibisha mubili kusebensa ncito nako kwaina pang'ana, nomba kwishibisha mubili kusebensa ncito sha ku mushimu kwapitapo kwina. Pakwinga kukute lulayo mu buyumi bwa cino cindi, kayi mu cindi ca kuntangu, buyumi butapu.
Awa ni makani a cancine ncine elela kutambulwa ca makasa abili, kayi ne kwashomwa.
Encetulasebenselenga cangofu, pakwinga kupembelela kwetu kuli muli Lesa muyumi, Mupulushi wa bantu bonse makamaka abo bashoma.
Bayishe bintu ibi, kayi ubambile bensenga ncelabambilinga.
Kakutaba muntu naba umo eti akunyanshe cebo cakuba kanike, koba cilesho kulyabo bashoma mung'ambilo, ne mucendo nemulusuno ne mulushomo kayi ne mukubula kampenda.
Mpaka nkese, kosha mano kukubelenga Mabala a Lesa kwambeti wasansululenga ne kwiyisha cena.
Pitilisha kusebensesha cipo ca Mushimu Uswepa cili muli njobe calapewa kuli njobe mpobalakambauka bashinshimi makani a Lesa, abo batangunishi ba mubungano balabika makasa abo pali njobe.
Koyeyapo pa bintu ibi mwakushako mano, kwambeti kuya pantangu kwakobe kubonekele kuli bonse.
Shako mano ku bintu mbyolenshinga ne kubintu mbyoleyishinga. Pitilisha kwinsa bintu ibi, pakwinga wenseco, obe pamo ne bakunyumfwilinga nimukapuluke.
Nkabakansa mukulene, nsombi mwambile mwabulemu pakwinga ulyeti baiso. Misepela banobe ubabonengeti bakwenu,
batukashi bamakulene ubabonengeti banyoko, ne batukashi batwanike ubabonengeti bakwenu kwakubula kubakumbwa.
Kopa bulemu bamukalubingi babula pakwikata.
Nomba na mukalubingi ukute bana, nambi bashikulu, abo bana ne bashikulu batangune kwinshila mukowa wabo ncalayandanga Lesa. Mukwinseco bakute kubweshela bashali ne bamankambushabo ncebalikubenshila, ico cikute kukondwelesha Lesa.
Mukalubingi wabula weshikumunyamfwa nambi kumulama, kupembelela kwakendi wakusha muli Lesa kayi ukute kupitilisha kupaila ne kusenga lunyamfwo kuli Lesa, munshi ne mashiku.
Nomba mukalubingi washa mano mubintu byabula ncito, wafwa kendi nambi ucili muyumi.
Naboyo ubape malailile awa kwambeti babule kampenda.
Nomba na muntu katanyamfwa banse bendi makamaka bamung'anda yakendi, lakana lushomo kayi waipa kupita muntu wabula lushomo.
Kotalemba lina lya mukalubingi pa maina abamukalubingi na nkanashika pabyaka makumi asanu ne limo, kayi abe mukashi walebwapo kumulume umo,
ukute mpuwo yancito shaina. Abe mutukashi walakulisha cena banabendi, kayi walikupa cakulya bantu beshi kupita, kayi walikutambula cena bensu mung'anda yakendi kayi walikunyamfwa bantu mumapensho abo, kayi walikulibenga kwinsa byaina.
Bamukalubingi batana bashika byaka makumi asanu ne limo kotabalemba maina. Pakwinga baba ne nyotwa yakuyanda kwebwa, bakute kushiya Klistu,
kayi ingababa ne mulandu wa kupwaya cipangano cabo cakutanguna.
Pambali palico, ngababa batolo, bakute cinga cakuya kulibandikisha ku manda abanabo, kufwiya nekwingila mumakani abanabo, ne kwamba makani abula kwelela kwamba.
Caina kwambeti bamukalubingi bacili batwanike bebwe, baseme bana ne kubakulisha cena, kwambeti balwani betu babule cindi ca kutwamba bintu byaipa.
Kobona, cilenshiki kuli ba mukalubingi batwanike, balatatiki kukonkela Satana.
Na pali mutukashi muklistu ukute kulela bamukalubingi apitilishe kubanyamfwa kabataba mutolo ku mubungano, kwambeti mubungano upitilishe kunyamfwa bamukalubingi babula pa kwikata.
Batangunishi ba mubungano balatangunininga cena bapewe bulemu ne malipilo elela ncito ya kukambauka ne kwiyisha.
Ici celana ne Mabala a Lesa alambangeti, “Kotasunga ng'ombe matomo kumulomo kwambeti ibule kulya cindi ncolaisebenseshenga mulibala” Kayi “musebenshi wela kutambula malipilo kuli walamwingisha ncito”
Kotautambula mulandu wakumubepesha mutangunishi wa mubungano na uliya bakamboni babili nambi batatu bawishi cena mulandu'wo.
Nambi kulico,bakanse abo balapitilishingo'wa kwinsa bintu byaipa, kwambeti nabambi bamantepo ciyo.
Ndakwambilinga mwangofu pamenso pa Lesa ne Klistu Yesu pamo ne bangelo basalwa, kwambeti ukonke malailile awa kwakubula kulanga pa nkumo, kwambeti ubule kusalulula.
Kotafwambananga kubika makasa pa muntu kumuleta mu ncito ya Mwami ya butangunishi mu mubungano, pakwinga wenseco ngaumantamo lubasu mu bwipishi bwakendi. Obe pitilisha kuba wabula kampenda mu buyumi bwakobe.
Kotanwango'wa menshi onka, konwangonga waini kukunyamfwa kusungulula mulibunda, cebo cakwambeti ukute kukolwa kolwa.
Bwipishi bwa bantu nabambi bukute kuboneka patuba, nambi kabatana bomboloshewa. Nomba bwipishi bwa bantu nabambi bukute kumanta cindi citali kwambeti buboneke.
Ni cimo cimo micito yaina ikute kuboneka patuba, nayo itabonekele patuba nkayela kusolekwa sobwe.
Basha bonse bape bulemu bunene abo mbobalasebenselenga kwambeti, kapataba muntu eshasebanye Lina lya Lesa ne ciyisho cetu.
Mobasha, na mbomulasebenselenga ni banse benu muliklistu kamutabanyanshanga cebo ca kwambeti nibaklistu banenu sobwe, amwe basebenseleni cena, pakwinga bakute kucanamo cena mu ncito shabo ni baklistu, kayi embobasuni. Kopitilisha kubeyisha malailile awa ngondakupa kwambeti bakonkelenga.
Muntu leyishinga bintu byapusana ne ibi, lakananga kusuminisha maswi ancinencine a Mwami wetu Yesu Klistu, ne ciyisho cekatana ne buyumi bulalemekeshenga Lesa,
ulico ni muntu shikulisumpula utacishi ciliconse, shikutotekowa. Ici cikute kuletowa munyono, ne kutotekeshanya, ne kutukashana, kayi ne kuyeyelana byaipa.
Ici cikute kuletowa kulondola pa bantu bakute miyeyo yaipa batakonsho kwishiba ca ncinencine. Balo bakute kuyeyeti kupaila Lesa ni nshila ya kucaninamo bubile.
Ee, nicakubinga kupaila Lesa kukute kupa muntu kuba wakwana ne bintu mbyakute.
Sena pali cintu ncotwalaletelela pacinshi? Paliya! Sena pali cintu nceti tukamantilile pakufumapo? Paliya!
Neco, na katukuteko cakulya, byakufwala ne pakona byopelebyo byakwana.
Nomba bantu bakute kuyandishisha bubile bakute kuwila mumasunko angi, ne kwikatwa mu tose twabuluya tweshikononga twalunkumbwa lwa mubili lukute kubatwala kulufu.
Pakwinga kusunisha mali emuyanda wa bintu bingi byaipa. Nabambi bantu pakusunisha mali balataya lushomo ne kuliletela mapensho pa mibili yabo.
Nomba obe muntu wa Lesa, kotamantamo lubasu mu bintu byaipa. Obe lwila bululami, kulemeka Lesa, lushomo, lusuno, kutalekela pakati, ne kuba wabomba moyo.
Kolwana nkondo yaina ya lushomo, kwambeti ukatambule buyumi butapu, pakwinga ekubuyumi ubu nkwalakukuwila Lesa pasa mpowalikwambilila sha lushomo lwakobe pa menso abantu bangi.
Pamenso pali Lesa ukute kupa buyumi bintu byonse, kayi ne pamenso pa Klistu Yesu uyo walapa bukamboni bwakendi pantangalala kuli Ponsho Pilato, ndakwambileti,
konkela byonse mbyowalambilwa kwinsa mwakubula kutonshanya mpaka pabusuba mbweshakabwele Mwami Yesu Klistu.
Lesa ngobakute kulumbaisha bantu bonse, Mwendeleshi wancinencine,wa bendeleshi, Mwami wa bami bonse, endiyeti akapesheti Klistu akabwele kayi pa cindi celela.
Lesa enkowa eutafu, ewekala mu mumuni utashikwa pepi, paliya muntu walamubonapo, kayi paliya wela kumubona. Lesa apewe bulemu, kayi shakendi ningofu shitapu kucindi ca cindi. Ameni.
Bacenjesheko bantu babile mucishi kwambeti, kabatatwanga nambi kucinka manungo mububile bwela kutaika cindi ciliconse, nsombi kabashoma Lesa ukute kutupa bintu byonse mwakutandabula cikasa kwambeti afwe tukondwe nebuyumi.
Bambile kwambeti benshilenga byaina bantu, babe babile mu micito yaina, beshikupako banabo camoyo umo bintu mbyobakute.
Uko ekubunganya bubile bwabo kwambeti bube pebakwa buyumi bwabo bwakuntangu mbweti bakalicanine, ee buyumi bwa ncinencine nditu.
Obe Timoti, kobamba cena bintu mbyolapewa mu makasa akobe. Talamuka ku mibandi ne kutotekeshanya kwabuluya kutalete bulemu kuli Lesa uko bantu nkobakute kuboneti, “Emano.”
Nabambi balataya lushomo cebo cakulibonesheti bakute mano amushoboyu. Nkumbo sha Lesa shibe nenjamwe.
Njame, Paulo mutumwa wa Klistu Yesu kwelana ne kuyanda kwa Lesa, walatumwa kuya kukambauka sha buyumi mbwalatushomesha mukwikatana ne Klistu Yesu.
Ndalembelenga obe Timoti mwaname ngonsuni. ndasengengeti luse, nkumbo kayi ne lumuno lwa Lesa Bata ne Klistu Yesu Mwami wetu, bibe pali njobe.
Ndalumbunga Lesa ngondasebenselenga ne miyeyo yaswepa yabula mbuli bamashali bakame bakulukulu ncebalikwinsa. Ndalumbunga pakwinga nkandakulubunga mu mipailo yakame munshi ne mashiku sobwe.
Ndanuka ncewalikulila misoshi, nkute kuyanda kwisa kukubona kwambeti nkakondwe ca makasa abili.
Ndanuka lushomo lwa ncinencine ndobakute banyoko ba Yunisi ne bankambuyobe batukashi ba Loisi, ndashometi nenjobe elushomo ndokute.
Neco ndakwanushungeti usheko mano kucipo ca Lesa ncokute ico ncewalatambula pasa mpondalabika makasa akame pali njobe ucisosele mulilo.
Pakwinga Lesa liya kutupa Mushimu wa buyowa sobwe, Mushimu wa Lesa ukute kutupa ngofu, nelusuno kwambeti tucikonshenga kulitibuka.
Neco kotanyumfwanga nsoni kuba kamboni wa Mwami Yesu, nambi kunyumfwa nsoni cebo ca kwambeti ame ndasungwa muno mu jele, obe libambile kucana mapensho, nomba Lesa nakakupe ngofu shakukambauka Mulumbe Waina.
Walatupulusha ne kutukuwa kwambeti tube bantu bakendi, nkatwalikuba twelela kucitambula, nsombi bwalikuba bubambo ne nkumbo sha Lesa. nkumbo nshalatulesha kupitila mukwikatana ne Klistu Yesu kacitana cilengwa cindi.
Lino Lesa walatuyubulwila ibi bintu mpwalaboneka Mupulushi wetu Klistu Yesu, nendi ewalapwisha ngofu sha lufu kupitila mu Mulumbe Waina, latwishibishi cena motwela kucanina buyumi butafu.
Lesa walansala kwambeti mbe mukambaushi, mutumwa kayi shikwiyisha Mulumbe Waina.
Encondapengelenga, ndiya nsoni pakwinga ndimwishi ngondashoma. Neco ndashometi wela kutabilisha cena bintu mbyabika mumakasa akame mpaka busuba bwashakabwele.
Lino ikatisha camakasa abili maswi acancine ncine ngondalakwiyisha kwambeti, lushomo ne lusuno lwetu mukwikatana ne Klistu Yesu bibe cilesho kwakobe ca kukonkela.
Kupitila muMushimu Uswepa ngotukute, ukunyamfwe kubamba cena buboni bwa palubasu mbowalapewa.
Ucishi kwambeti bonse mu cimpansha ca Asiya balanshiya ndenka, pali abo balanshiya pali Figelo ne Hemojene.
Nkumbo sha Lesa shibe mung'anda ya Onesifolo, pakwinga ewalikwisa kunjuminisha tunkanda twingi, kayi nkali kunyumfwa nsoni pakumbona kandi ndasungwa nshimbi mu jele.
Mpwalesa ku Loma walanangaula mpaka walancana.
Nkumbo sha Lesa shikabe pali Onesifolo pa busuba bwa lombolosho. Obe ucishi kufula kwa ncito shaina nshalikunyamfwa mpondalikuba ku Efenso.
Obe mwaname mulushomo, koyuminina mu nkumbo nshetukute mukwikatana ne Klistu Yesu.
Konkela njiyishilo njowalanyumfwa ame kang'amba pa bakamboni bangi, nenjobe wiyisheko bantu beti bakacikonshe kwiyishako nabambi.
Mantamo lubasu mu mapensho pakubeti mushilikali washomwa wa Klistu Yesu.
Mushilikali nkakute kusha mano ku ncito shimbi, nsombi ukute kuyanda kukondwelesha mushilikali mukulene lamulangililinga.
Nendi weshikufwamba lubilo lwa kufola mali nkabela kumufolesha na walilwa kukonkela milawo ya mfwambilo.
kayi mulimi lasebensenga mwangofu ewela nanshi kulya bishango byakutanguna kutebula.
Usheko mano ku makani ngondakwambili, Mwami Yesu nakakunyamfwe kwishiba bintu.
Kwanukangeti, Yesu Klistu uyo walasemwa mu mukowa wa Dafeti, walapunduka kubafu mbuli ncolambanga Mulumbe Waina ngonkute kukambauka.
Ndasungwa ncetani eti kapondo muno mu jele cebo ca kukambauka Mulumbe Waina, nomba necikabeco maswi a Lesa nkasungwa ncetani sobwe.
Neco, nteti ntentuke cebo ca bantu mbwalasala Lesa kwambeti naboyo bakatambule lupulusho lwalesa kupitila muli Klistu Yesu kayi ne kutambula bulemu butapu.
Makani awa nacancine ncine alambangeti; Na twalafwila pamo nendi nitukekale nebuyumi pamo nendiye.
Na tulimbikila nitukendeleshe pamo. Na tukamukane, nendi nakatukane.
Na nkatwashomeka, nendi nakabenga washomeka, pakwinga nkela kulikana.
Kobanushanga bantu bintu ibi, ne kubacenjesha mwangofu pamenso a Lesa kwambeti kabatatotekeshananga pa maswi, nkacikute kunyamfwa sobwe. pakwinga cikute kunyonganya bantu balakutikinga.
Elekesha mwangofu kuba wasuminishiwa pamenso a Lesa, eti musebenshi wabula nsoni; Ukute kwiyisha cena ancinencine.
Talamuka ku mibandi yabuluya italete bulemu kuli Lesa, pakwinga ikute kubatalamusha kuli Lesa.
Pakwinga mibandi ilico ilyeti cilonda cinene citashilikiki. Humenayo ne Fileto ebantu basuna mibandi ilico,
balashiyi mukondo wancine ncine, balanyonganyango'wa lushomo lwa bantu, balambangeti bantu bafwa balapunduka kendi, kwamba kulico nteko kwa ncinencine sobwe.
Nikukabeco, mpwaibaka Lesa nkapela kutenkanishiwa sobwe, pakwinga palembweti, “Mwami, ubeshi bantu bakendi” Kayi pali maswi akwambeti, “Muntu lakambilinga Mwami aleke kwinsa bintu byabula kululama.”
Mung'anda inene mukute kuba mbale shapusana pusana, shagolide neshasilifa neshakubesa kayi ne shakubumba. Pa mbale ishi pali shakusebensesha cindi conse, nashimbi nishakubensesha pa cindi celela.
Na muntu ucileka kwinsa byaipa, uliswepesha, ulyeti mbale shakusebensesha pa cindi celela, pakwinga nakabe waswepa kuli Mwami wakendi, kwambeti amusebenseshe cindi conse muncito yaina.
Talamuka ku lunkumbwa lwa mubili. Obe konkela bululami, nelushomo, nelusuno kayi ne lumuno. Ikatana pamo ne bantu balakambililinga Mwami ne myoyo yaswepa.
Kayi koleka kumantamo lubasu mu kutotekeshanya kwa buluya kwabula mano, ucisheti kukutowa kuleta kukangana.
Musebenshi wa Mwami Lesa nkela kuba shikukangano'wa ne bantu, nsombi wela kunyumfwila nkumbo bantu bonse, shikwiyisha wekalikana cena moyo.
Kolicepeshanga wambanga ne bantu balakutotekenga, mpani Lesa ngobapa cindi ca kusanduka kwambeti beshibe ca ncinencine mwalumbuluka.
Mpani mano abo ngabwelelamo kwambeti bafume mu kose ka Satana wabekateti bensenga ncalayandanga.
Ishibeti masuba akupwililisha nakabe amakatasho.
Pakwinga nikukabe bantu balisuna, balunkumbwa lwa bubile, beshikulilumbaisha, beshikulisumpula, babula bulemu,bamatuka, batanyumfwili bamashali, batalumbu kayi batasakamana cendo cabo.
Babula lusuno, batalekelele banabo, beshikubumba makani, batakonsho kulitibuka, bakalu, batasuni bintu byaina.
Beshikulisha banabo, batasakamana ne buyumi, beshi kulitunta, kayi mu musena wa kusuna Lesa, balo nibakasunengo'wa bintu bishi kubakondwelesha.
Beshi kuboneka kunsa eti balapailinga Lesa, kakuli balakananga ngofu yela kubashinta micito yabo yaipa, bantu balico ubatalamuke.
Pakati pabo pali bantu bakute kwenda kashila mbali kuya mu manda abantu kuya kwikata busha batukashi baluya, balefuka balemenwa ne bwipishi kayi, bamantika ne lunkumbwa lwapusana pusana.
Aba batukashi bakute kuyandishisha kwiya cindi conse, nsombi nkabakute kucana ca ncinencine sobwe.
Mbuli Yanesi ne Yambule ncebalamutoteka Mose, aba naboyo balalwananga ne cancine ncine. Miyeyo yabo yafwa, lushomo lwabo ntelo lwa ncinencine.
Nambi balenshingeco, paliya nkobalenga pakwinga buluya bwabo nibukaboneke kubantu bonse mbuli ncebwalaboneka buluya bwa Yambule ne Yanesi.
Lino obe wishicena ncenkute kwiyisha, wishi cena cendo cakame, ne miyeyo yakame, ne lushomo lwakame, ne kwikalikana moyo kwakame, ne lusuno lwakame, kayi ne kutatyompwa kwakame.
Kayi waishi makatasho ne mapensho ngondalakumana nawo ku Antiyokeya, neku Ikoniya ne ku Lusitala. Ee, ndalapenga, nsombi Mwami walampulusha mu mapensho onsa'wo.
Kayi ni cancinencine uliyense layandanga buyumi muli Yesu Klistu nibakamupenshe.
Nomba bamicito yaipa ne bandemishibili nibakapitilishepo kwipa kubepa ne kubepwa.
Nomba obe konkela mbyowaleishiwa ne kubishoma pakwinga ubeshi bantu balakwiyisha bintu ibi.
Kufuma kubutwanike bwakobe uleshibi Mabala Aswepa ela kukupa mano akushoma muli Klistu Yesu kwambeti ukapuluke.
Mabala Aswepa onse alafubailwa ne Lesa kayi alayandikinga pa kwiyisha, pakukansa bantu pa bilubo byabo, pa kululamika bintu ne kupa busele mubululami.
Kwambeti muntu lasebenselenda Lesa abe wakwana cancinencine kwinsa ncito iliyonse yaina.
Pamenso a Lesa ne Klistu Yesu, uyo lakesanga kombolosha bayumi ne bafwa, pakwinga lakesanga kali Mwami, ndakwambilinga mwangofu ndeti,
kambauka Mulumbe wa Lesa pa cindi bantu ncebalayandanga kukutika, ne pa cindi ncebatasuni kukutika. Balulamike nekubakalalila kayi ne kubayuminisha pakubeisha ca moyonteka.
Cilakashikinga cindi nceti bakatatike kukana kwiyisha kwa ncine ncine, neco nibakayande beshikwiyisha bintu byelana ne mbyobalandanga kunyumfwa.
Nibakakonkelengo'wa tulabi ne kukana kunyumfwa ca ncine ncine,
obe kolilama mu bintu byonse, kotalefuka mumakatasho, sebensa ncito ya kukambauka Mulumbe Waina, kwanilisha ncito yakobe.
Ame ndili pepi kufwa. Buyumi bwakame bulyeti mulumbo uletilwanga pa nteme.
Ndalwana nkondo yaina, ndapwishi kufwamba lubilo kayi ndashomeke mpaka kumapwililisho.
Pa cino cindi munshini wa bululami ulampembelelenga uwo Mwami Lesa momboloshi walulama ngoshakampe pa busuba busa, nomba nteti akapo'wa ame ndenka, nsombi nakape bonse balapembelelenga kwisa kwakendi.
Fwambana kwisa kuno,
Dema layandishishi bintu bya mucishi lanshiyi waya ku Tesalonika. Kelesike waya ku Galatiya, neye Tito waya ku Dalamatiya,
Kuno ndili ne Luka enka. Pakwisa ukese pamo ne Maliko kwambeti akese akanyamfweko ncito.
Tukiko ndamutuma ku Efenso.
Pakwisa ukandeteleleko munganjo ngondalashiya kuli Kalipo ku Tulowa, kayi ukaletelele asa mabuku akame abipaya.
Alekisandulo shatwela usa walanjinshila bintu byaipa, nsombi Mwami Lesa nakamubweshele byaipa.
Alekisandulo walikutoteka mulumbe ngotwali kukambauka, ne njobe ucenjele nendi.
Mpondali kulitabilisha pakomboloshewa pa cindi cakutanguna paliya walanyamfwa, bonse balamwaika. Nomba Lesa katabapa mulandu sobwe.
Nomba Lesa walikuba ne njame, walampa ngofu sha kukambauka mulumbe kwambeti bantu batamwishi Lesa, kayi ndalapuluka kulufu.
Lesa nakamfune mu byaipa byonse ne kuntwala mu Bwami bwakendi bwa kwilu. Kulyendiye kube bulemu butapu! Ameni.
Umpeleko mitende Pulisika ne Akula ne ba mung'anda ya Onesifolo.
Elasito washalila ku Kolinto, neye Tolofimo ndalamushiya kakolwa pa nsumbu ya Mileto.
Ufwambane kwisa kuno kacitana cishika cindi ca mupewo. Yubulu, ne Puludensi, ne Linosi ne Kolodiyasi kayi ne banse bonse bashoma muli Mwami Klistu balamupanga mitende.
Mwami abe nenjobe kayi kwina moyo kwakendi Lesa kube nenjamwe.
Njame paulo musebenshi wa Lesa, mutumwa wa Klistu Yesu, walantuma ku bantu balasalwa ne Lesa, kwambeti ndibatangunine kulushomo lwakwinshiba cancinencine cela kubatwala kubuyumi bwakulemekesha Lesa.
Nekubapa kupembelela buyumi butapu. ubo Lesa utabepe,mbwalashomesha kumyaka ya ndoba.
Lino pacindi celela walayubulula kushomesha uko mumakani akendi. Makani ayo walabika mumakasa akame, weco ndamukambaukili kwelana ne Lesa mupulushi wetu ncalang'ambila.
Ndakulembelenga Tito, mwaname wancine ncine mulushomo lwetu twense. Neco Mwami Lesa ne Klistu Yesu, bamupeni lumuno ne luse.
Ecebo cakendi ndalakushiya ku Kelete kwambeti ubambulule bintu byalashala nekubika batangunishi ba mibungano mu minshi yonse mbuli ncondalakwambila.
Mutangunishi wa mubungano welela kuba muntu wa mpuwo yaina, kayi abe weba mukashi umo, ne bana bakendi bashoma Klistu, kayi beshikunyumfwila bamashali ne kutensa byaipa.
Muntu weshikulangilila mubungano welela kuba ne mpuwo yaina mbulyeti mwembeshi wabikwa ne Lesa. Nkelela kuba muntu shikukolwa bwalwa nambi wabukalu nambi shikuma banendi kayi wabula kushomeka mumakwebo.
Welela kuba shikutambula cena bensu, weshikusuna byaina ne kulikata cali kayi walulama shikulikanisha kwinsa byaipa.
Kayi welela kwikatishisha Maswi ashomeka mbuli ncaleishiwa, kwambeti acikonshe kuyuminisha nabambi ne lwiyisho lwancine ncine kayi ne kucikonsha kukanisha kwinsa byaipa abo bonse bakute kutoteka ciyisho ici.
Pakwinga pali bantu bangi bakute kwambowa bintu byabuluya byela kutaya banabo. Makamaka bantu balafuma palikoto lya bantu balafuma mu Ciyuda beshikunyonganya nekubepa.
Caina kubamweneka, pakwinga baleishinga mikowa ya bantu, bintu mbyobelela kubula kubeisha, nabo balayandangowa mali.
Naumbi wa ku Kelete umo wabashinshimi wabo, walambeti, “Bantu baku Kelete ni ba bepeshi kayi ni bilongolo byaipa, nibatolo, nsombi basuni kulyowa,”
Pacebo ici ubakalalile cangofu kwambeti balulame mulushomo,
bacileke kukutika tulabi bwa Bayuda, ne milawo yeshikubikwa ne bantu beshikukana cancinencine.
Bintu byonse byaswepa kubantu bakute miyeyo yaswepa, nsombi nkabyaswepa kuli bantu babula luushomo, pakwinga myoyo yabo yaipa.
Bakute kwambeti Lesa bamwinshi, nsombi minshilo yabo ikute kukana mbyobakute kwamba. Bakute kufundausha kumoyo kayi nkabanyumfwili Lesa, neco nkabelela cintu ciliconse caina.
Nsombi obe wiyishenga byekatana ne ciyisho ca ncine ncine.
Neco ubambile batuloba bamakulene kwambeti beshikulikanisha, babe beshikwinsa byacikulene, bamanjeyaulwa alulama, bayuma mulushomo, kayi balusuno, kayi batabwelele panyuma.
Kayi naboyo batukashi bensenga byeshikukondwelesha Lesa, belela kuba babombelela mubwikalo bwabo, babula mpyata, nambi basha ba byakunwa bikola. Neco belela kwiyisha bintu byaina,
Lino bayishenga batukashi batwanike kuba ne lusuno kuli ba maibabo ne bana,
babe beshikulikanisha, beshikusebensa cena pang'anda, kayi bankumbo, balicepesha ku baibabo kwambeti Maswi a Lesa katepishiwa.
Copeleco ambilako batuloba bamisepela kuba beshikulikanisha.
Lino munshila iliyonse welela kuba muntu wabula kampenda ne kwinsa milimo yaina, kayi welela kwiyisha cabulemu.
Cindi conse sebenseshani maswi ayina abula kampenda, kwambeti abo balamulwananga banyumfwe nsoni, kayi babule kucikonsha kwamba maswi ayipa palinjafwe.
Basha belela kunyumfwila baleli babo ne kubakondwelesha mubintu byonse, kayi nkabelela kupikishanya nabo,
nambi kubebila bintu. Nsombi belela kubonesha kwina moyo kwakendi pakwiyisha maswi a Lesa Mupulushi wetu.
Pakwinga Lesa walayubulula luse lwakendi kwambeti bantu bonse bapulushiwe.
Luse ulu lulatwiyishinga kwambeti twelela kucileka kwikala mubuyumi bwaipa ne lunkumbwa lwa bintu bya pacishi capanshi kwambeti twikale mu buyumi bwa bu Lesa masuba onse,
Ntepasa tulapembelela bushiku bwa colwe akabonekela Mupulushi wetu Yesu Klistu, ne bulemu bunene bwa Lesa.
Nendi walalibenga kutufuna kubwipishi bonse nekutuswepesha kwambeti tube bantu bakendi balibambila kwinsa bintu byaina.
Ibi embyowela kubeyisha, wela kubayuminisha, kayi ne kukansa cangofu abo balakutikinga. Kakutaba muntu nambi umo shikukunyansha.
Ubanushe bantu kwambeti babenga babombelela kubatangunishi ne bendeleshi babo ne kubanyumfwila kayi nekulibambila kwinsa mulimo waina,
kayi batambanga byaipa pa banabo nambi kuyambana, nsombi kuba babombelela ne kulesha bulemu kumuntu uliyense.
Pakwinga nenjafwe tobene twalikuba baluya, batanyumfwili kayi balubila.Twalikuba basha balunkumbwa lwa mubili kayi ne byakulikondwelesha byapusana pusana. Twalikwikala mubuyumi bwa miyeyo yakupatana ne munyono. Bantu balikuba batupata kayi nenjafwe twalikuba twabapata.
Nsombi inkumbo ne kuyanda kwa Lesa Mupulushi wetu mpobyalayubululwa,
walatupulusha. Nkalenseco pacebo cakwambeti twalensa bintu byaina, nsombi pacebo ca inkumbo shakendi. Walatupulusha kupitila mukusukiwa kwa kusemwa lino kayi ne buyumi bwa lino lino mungofu sha Mushimu Uswepa.
Lesa walatupa Mushimu Uswepa camakasa abili kupitila muli Yesu Klistu Mupulushi wetu.
Walenseco kwambeti munkumbo shakendi tululamikwe pamenso a Lesa ne kwingila mubuyumi butapu ubo mbotulapembelelenga.
Makani awa nakubinga. Ndayandanga kwambeti makani awa wakambauke cangofu kwambeti bashome muli Lesa ne kulibenga kwinsa milimo yaina, iyo yeshikukondwelesha ne kunyamfwa bantu bonse.
Neco obe fumamo mubuyumi bwa kupikishana kwabuluya, kuyanda kulangaula mikondo ya mikowa, nekwambana, kayi ne kupikishanya pa bintu bya Milawo, pakwinga ibi nkabikute kunyamfwa kayi kuliya mobibelele.
Muntu weshikuleta lupatuko pakati penu umucenjeshe mankanda abili, kufuma apo umusule.
Ucinshi muntu wamushoboyu ni wazelezeka kayi kuzelezeka kwakendi kulalesheti walubila.
Ndakatumunga Atema ne Tukiko kuli njobe, ukeleshe cangofu kwisa kuli njame ku Nikopoli, pakwinga enkondayeyenga akwikala mucindi ca mupewo.
Weleshe cangofu kunyamfwa Zena shimilawo, ne Apolo, pabulwendo bwabo, nekuboneti bintu byonse byayandika kuli endibo bilakwana.
Bantu betu belela kwiya kulibenga kwinsa bintu byaina, kwambeti banyamfwilishe mubintu bilayandikinga, kutambeti bekalenga mubuyumi bwabula pindu.
Bonse mbotuli nabo balamupanga mitende. Utupeleko mitende banetu bashoma, luse lwa Lesa lube nenjamwe mwense.
Njame paulo, uli mujele pacebo cakusebensela Yesu Klistu. Ndi pamo ne mukwetu Timoti, tulalembelenga njobe Filimoni omukwetu wasunika, kayi musebenshi munetu,
ne Apiya mukwetu mutukashi, Akipasi mushilikali munetu munkondo ya Mushimu kayi ne mubungano uyo uli mung'anda yakobe.
Luse ne lumuno lube nenjamwe kufuma kuli Lesa Bata betu ne Mwami Yesu Klistu.
Ndalumbunga Lesa wakame cindi conse ndakuyeyanga mipailo.
Pakwinga ndanyumfunga sha lusuno ne lushomo lwakobe kuli bashoma bonse, kayi ne lushomo muli Yesu Klistu.
Ndapailinga kwambeti lwikatano ndokute pamo nenjafwe mulushomo, ulusebenseshe cangofu kwambeti ubeshibishe byonse mbyotwalatambula pacebo ca Yesu Klistu.
Mukwabo, lusuno ndokute lulankondweleshe kayi ulanjuminishi pakwinga ulakondweleshe moyo wakame ne bashoma nabambi bonse.
Pacebo ico ame ndelela kukwambila muli Klistu ncowelela kwinsa.
Nsombi pacebo ca lusuno ame ndakusengenga ndemucekulu, kayi lino ndili mujele pacebo ca kusebensela Klistu.
Neco ndasengelenga Onesimo kuli njamwe pakwinga ni mwaname muli Klistu, pakwinga mpondalikuba mujele ndalaba baishi kubintu bya kumushimu.
Kaindi nkalikukute ncito kulinjobe, nsombi lino ngauba ne ncito kuli njobe ne njame.
Ndamubweshenga kulinjobe, pakwinseci ndabeti ndakutumini moyo wakame wonse.
Ngankondwa kuba nendi kuno, mpondicili mujele pacebo ca kukambauka Mulumbe Waina, kwambeti anyamfwenga pabusena bwakobe.
Necikabeco nkandayandanga kwinsa cintu ciliconse kantana ndikwipusha, kutineti ngaucinsa mwakukukakatisha, nsombi usuminishe mwakusunguluka.
Mpani Onesimo walakushiyowa kwakacindi kang'ana kwambeti akese akekale nenjobe kwacindi conse.
Lino nte musha nsombi wapita musha, nimukwenu muli Klistu. Ame ndimusuni neco, nenjobe welela kumusuna, pakwinga nimusha kayi ni mukwenu muli Mwami Yesu Klistu.
Na njame munobe, mutambule mbuli ncowela kuntambula.
Na walakwinshila caipa nambi kukweleta cintu ciliconse, upe njame mulandu.
Lino ndakulembelenga kalata ne makasa akame, “Ame nde Paulo ninkalipile.” Pakwambeco, nkandelela kukwanusha kwambeti nkongole njonkutile nibuyumi bwakobe.
Lino omwanse wame nenjame unyamfweko pacebo ca Mwami. Unkondwelesheko mbuli mukwenu muli Klistu.
Ndakulembelenga ibi bintu, pakwinga ndashoma kwambeti nubinse mbyondakusenge. Kayi ndicinsheti nucikonshe kwinsa kupita pa bintu ibi.
Ndasengenga kayi, eti ukamambileko cipinda pakona, pakwinga ndashoma kwambeti Lesa nakakumbule mipailo yenu nekumbwesha kulinjamwe.
Epafulasi uyo ngondi nendi mujele cebo ca Yesu, lamupanga mitende.
Maliko, Alisitako ne Dema kayi ne Luka basebenshi baname naboyo balamupanga mitende.
Luse lwa Mwami Yesu Klistu lube nenjamwe mwense.
Mumasuba akunyuma Lesa walikwamba kubamashali betu tunkanda twingi kayi munshila shashiyana shiyana kupitila mubashinshimi.
Nomba mucindi cino camapwililisho Lesa latwambilinga kupitila mu Mwanendi, ngwalasebensesha pa kulenga kwilu ne cishi ca panshi, kayi engwalasala kwambeti pa cindi ca mapwililisho bintu byonse bikabe byakendi.
Kubekema kwa bulemuneno bwa Lesa kulabonekelenga mu Mwanendi, kayi ewakoshana ne Lesa, ewabikwabilila bintu byonse kupitila mumaswi akendi angofu. Mpwalatusambisha bwipishi walaya kwikala Kwilu kucikasa calulyo ca Bwami bwa Lesa.
Mwanendi Lesa nimukulene kupita bangelo, pakwinga lina ndyakute lyapita maina abangelo.
Pakwinga kufumowa kaindi paliya mungelo Lesa ngwalambileti, “Njobe Mwaname lelo ame njame Baiso” Lesa uliya kwambilapo mungelo naba umo kwambeti, “Ninkabe Baishi neye nakabe Mwaname.”
Nomba Lesa mpwalikutuma Mwanendi wakusomona pa cishi ca panshi walambeti, “Bangelo ba Lesa bonse bela kumukambilila”
Nomba kwamba sha bangelo Lesa walambeti, “Nkute kusandula bangelo kuba lukupwe kayi nkute kusandula basebenshi bakendi kuba nsakamwenge sha mulilo.”
Nomba ku Mwanendi, Lesa walambeti, “Obe Lesa, bwami bwakobe nteti bukapwe! Nukendeleshe bantu bakobe mubululami.
Walasuna bululami ne kupela bwipishi. Neco ame Lesa wakobe, ndakusala ne kukupa bulemu bunene kupita banobe bonse ne kukunanika mafuta akondelesha.”
Kayi Lesa walambeti, “Obe Mwami pakutanguna njobe walalenga cishi capanshi kayi ne makasa akobe walalenga kwilu.”
Ibi nibikapwe, nsombi obe nukabengaponga cindi conse. Byonse nibikakuluketi byakufwala.
Nukabipete pete pamo, eti munganjo. Kayi nibikashinte kubeti byakufwala. Nsombi amwe nkamushinti sobwe, nkamubelenge byaka byenu pakwinga buyumi bwenu nkabupu.
Lesa nkalambilapo umo wa bangelo kwambeti, “Ikala ku cikasa cakame ca lulyo mpaka nanshi nkakome balwani bakobe bakabe cakulyatapo myendo yakobe!”
“Sena bangelo bonse nteyo mishimu ikute kutumwa ne Lesa kuya kusebensela bantu beti bakapuluke?”
Twela kushako mano ku bintu mbyotwalanyumfwa kwambeti katutabula lushomo.
Mulumbe wa Lesa ngobalikwamba bangelo ku bamashali betu bakulukulu alikuba ancine ncine. Neco, uliyense walikubula kwanyumfwa nambi kwanyansha walapewa cisubulo celela.
Inga ngatubuleconi kupewa cisubulo na katukana kushako mano ku lupulusho lunene lulicisa? Pakwinga Mwami ewalatanguna kwamba shalupulusho ulu, kayi bantu balanyumfwa balashininkisha kulinjafweti mulumbe uwo niwa ncinencine.
Lesa ewalalesheti mulumbe uwu niwa ncinencine mubintu bishikukankamanisha kayi byangofu, pakupa bipo bya Mushimu Uswepa ku muntu uliyense kwelana ne kuyanda kwakendi.
Tucinsheti Lesa nkalabapapo bangelo ngofu sha kwendelesha cishi calinolino ncetulambangaponga.
Pakwinga muntu naumo walambapo mu Mabala kwambeti, “Amwe Lesa anu muntu niyani kwambeti mu muyeyenga muntususu niyani kwambeti mumusheko mano?
Nendi mwalamucepeshako kwa cindi cing'ana pa bangelo benu. Nikukabeco, mwalamufwalika bulemeneno ne bulemu bwa bwami.
Kwambeti, akendeleshe cena bintu byonse.” Kayi cilambangeti Lesa walapa muntu bwendeleshi pa bintu byonse. Ici cilaleshengeti paliya cintu nacikaba cimo calashalapo, nomba lelo nkatulamubononga muntuyo kendelesha bintu byonse.
Nomba ngotulabononga ni Yesu uyo walacepeshewako pa bangelo kwa cindi cing'ana. Pacino cindi watambula munshini wa bulemeneno ne bulemu, cebo ca mapensho ngwalapitamo cindi ncali kufwa. Calabeco pakwinga Lesa mu kwinamoyo kwakendi, walayandeti Yesu afwile bantu bonse.
Calikuba celela kwambeti Lesa shikubumba byonse, kayi eukute kulama byonse, apesheti Yesu abe welela kwine kupitila mu mapensho ngalapitamo, kwambeti banabendi bangi bese bamantemo lubasu mu bulemeneno bwakendi. Pakwinga Yesu elabatangunininga ku lupulusho.
Yesu nakabaswepeshe kubwipishi kwambeti, nendi pamo nabo beti bakabe baswepa bakabe ne Ishabo umo. Ecebo cakendi Yesu nkela kunyumfwa nsoni kubakuweti, banse bame.
Walamba kuli Lesa eti, “Ninkabambile banse bame sha bintu mbyomwalensa, ninkembile lwimbo ne kumulumbanya pa cindi ncetulabungananga pamo”
Kayi walambeti, “Ni nkacinke manungo mu makasa a Lesa.” Lino kayi walambeti, “Ndili pamo ne bana mbwalampa Lesa.”
Aba mbwalakungeti, bana ni bantu bakute munyemfu ne milopa. Nendi Yesu walaba muntu welana ne bantu bonse. Walenseco kwambeti, kupitila mu lufu lwakendi, akamononge Satana uyo ukute ngofu sha lufu
kwambeti alubule bantu balikuba bekatwa busha mu buyumi bwabo cebo ca kwambeti balikutina lufu.
Nicakubinga kwambeti nkakute kunyafwa bangelo sobwe, calembwa mu Mabala kwambeti, nsombi abo bali mu musemano wa Abulahamu.
Neco ici cilapandululungeti wela kuba mbuli banse bendi mu bintu byonse, kwambeti abe Shimilumbo Mukulene washomeka kayi wankumbo mu ncito yakendi ya kusebensela Lesa, kwambeti bwipishi bwa bantu bulekelelwe.
Pacino cindi ukute ngofu sha kunyamfwilisha bantu balasunkwanga, mbuli Yesu ncalapenga mpwalikusunkwa.
Mobanse betu omwaswepa kayi omwalakwiwa ne Lesa, kamuyeyanga sha Yesu walatumwa kwambeti abe Shimilumbo Mukulene wa lushomo ndotulasuminishinga.
Walikuba washomeka kuli Lesa uyo walamusaleti asebense ncito iyi, mbuli Mose ncalashomeka mu ncito ya mung'anda ya Lesa
Muntu lebakanga ng'anda ukute kupewa bulemu kupita ng'anda njalebakanga. Neco Yesu walemekwa kupita Mose.
Nicakubinga ng'anda ikute kwibakwa ne muntu, nomba Lesa eukute kwibaka bintu byonse.
Mose walashomeka mu ncito ya mung'anda ya Lesa, kayi walikwamba ibyo Lesa mbyalikuyanda kwamba kuntangu.
Nomba Klistu Mwanendi Lesa washomeka mukwendelesha ng'anda ya Lesa.Uku ekwambeti njafwe ng'anda ya Lesa na tubula buyowa ne kuba bashinisha mukupembelela kwetu.
Neco mbuli Mushimu Uswepa ncolambangeti, “Na lelo munyumfwa liswi lya Lesa,
kamutayumisha myoyo mbuli ncebalensa ba mashali benu bakulukulu bushiku mbobalamubukila Lesa, mu cinyika mpobalamukalalisha Lesa.”
Lesa walambeti; Balanjelekesha, nambi balabona ncendalabenshila mu byaka makumi ana.
Ecebo ncendalakalila ne kubambileti, nkababikako myoyo yabo kuli njame kayi balakananga ku konkela Milawo yakame.
Ndalakalala ne kulumbileti, nteti bakengilepo mumusena wakame wa kupumwina.
Mobanse cetukani, kapataba muntu pakati penu ukute moyo waipa wabula lushomo, wela kumufunya kuli Lesa muyumi.
Lino kwambeti mubule kumantwa ne bwipishi ne kuba bayuma myoyo, nyamfwanani umo ne munendi masuba onse ngomulambanga mu Mabala kwambeti “Lelo.”
Pakwinga twense tobasebenshi banendi Klistu, na tupitilishowa kwikatisha lushomo mpaka kumapwilisho a buyumi bwetu.
Mabala alambangeti, Na lelo munyumfwa liswi lya Lesa. Kamutayumisha myoyo mbuli ba mashali benu bakulukulu mpobalamubukila Lesa.
Anu ni bantu cini balanyumfwa liswi lya Lesa, kayi ne kumubukila? Nibantu bonse mbwali kutangunina Mose pakubafunya mu Injipito.
Inga nibani balakalalisha Lesa kwa byaka makumi ana? Ni bantu balikwipisha abo balafwila mu cinyika kayi bitumbi byabo byalashala mbwee mucinyika.
Inga ni bani Lesa mbwalalumbilileti, “nteti bakengile mu cishi ncali kuyanda kubapeti bapumwininemo? Sena ntebamo bamo basa balamubukila?”
Apa tulabono kwambeti calabalisha kwingila mu cishi cisa ni kubula lushomo.
Lino Lesa walatulayeti tukatambule kupumwina nkwalikwamba, twela kuba bantu bacetuka kwambeti kapatakaba muntu naba umo eshakalilwe kutambula kupumwina uko nkwalalaya.
Pakwinga nenjafwe tulanyumfu Mulumbe Waina mbuli naboyo ncebalonyumfwa. Mulumbe ngobalanyumfwa paliya ncewalensa, pakwinga balanyumfowa baliya kutambula mu lushomo sobwe.
Neco afwe otwashoma Lesa tulakutambulunga kupumwina nkwalatulaya. Cili mbuli mwine ncalambeti, “Ee, ndalakalala ne kulumbileti, ‘Nteti bakengile mucishi ncendalikuyanda kubapeti bakapumwinemo.’” Lesa walambeco nambi calikubeti ncito yakendi ya kulenga cishi yalikuba yapwa.
Pakwinga mu Mabala napamo palembweti, “Lesa mpwalapwisha ncito yakendi yonse walapumwina pa busuba bwa busanu ne bubili.”
Kayi pa makani opelawa Lesa walambeti, “Nteti bakengilepo mu musena wakendi wa kupumwinamo.”
Lesa walabambeti nabambi nibakengile mu mumusena wa kupumwininamo. Nomba abo balatanguna kunyumfwa Mulumbe Waina baliya kwingilamo cebo ca kukana kushoma ncalamba Lesa.
Ecebo Lesa ncalabambila bushiku nabumbi ubo mbwalakungeti “Lelo”. Ebushiku mbwalikwamba Lesa kupitila muli Dafeti, mpopalapita byaka bingi mpwalamba mu Mabala awa ngotulambapo kendi alambangeti, “Na lelo munyumfwe liswi lya Lesa, kamutayumisha myoyo”
Na Yoswa nalacikonsha kwingisha bantu mu kupumwina nkwalalaya Lesa, nshinga Lesa nalabula kwambapo sha busuba nabumbi.
Pacebo ico, bushiku bwa kupumwina kwa bantu ba Lesa mpobucili, mbuli Lesa ncalapumwina pa busuba bwa busanu ne bubili.
Pakwinga muntu lengili mukupumwina kwa Lesa ekwambeti lapumwini ku ncito shakendi mbuli Lesa ncalapumwina mpwalapwisha ncito shakendi.
Neco katwelekeshani cangofu kukutambula kupumwina uko, kutineti kapataba muntu naba umo eshakalilwe kukutambula cebo ca kukana kushoma.
Pakwinga Maswi a Lesa nayumi kayi akute ngofu. Alumata kupita cibeshi calumata konse konse. Akute kutimbula pakati ne kushika pekala buyumi ne mushimu, kayi ne pekala mafupa ne mikolofupa. Kayi Maswi a Lesa akute kuyubulula bintu mbyebakute kuyeya ne mbyebasuni bantu.
Paliya cintu ncela kwalilwa Lesa kucibona, ukute kubibona bilengwa byonse mbuli ncebibele pakwinga byonse bili pantangalala, ni kulyendiye nkotwela kucanika ne mulandu wa bintu mbyotwali kwinsa.
Neco katupitilishani kwitatisha mwangofu lushomo lwetu, pakwinga tukute Shimulumbo Mukulene wapita bonse, uyo walakengila kwilu kuli Lesa. Uyu ni Yesu Mwanendi Lesa.
Shimulumbo Mukulene ngotukute nteyo wela kubula kutunyumfwila nkumbo otwalefuka sobwe. Shimulumbo wetu walasunkwa munshila shonse mbuli ncetulasunkwanga, nsombi nendi paliya bwipishi mbwalensa.
Neco katubani bashinisha kayi katuseng'enani pepi ku cipuna ca Bwami bwa Lesa uko kuli kwina moyo, nkweshakatunyumfwile nkumbo ne kutubonesha kwina moyo pa cindi ncetulayandanga lunyamfo.
Shimilumbo Mukulene uliyense ukute kusalwa kufuma pakati pa bantu banendi, ne kubikwa ne Lesa kwambeti abaimaninenga kuli Lesa. Ncito yakendi ni yakubenga bipo ne milumbo kwambeti Lesa alekelele bwipishi bwa bantu.
Pacebo cakwambeti neye walefuka, encakute kubela wabomba moyo kubantu bakute kwinsa byaipa mwakubula kwinshiba.
Neco pakuba muntu walefuka nkela kutwala milumbo kuli Lesa ya kufunya bwipishi bwa bantu banendi bonka sobwe, nsombi ne bwipishi bwakendi.
Nkakute kulisala ne kulipa bulemu mwine bwakuba Shimilumbo Mukulene sobwe, nsombi Lesa eukute kumukuweti abe Shimilumbo Mukulene mbuli ncalakuwa Aloni.
Copeleco, neye Klistu uliya kulipa bulemu mwine bwakuba Shimilumbo Mukulene sobwe, nsombi Lesa ewalamwambileti, “Njobe mwaname ame lelo ndaba Baiso.”
Kayi mu Mabala, napambi palembweti, “Nukabengowa Shimilumbo cindi conse mbuli bushimilumbo bwa Melekisedeki.”
Yesu kacili muntu pacishi capanshi walikupaila ne kusenga kuli Lesa mwakompolola kalila misonshi kuli Lesa uyo wela kumupulusha ku lufu. Cebo cakulicepesha kayi ne kulibenga, Lesa walamukumbula.
Nikukabeti Yesu walikuba Mwanendi Lesa, mapensho ngalakumanya alamwiyisha kunyumfwila Lesa.
Mpwalaba welela cakupwililila walaba citatiko calupulusho lwa cindi conse ku bantu balamunyumfwilinga.
Neco Lesa walamubika kuba Shimilumbo Mukulene, bushimilumbo bwa Melekisedeki.
Nkute makani angi akwamba, nomba ayuma kwamba kuli njamwe pakwinga nkamukute kunyumfwa bwangu.
Nambi canga celela kwambeti pacino cindi mube beshikwiyisha, mulayandanga muntu wela kumwiyisha biyo bitanshi bya maswi a Lesa. Mu musena wakwambeti mulye byakulya byakutamfuna, mucili mwelela kunwowa mukupa.
Uliyense ucinwa mukupa ulyeti mwana kateta wabula lwinshibo mubintu byalulama.
Nomba byakulya byakutamfuna ni bya makulene, abo bela kusebensesha ngofu sha lwinshibo lwakushiyanisha pakati pa caina ne caipa kwelela.
Neco katuyani pantangu mu ciyisho calumbuluka, katushiyani ciyisho citanshi ncetwalayishiwa cilambanga sha Ciklistu. Nkatwela kayi kutala lulindi lwakubwelela kunyuma ku ncito shabulyo, ne motwela kushomena Lesa.
Ne ciyisho ca lubatisho, ne cinga ca kubika makasa pabantu ne ca kupunduka ku bafu, kayi ne sha cisubulo ca cindi conse Lesa nceti akape.
Katuyani pantangu, na Lesa utusuminisha ngatwinseco nditu.
Inga bantu balashiya lushomo lwabo ngabalapeconi? Kakuli Lesa walabamunikilapo kendi, balatelelako cipo ca kwilu ne kutambulako Mushimu Uswepa pamo ne banabo.
Balatelelako kwina kwa Maswi a Lesa, kayi ne ngofu nsheti akaboneshe Lesa mu cindi cilesanga.
Nomba lino abo balacileka kushoma Lesa, nkacela kukonsheka kubabwesheti balape, pakwinga balabangeti balamupoponga pa lusanda kayi Mwanendi Lesa ne kumusebanya.
Bulongo bukute kunwina menshi a mfula ikute kuloka cindi conse. Papita cindi pakute kupula mu mena ukute kupa cakulya, ico cili colwe cakondwelesha mulimi.
Nomba na mu bulongo mumena myunga ne lubamba, bulongobo buliya ncito. Neco buli pepi kushinganwa ne Lesa pa cindi ciliconse celela ne kubutenta.
Mobanse omwasunika, nambi tulambangeco, nkatulamutonshanyanga. Twashometi mukute bintu byaina byela kumutangunina ku lupulusho.
Lesa walulama cindi conse, neco nakapitilishe kwanuka ncito shenu nshemwalikwinsa, kayi ne lusuno ndomukute lwakunyamfwa baklistu banenu kayi mulapitilishinga kwinseco.
Tulayandangeti uliyense mulikoto lyenu apitilishe kangwabu mpaka kumapwililisho, kwambeti ncemulapembelelenga mpaka cikaboneke.
Nkatusuni kwambeti mube batolo sobwe, nsombi kamubani bantu bashoma balibambila kutambula ibyo Lesa mbyalashomesha kupitila mu lushomo ne moyonteka.
Pa cindi Lesa ncalamushomesha Abulahamu kwambeti nakamupe cintu, walalumbileti nakense kwelana ne kushomesha kwakendi. Pakwinga nkapalikuba naumbi wamupita, ecebo cakendi Lesa walalumbila pa Lina lyakendi mwine.
Walambeti, “Ndakushomeshengeti ninkakupe colwe kayi ninkafulishe mukowa wakobe.”
Neco Abulahamu walapembelela ca moyonteka, kayi walatambula ico Lesa ncalamushomesha.
Lino bantu balumbilanga bakute kulumbila palina lya muntu wabapita, kulumbila kwa ncinencine kulico ekukute kupwisha ntota shabo.
Lesa walayanda kubabonesha abo beti bakatambule mbyalabashomesha kwambeti nakense kwelana ne bubambo bwakendi. Ecebo ncalalumbilila ne kukonkomesha mukushomesha kwakendi.
Neco ibi bintu bibili, kushomesha kayi ne kulumbila, cakubinga nibikenshike pakwinga Lesa nkabepe kayi nkashinti sobwe. Afwe otwala fwambila kulyendiye akuyuba tukute kuyuminishiwa pakumbelela nkwalatupa.
Uku kupembelela kwelaneti mukoboco wa buyumi bwetu. Ekulatupanga kubula buyowa, kayi ne kutatenkana nikukatushikishe kwilu mu Ng'anda ya Lesa kunsa kwa cikwisa cashinkilisha pakati ne kuya kwingila mukati mu Musena Waswepa.
Uko Yesu nkwalaba mutanshi kwingilako cebo cetu, walaba Shimilumbo Mukulene wa cindi citapu mbuli ncebwalikuba bushimilumbo bwa Melekisedeki.
Uyu Melekizedeki walikuba mwami wa Salemu, walikuba kayi shimilumbo wa Lesa wa Ngofu Shonse. Melekizedeki walapula nekuya kukumana ne Abulahamu ne kumuleleka, Abulahamu mpwalikufuma ku nkondo uko nkalakoma bami bana.
Popelapo Abulahamu walamanta ca likumi pa bintu byonse mbyalikukute ne kupa Melekizedeki. Lina lyakwambeti Melekizedeki lipandulululungeti, “Mwami wa bululami”. Pakwinga Salemu cilapadululunga “lumuno” Ecebo cakendi Melekizedeki lakwiwangeti “Mwami wa lumuno”.
Nkalikukute baishi, nambi banyina, nambi cikokwe, nambi citatiko nambi mapwililisho. Melekizedeki walikubeti Mwanendi Lesa, kayi ni shimilumbo wa muyayaya.
Kamubonani bukulene bwa Melekizedeki! Cikokwe wetu Abulahamu walamupa ca likumi ca bintu byonse mbyalalamuna balwani bakendi.
Kayi beshimilumbo ba mumukowa wa Levi Milawo ya Mose yalabasuminisha kumantapo ca likumi pa bintu mbyobakute Baislayeli, mikowa yabo yalafuma mubukome bwa Abulahamu.
Melekizedeki nkalikuba wa mumukowa wa Levi sobwe, necikabeco walamantapo ca likumi pa bintu mbyalikukute Abulahamu, kayi walamuleleka muntuyo walatambula malayano a Lesa.
Apa paliya kutonshanya sobwe, uyo lalelekenga nimukulene kupita uyo lalelekwanga.
Beshimilumbo beshikumantapo ca likumi ni bantu beshi kufwa, nomba nendi Melekizedeki ca likumi ncalamanta Mabala alambangeti nimuyumi.
Mpani ng'ambeti, Abulahamu mpwalapa ca likumi, Levi kupitila mu bana bendi abo balikumanta ca likumi, nendi walapa ca likumi,
Pakwinga Levi walikatana asemwa pa cindico Abulahamu mpwalakumana ne Melekizedeki.Pakwinga walikacili mubukome bwa Abulahamu.
Pabushimilumbo bwa Balevi epalikuba pebakwa Milawo ya Lesa njalapa Baislayeli. Lino nekwalikubeti ncito ya beshimilumbo yalikuba yelela kwine, nshinga nekwalabula kuyandiketi shimilumbo naumbi ese, uyo lafumunga mu bushimilumbo bwa Melekizedeki, bwabula kuba bwa Aloni.
Neco palaba kushinta kwa bushimilumbo, kayi pela kuba kushinta kwa Milawo.
Muntu ngotulambanga ni Mwami uyo wabulapo muntu naumbi wa mumukowa wakendi walabapo shimilumbo.
Ee, tucinsheti walasemenwa mu mukowa wa Yuda, nomba Mose uliya kuwambapo mukowa uwu mpwalikwamba sha beshimilumbo.
Iyi nkani ilanyumfwiki cena, shimilumbo naumbi laboneke uyo ulyeti Melekizedeki.
Lesa walamubika kuba shimilumbo kwakubula kukonkela milawo ne malailile a mikowa yabantu, nsombi kupitila mu ngofu shakendi sha buyumi butapu.
Pakwinga Mabala alambangeti, “Nukabe shimilumbo wa muyayaya, mbuli bushimilumbo bwa Melekizedeki.”
Neco Milawo yakaindi ilafumupo pakwinga nkayali kukute ngofu, yalikuba yalefuka kayi yabula kwelela.
Pakwinga Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose nkayali kucikonsha kululamika bintu byonse sobwe. Lino tulapewa ngotwali kupembelela uyo wela kututwala pepi ne Lesa.
Nacimbi kayi nicakwambeti beshimilumbo nabambi mpobali kubikwa kuba beshimilumbo Lesa nkali kulumbilapo sobwe.
Nomba Yesu mpwalaba shimilumbo palaba kulumbila, Lesa walalumbileti, Mwami Lesa walalumbileti, nteti nkashinte muyeyo wakame, “Njobe shimilumbo wa cindi conse.”
Neco kupusana uku, kulamubikinga Yesu kuba cishomesho ca cipangano caina kupita.
Kupusana nakumbi ni uku kwalikuba beshimilumbo bangi, nsombi lufu elwalikubalisha kupitilisha ncito yabo sobwe.
Nomba nendi Yesu nimuyumi cindi conse, kayi ncito yakendi yakuba shimilumbo nkaituntulukili ku muntu naumbi.
Walibambila kupulusha cakupwililila bantu mbwalatangunininga kuli Lesa kupitila mulyendiye, pakwinga nendi nimuyumi cindi conse kayi ukute kubasengelako kuli Lesa.
Ee,Yesu e Shimilumbo Mukulene ngotulayandanga. Waswepa, wabula kantongo kalikonse, nambi bwipishi. Wapusana ne njafwe tobabwipishi, nendi walapundushiwa ne kuya kwikala Kwilu.
Yesu nkalipo eti beshimilumbo bamakulene nabambi, nendi nkalayandikinga kutwala milumbo yabwipishi bwakendi ne bwa bantu nabambi busuba ne busuba. Nendi walatwala mulumbo umo kankanda kamowa cindi ncalalibenga.
Milawo ya Lesa njalapa Mose yalikusuminisha bantu babula kuswepa kuba beshimilumbo bamakulene, nomba cipangano ca Lesa ncalensa kulumbilapo, ico calesa panyuma pa milawo, calabika Mwana walulama kwa muyayaya.
Cintu cinene ncotulambanga pano nici, afwe tukute Shimilumbo Mukulene uyo wekala kucikasa cakululyo kwa Cipuna ca Bwami ca Lesa mubulemeneno kwilu.
Lasebensenga eti Shimilumbo Mukulene mu Musena Waswepeshesha, mu tente yancinencine yabula kwibakwa ne makasa abantu, nsombi yalebakwa ne Mwami mwine.
Incito ya Shimilumbo Mukulene uliyense ni yakutwala milumbo yabanyama ne bipo nabimbi kuli Lesa, neco neye Shimilumbo Mukulene wetu wela kuba ne cintu cakubenga.
Nacili pano pa cishi, nalabula kubapo Shimilumbo sobwe, pakwinga mpobali beshimilumbo bakute kubenga bipo byasuminishiwa ne Milawo ya Mose.
Incito njobakute kusebensa beshimilumbo aba ni cinkoshanya nambi mufunsha wa bintu bili kwilu. Celana ne ncalikuba Mose. Mpwalikuyanda kwibaka Tente ya Lesa walamwambileti, “Ubambe ndendende mbuli ncewalaleshiwa pa mulundu.”
Nomba lino, Yesu lapewa ncito ya bushimilumbo yapita yabo, mbuli cipangano Lesa ncalabamba pakati palyendiye ne bantu ncecapitapo kwina, apa epebakwa bipangano a bintu byaina.
Cipangano citanshi ne calikubula kampenda, nshinga nepalabula kuyandika kwa cipangano nacimbi.
Nomba Lesa walacaneti bantu bakendi bakute kampenda, pakwambeti, Mwami lambangeti, “Mumasuba alesanga ninkabambe cipangano calinolino ne Baislayeli kayi ne bamukowa wa Yuda.
Nteti cikabeti cipangano ncendalapangana ne bamashali babo pabusuba busa mpondalabamanta pa cikasa cakame ne kubafunya mu Injipito. Nkabali kuba bashomeka kucipangano ncendalapangana nabo. Nenjame ndiyawa kushako mano”
Lelo Mwami lambangeti, “Ici ecipangano ncendapangananga ne Baislayeli mu masuba alesanga. Ninkabike Milawo yakame mu miyeyo yabo kayi ninkailembe mumyoyo yabo. Ninkabe Lesa wabo nabo nibakabe bantu bakame.”
“Paliya eshakayishe muntu munendi sobwe, nambi kwambila munendi eti, komwishiba Lesa. Pakwinga bonse nibakanjishibe kutatikila ku kanike kushika ku mukulene.
Ninkabalekelele bwipishi bwabo kayi nteti nkanukepo cilubo cabo.”
Lino Lesa pakwamba sha Cipangano calinolino, ekwambeti cipangano ca kaindi cilabongosoko, kayi cintu ciliconse cacekula ne kubongosoka cilipepi kushimangana.
Cipangano ca kaindi calikukute milawo ya nkambililo kayi ne milawo yapa musena wa kukambililapo webakwa ne bantu.
Bantu balebaka Tente ya Lesa. Cipinda cakutanguna calikukwiweti Musena Waswepa. Umo mucipinda mwalikuba pakubika lampi, tebulu kayi ne shinkwa walikubengwa kuli Lesa
Kunyuma kwa cikwisa cashinkilila pakati, kwalikuba musena walikukwiweti, Musena Waswepeshesha.
Umu emwalikuba nteme ya golide pakutentela lubani, ne libokoshi lya cipangano lyamatwa ne golide kayi ne nsupa ya golide mwalikuba mana. Kayi mwalikuba nkoli ya Aloni isa yalasonsa matewu, ne mabwe abili asa palikuba palembwa Milawo likumi.
Pa libokoshi palikuba Bakelubi bakubesa balikwimanina bulemeneno bwa Lesa, mifunsha ya mapepe abo yalikuba yafukatila pa musena wakulelekelapo bwipishi. Nomba cindi cino nteco cakwamba byonse ncebyalikuba sobwe.
Ubu ebubambo bwa bintu ncebyalikuba. Beshimilumbo balikwingila mu cipinda cakutanguna ca Tente busuba ne busuba kuya kusebensa ncito shabo.
Enka Shimilumbo Mukulene ewalikwingila mu cipinda catubili ca Tente kankanda kamo pa caka. Walikumantilila milopa yakubenga kuli Lesa cebo ca bwipishi bwakendi, ne bwa bantu banendi abo balikwipisha mwakutenshiba.
Mushimu Uswepa ulatwiyishinga pantangalala pabubambo ubu kwambeti nshila ya kwingilila mu Musena Waswepeshesha, nkaina icaluka pakwinga tente yakutanguna mpoicili.
Ici ecitondesho cilatondekenga ku cindi cino. Uku ekwambeti bipo bya milumbo ya banyama byalikubengwa kuli Lesa nkabyela kululamika moyo wa muntu lakambililinga Lesa.
Pakwinga bintu ibyo bilambangowa pabyakulya ne pa byakunwa kayi ne pamiyambo ya kobenkana ya nswepeshelo. Yonseyi ni milawo yakunsa yasebensanga kushikila cindi Lesa nceti akekalike bubambo bwalinolino.
Nomba, Klistu Shimilumbo Mukulene wa bintu byaina bili pano lashiki. Tente njala sebenselengamonga ni inene, kayi yelela kwine, nteyo yebakwa ne makasa abantu sobwe, uku ekwambeti nteyo ya lubasu lwa pa cishi capanshi.
Klistu mpwalengila mu Musena Waswepeshesha uli mutente walengilamo kankanda kamowa. Uliya kumantilila milopa ya mpongo, ne ya ng'ombe kwambeti abengeti milumbo, nsombi walamanta milopa yakendi yalatuletela lupulusho lwamuyayaya.
Milopa ya mpongo, ne yang'ombe kayi ne milota ya ng'ombe nimbwa bacende njali kusansila bantu babula kuswepa pamenso a Lesa. Kuswepesha uku kwalikubowa kwa kuswepesha mubili.
Neco ici pakubeco, inga yalo milopa ya Klistu inga ishika kupeyo! Kupitila mu Mushimu wamuyayaya, neye walalibenga kuba mulumbo welela cakupwililila kuli Lesa. Milopa ya Klistu nikaswepeshe miyeyo yetu kushiya miyambo yakuswepesha yabula nchito, kwambeti tusebensele Lesa muyumi.
Pacebo ici Klistu elabambanga cipangano ca linolino, neco abo balakwiwa ne Lesa bela kutambula colwe citapu ico ncalalaya, ingacibeco pakwinga pali lufu lwa muntu ulo lwalasungulula bantu kubwipishi mbobalikwinsa kapacili cipangano cakutanguna.
Na pali cipangano calembwa cakushiyila buboni muntu umbi, pela kuba lushinisho lwakwambeti uyo walacilemba lafu.
Pakwinga cipangano ngaciba cabula ncito na muntu walacilemba ucili muyumi, nsombi na lafu empocikute kusebensa.
Ecebo cakendi cipangano cakutanguna calabako cebo cakusebensha milopa.
Cakutanguna Mose walabambila bantu byonse byalalembwa mu Milawo ya Lesa. Encali kumantila milopa ya ng'ombe ne yampongo ne kwisankanya ne menshi, ne kusansa palibuku lya Milawo, kayi ne pa bantu bonse, pakusebensesha katondo ka hisopu kasungililwa bweya bwa mbelele bufubela.
Walambeti, “Iyi ni milopa ilaboneshengeti cipangano ncalamba Lesa mwela kucikonka.”
Kayi Mose walikusansa milopa pa Tente ya Lesa ne pa bintu byonse byakusebensesha pa kukambilila.
Kwelana ne Milawo ya Mose, bintu byonse byali kuswepa ne milopa, kayi kwambeti bwipishi bulekelelwe palikuyandika kwita milopa.
Ibi bintu byemaninakowa bintu bya kwilu binebine, ibyo byela kuswepeshewa munshila ilico. Nomba kwambeti bintu bya kwilu biswepeshewe, bilayandikinga milumbo inene yaina kupitilila.
Lino Klistu uliya kwingila mu Musena Waswepa walebakwa ne makasa abantu sobwe uwo walikubowa cinkosha ca winewine. Nendi walengila Kwilu uko nkwalatwimanininga kuli Lesa pa cino cindi.
Shimilumbo Mukulene wa Bayuda walikwingila mu Musena Waswepeshesha kankanda kamo pa caka, kali wamanta milopa yanyama. Nomba nendi Klistu uliya kulibenga mulumbo wakendi tunkanda twingi sobwe.
Necalikubeco, nalikupitowa mu makatasho angi kufumowa kukulengwa kwa cishi capanshi. Nomba lino pakuboneti mapwililisho a cishi ali pepi, nendi walabonekowa kankanda kamo kwisa kufunya bwipishi kupitila mu mulumbo ngwalalibenga mwine.
Muntu wela kufwa kankanda kamo nanshi, kufumapo lombolosho
Kwelana neco, Klistu nendi walatwala mulumbo kankanda kamowa kufunya bwipishi bwa bantu bangi. Nakese katubili nteko kusa kufunya bwipishi sobwe, nsombi kwisa kupulusha bantu balamupembelelenga.
Milawo yalapewa ku Bayuda nkayalikuba yakwana kuba citondesho cakwana ca lushomo lwa bintu binebine, ni mufunshowa wabintu byaina byalikwisa kuntangu. Milumbo imoimo yalikubengwa lyonse caka ne caka. Inga milumbo ilicisa yalabikwa ne Milawo inga ibalulamikeconi cakupwililila bantu balesanga kuli Lesa?
Na, cancine ncine bantu balakambililinga Lesa baswepa cakupwililila nshinga nebatalibono bwipishi, kayi nibalaleka kubenga milumbo.
Ca ncinencine ni cakwambeti, milumbo njobali kubenga lyonse caka ne caka yali kubanushowa bwipishi bwabo.
Pakwinga milopa ya ng'ombe, kayi ne ya mpongo nkayela kufunya bwipishi.
Ecebo cakendi mpwalesa Klistu pa cishi capanshi walambeti, “Amwe Lesa nkamwalayanda milumbo ne bipo, nsombi mwalamambila mubili.
Nkamwalayandeti banyama babatentenga pa nteme, nambi milumbo yeshi kufunya bwipishi.”
Neco ndalambeti, “Amwe Lesa, njame pano ndesakwinsa lusuno lwenu, mbuli ncecalalembwa palinjame mu Milawo ya Mose.”
Citanshi walambeti, “Nkamwalayanda, nambi kukondwa ne milumbo ne bipo nambi kutentwa kwa banyama pa nteme kwambeti bafunye bwipishi.” Klistu walambeci nikukabeti milumbo yonseyi yali kubengwa kukonkela Milawo.
Kayi walambeti, “Njame pano kwambeti njinse luyando lwenu amwe Lesa.” Neco Lesa walaifunyapo milumbo yakaindi, walabika Klistu kuba mulumbo mu musena wa milumbo yakaindi milumbo yakaindi.
Pakwinga Yesu Klistu walensa ncalikuyanda Lesa, anu twense tulaswepe ku bwipishi kupitila mu mubili wakendi ngwalabenga mulumbo kenshi kamowa kwa muyayaya.
Shimilumbo uliyense Muyuda walikusebensa ncito yakendi busuba ne busuba, nsombi nakenshico mankanda mangi, milumbo iyi nkayali kufunya bwipishi.
Nomba Yesu walabenga mulumbo umowa wakufunya bwipishi kwa muyayaya, ne kuya kwikala ku cikasa cakululyo ca Lesa.
Uko nkwalapembelelenga kushika cindi Lesa nceshakabike balwani bakendi kuba ca kulyatapo myendo yakendi.
Ne mulumbo umowa lalete bululami bwa muyayaya kubantu mbwalaswepeshe bwipishi.
Nawo Mushimu Uswepa ulatupanga bukamboni bwakendi. Citanshi Lesa lambangeti,
“Ici ecipangano nceshi nkasuminishane nabo mu masuba alesanga, Ninkabike milawo yakame mumu miyeyo yabo myoyo yabo ne kwilemba.”
Kayi lambangeti, “Nteti nkanukepo bwipishi bwabo nambi ncito shabo shaipa sobwe.”
Neco, Lesa pakulekelela kulico, mulumbo weshikufunya bwipishi nkaulayandikinga sobwe.
Mobanse bame, twasunguluka kuya kwingila mu Musena Waswepeshesha cebo ca lufu lwa Yesu.
Walatucalwila nshila ya linolino yeshikupa buyumi kupita mu cikwisa calikutushinkilila ku Musena Waswepeshesha, uku ekwambeti kupitila mu mubili wakendi.
Tukute Shimilumbo Mukulene lendeleshenga ng'anda ya Lesa.
Neco tiyeni tuseng'ene kuli Lesa ne moyo waloma ne lushomo lwa ncinencine. Myoyo yaswepa italitibuku. Ne mibili yasambishiwa ne menshi abula mashilo.
Katwikatishani camakasa abili kupembelela nkotulasuminishinga, pakwinga twashometi Lesa wasunga cipangano cakendi.
Katubani basakamana umo ne munendi, tunyamfwanenga umo ne munendi ne kulesha lusuno kayi ne kwinsa ncito shaina.
Katutaleka kubungana pamo, mbuli nabamo ncebakute cinga ca kutabungana pamo. Nsombi katuyuminishananga umo ne munendi cindi conse, bonani busuba bwakwisa Mwami bulaseng'enenga pepi.
Neco kuliya mulumbo naumbi weshukafunye bwipishi na katupitilisha kwinsa bwipishi kakuli tucinshi ca ncinencine.
Twensangeco, ninshi cetu nikupembelelowa lombolosho lulesanga ne mulilo uyosha weshukashine bantu balakananga Lesa.
Muntu labulunga kukonkela Milawo ya Mose, wela kufwa kwakubula kumunyumfwila luse na pali bantu babili nambi bangi balamwinshili bukamboni.
Inga kulyeconi kuli beshikusampula Mwanendi Lesa? Balabonongeti milopa ya cipangano ca Lesa yalabaswepesha bwipishi ni yabulyo? Inga neye muntu latukananga Mushimu Uswepa wa Lesa uwo ulatuleshenga kwina moyo kwakendi Kamuyeyani kukonempa kwacisubulo nceti cikabe.
Tumwinshi walambeti, “Ninkabweshele, kayi ninkalipile.” Ne uyo walambeti, “Mwami nakomboloshe bantu bakendi.”
Ni cintu cikute kuyosha kwine na Lesa muyumi ukwikata kwambeti akupe cisubulo.
Kamwanukani ncecalikuba kuli njamwe mu cindi cakunyuma, mu masuba asa. Lesa kali lamumunikili kendi, mwalapita mumapensho angi, nsombi muliya kukomwa mu kulwisha kwenu.
Bantu balikumutukana ne kumupensha pantangalala tweshi twingi, nacimo cindi mwalikuyanda kuliwalapo pa bantu balikupenshewa.
Mwalamantako lubasu mu mapensho a bakaili, kayi mpobalamumantila bintu byonse mwalashala kamuli mwakondwa, pakwinga mwalikucinsheti mukute bintu byaina bitapu.
Kamutabwela kunyuma, pakwinga kuntangu kuli cilambo cinene.
Ikalikani nkombe kwambeti mwinse cena luyando lwa Lesa ne kutambula bintu mbyalamulaya.
Mbuli ncecalembwa mu Mabala, “Kulashalowa kacindi kang'ana neye lesanga nteti akacelwepo sobwe.
Lelo bantu bakame balulama nibakashome kayi nibakekale bayumi. Nomba na umo mulyendibo umfutatila, nteti kakondwepo sobwe.”
Nomba ntafwe bantu beshi kubwela kunyuma ne kutaika sobwe. Tukute lushomo kayi twapuluka.
Lushomo ni lushinisho lwa bintu bilapembelwanga mwakubula kutonshanya nambi nkatula bibononga.
Cebo ca lushomo lwabo bantu bakaindi Lesa walikukondwa nabo.
Pakuba ne lushomo tukute kwinshibeti Lesa walasebenseshowa maswi pa kulenga kwilu ne cishi capanshi. Kayi tucinsheti bintu bilabonekenga byalabapo kufuma ku bintu bitaboneke.
Mu lushomo Abelo walabenga mulumbo waina kuli Lesa wapita wa Kaini. Lushomo lwakendi elwalapesheti Lesa amwambeti muntu walulama, pakwinga Lesa walatambula bipo byakendi. Nambi Abelo walafwa kaindi, ne lelo ucamba cebo ca lushomo lwakendi.
Pakwinga Enoki walashoma Lesa ecebo cakendi uliya kufwa. Paliya walamucanapo, pakwinga Lesa walamumanta Kwilu. Mabala alambangeti, Lesa walakondwa ne mbyalikwinsa Enoki katana mantwa Kwilu.
Paliya wela kumukondwelesha Lesa kwabula lushomo, neco uyo lesanga kuli Lesa ashometi Lesa nkwali, kayi ukute kupa cilambo balamulangaulunga.
Lushomo elwalapesheti Nowa anyumfwe kucenjesha kwa Lesa pa bintu byali kwisa kuntangu mbyali kubula kubona. Walanyumfwila Lesa pa kwibaka bwato bunene mwalapulukila ne mukowa wakendi. Ici calalesheti bantu balikuba baipa, pakwinga Nowa walatambula bululami kuli Lesa cebo ca lushomo.
Mu lushomo Abulahamu walanyumfwila Lesa pa cindi ncalamukuwa kushiya cishi ca comwabo kuya kucishi ncalamulaya kumupa. Walashiya cishi cakendi katakwinshi nkwalikuya.
Mu lushomo lwakendi walikwikaleti mwensu mu cishi ico Lesa ncalamulaya kumupa. Walikwikalowa mu matente, mbuli Isaki, kayi ne Yakobo ncebalikwikala abo balatambulako cipangano ca Lesa ca mushoboyo.
Abulahamu walikupembelela, munshi webakwa mu lulindi lwekalikana, munshi webakwa mwabuya, webakwa ne Lesa.
Mu lushomo, Abulahamu walapewa ngofu shakusema bana mubucekulu nambi Sala walikuba ng'umba. Walaba ne mwana cebo ca lushomo.Walikuba washoma Lesa kwambeti nakakwanilishe ncalamulaya.
Nambi Abulahamu walikubeti wafwa, nsombi mu muntuyu mwalafuma bana bangi batabelengeketi nyenyenshi sha kwilu nambi museya wa mu mulonga.
Aba bonse balafwa kabali bashoma, baliya kutambula bintu mbyalabalaya Lesa, nikukabeco balikubibona ne kubitambula kabicili patali. Kayi balasumina pantangalala kwambeti ni bensu beshikwikala kwa kulonga longa.
Bantu bakute kwambeco pantangalala bakute kupembelela kupewa cishi cabo.
Pakwinga nkabali kuyeya kubwelela kucishi nkobalafuma, nibalikuyeyeco nshinga nibalabwelela kucishi nkobalafuma.
Balo balalangaula cishi caina, cishi ca kwilu. Neco Lesa nkela kunyumfwa nsoni bamukuwangeti Lesa wabo, pakwinga walababambila munshi.
Mu lushomo Abulahamu pa cindi Lesa ncalamusunka walabenga Isaki mwanendi kuba mulumbo kuli Lesa. Abulahamu ewalalaiwa ne Lesa, nomba kayi walikuba walibambila kutwala mwanendi enka ngwali kukute kwambeti abe mulumbo.
Lesa walamwambileti, “Kufumina muli Isaki nukabe ne bashikulu mbondakulaya.”
Abulahamu walikuba washoma mwakutatonshanya kwambeti Lesa wela kumupundusha Isaki nambi lafu, neco mukwelanika ngatwambeti Abulahamu walamutambula Isaki kufuma ku bafu.
Mu lushomo, Isaki walalaila limo banabendi, Yakobo ne Esau sha colwe nceshi bakabe naco ku masuba akuntangu.
Mu lushomo Yakobo katana afwa walapa colwe bana ba Yosefe, kali washintilila pa nkoli kakambilila Lesa.
Mu lushomo Yosefe katana afwa walambeti bana Baislayeli nibakafume mu Injipito, kayi walashiya malailile a nceti bakense pa mafupa akendi akafwa.
Mu lushomo bashali ba Mose balamusoleka kwa myenshi itatu mpwalasemwa. Kwapa kwa mwana ekwalapeti bataluke mulawo wa mwami kwa kubula buyowa.
Mulushomo Mose mpwalakula,walakana kukwiweti mushukulu wa mwami wa ku Injipito.
Walacibona kuba cintu caina kupengela pamo ne bantu ba Lesa kupita kukondwa ne malyalya a bwipishi kwa kacindi kang'ana.
Walasalapo kusulwa cebo ca Klistu Mupulushi Wananikwa wa Lesa kuba cintu caina kupita buboni bonse bwa mu Injipito, pakwinga walasha menso akendi pa cilambo ca kuntangu.
Mu lushomo Mose walafuma mu Injipito kwakubula kutina bukalu bwa mwami. Walakana kubwela pakwinga walikubeti labononga Lesa utaboneke.
Mu lushomo Mose walabamba kusekelela kwa Pasika kayi ne kupa mulawo wa kusansaila milopa pa bisasa kwambeti mungelo katesa ashine bana bakutanguna kusema ba bana Baislayeli.
Mu lushomo Baislayeli balatampuka lwenje lwafubela, Nomba bashilikali ba ku Injipito nabo mpobalelekesha kubatampukila, balaya nkwela ne menshi.
Mu lushomo malinga a munshi wa Yeliko alalokolomoka kuwa panshi nti! Pa cindi Baislayeli mpobalaushinguluka pelete munshi wa Yeliko masuba asanu ne abili.
Pakwinga Lahabi mufule walashoma muli Lesa, ecebo cakendi neye ne bansebendi baliya kufwila pamo ne bantu balikubula kunyumfwila Lesa, pakwinga walabatambula Baislayeli balatumwa kuya kutapa cishi.
Sena mpitilishe kwamba? Ndiya cindi citali ca kwamba sha lushomo lwa Gidiyoni ne Balaki ne Samisoni ne Yefita ne Dafeti ne Samiyele kayi ne bashinshimi.
Mu lushomo aba bantu balalwana nkondo ne kukoma bishi bingi. Balensa ncalikuyanda Lesa, balatambula ncalabalaya Lesa. Balacala milomo ya nkalamo,
balashima mulilo walikubangila, kayi baliya kufwapo ku censho. Nambi balikuba balefuka, nsombi balapewa ngofu. Balikwinshi mwakulwanina nkondo, kayi balakoma makoto ankondo abalwani.
Mu lushomo batukashi balatambula banse babo balikuba bafwa, nsombi balapunduka ku bafu. Nabambi pakukana kusungululwa balapenshekwa kwine mpaka balafwa kwambeti bakapundukile kubuyumi bwaina.
Bambi balawelwa, bambi balaumwa bikoti, kayi nabambi balasungwa ncetani ne kuwalwa mu jele.
Nabambi balapwaiwa mabwe, bambi mibili yabo yalatimbulwa pakati, nabambi balashinwa ne byensho. Nabambi balabapitanya kabali babafwalika mpaya sha mbelele nambi sha mpongo. Balikuba bapenshi, balapenshewa kayi balalingwa.
Cishi capanshi nkacalabelela sobwe, balaba beshi kufwambila mu binyika ne mumilundu, kona mu maceni ne mubilindi eti bantu babula cishi cabo.
Ha! Bantu aba bonse nambi Lesa balabalumbaisha cebo lushomo lwabo, nikukabeti baliya kutambula bintu mbyalabalaya Lesa!
Pakwinga Lesa mububambo bwakendi utukutile bintu byaina kwine. Kuyanda kwakendi ni kwa kwambeti afwe pamo nendibo tushike pakuba belela cakupwililila.
Afwe tukute mulongo unene watushinguluka wa bakamboni. Neco katutayani ciliconse cilatucelweshenga ne bwipishi bwatulangatila, katufwambani mwakutabwela panyuma mu lubilo ndotulimo.
Katushani menso pali Yesu apo mpotwebaka lushomo lwetu kufuma pacitatiko mpaka ku mapwililisho. Yesu uliya kutamauka cebo ca lufu lwakendi lwa pa lunsanda, nsombi cebo ca kupembelela kukondwa, nendi uliya kutina kufwa pa lusanda mwakusampulwa. Pa cindi cino wekala ku cikasa ca kululyo ca Cipuna ca bwami ca Lesa.
Kamuyeyani bintu mbyalapitamo, ncobalamupata bantu babwipishi. Neco kamutanyumfwa butolo nambi kutentuka sobwe.
Pakwinga mukulwana ne bwipishi nkamuna mushika pakwinsa kushinwa.
Mulalubu maswi akuyuminisha ngalamba Lesa kuli njamwe mobana bendi batuloba ne batukashi ngalambeti, “Omwaname, konyumfwila Mwami akululamikanga, kayi kotatyompwa akucancililanga.
Pakwinga Mwami ukute kukalalila muntu ngwasuni ne kupa cisubulo uliyense ngwalatambulu eti mwana.”
Kamupitani mumapensho kwambeti mwiyepo mikalilo yaina. Lesa lenshingeti mobanabendi. Sena pali mwana ngobatapa cisubulo baishi?
Na mubula kupewa cisubulo mobanabendi bonse, ekwambeti ntamwe bana bancine ncine, mobana ba mubufule.
Bameshetu bapacishi capanshi batupanga cisubulo tukute kubapa bulemu, inga cilyeconi lino ncotwela kubanyumfwila Bameshetu bakwilu ne kuba bayumi?
Bameshetu bapa cishi capanshi bakute kutupa cisubulo kwa kacindi kang'anowa mbuli ncebalayandanga, nomba Lesa ukute kutwinshileco kwambeti tucane caina, kwambeti tucanemo lubasu mu kuswepa kwakendi.
Twapewanga cisubulo tukute kuboneti tulasampuku nkatukute kukondwapo. Nomba panyuma pakendi bantu bakute kololwa ne cisubulo bakute kucana cilambo ca bote ca buyumi bwalulama.
Kamwimanikani makasa enu alefuka, kayi yumishani manungo enu atontola!
Endani munshila yololoka cena kwambeti myendo yenu yalemana, kaitombankana, nsombi isengulwe.
